detail.name: 参考文献
detail.obj: Ａｎｔｏｎａｎｇｅｌｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｅｘｐｒｅｓｓｉｏｎ  ｐｒｏｆｉｌｅ  ｏｆ  ａ  ４００－ｂｐ  Ｓｔｒａ８  ｐｒｏｍｏｔｅｒ  ｒｅｇｉｏｎ  ｄｕｒｉｎｇ  ｓｐｅｒｍａｔｏｇｅｎｅｓｉｓ；Ｍｉｃｒｏｓｃｏｐｙ  Ｒｅｓｅａｒｃｈ  ａｎｄ  Ｔｅｃｈｎｉｑｕｅ（２００９）７２（１１）：８１６－８２２
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  配偶子形成プロモーターは、配偶子形成プロセスに選択的なプロモーターである。一部の配偶子形成プロモーターは、配偶子形成の減数分裂段階前に作用する一方、他のものは配偶子形成のプロセスの種々の時点において特異的に活性化される。特に目的とするのは、細胞質共有が停止した後にのみ精子形成において活性となるプロモーターである。実施形態は、配偶子形成に選択的な、または卵母細胞形成、卵子細胞形成、卵母細胞成熟、精子形成、精原細胞への成熟、一次精母細胞への成熟、二次精母細胞への成熟、精子細胞への成熟、および精細胞への成熟からなる群から選択される１つ以上の配偶子形成下位プロセスの間に選択的に活性化されるプロモーターの制御下にある細胞または胚中に配置された外因性遺伝子を含む。一部のプロモーターは一般に配偶子形成の間に活性である一方、他のものはある下位プロセスにおいて開始して活性化されるが、配偶子形成の他の期を通して継続し得る。実施形態は、配偶子形成プロセスに選択的な組織特異的プロモーターの制御下にある細胞または胚中に配置された外因性遺伝子をさらに含み：例えば、組織特異的プロモーターは、精巣、精細管、および精巣上体からなる群から選択される組織中で選択的に活性である。減数分裂前および減数分裂後配偶子形成プロモーターは、太糸期の精母細胞中だけでなく、より早期の精子形成においても活性であるサイクリンＡ１プロモーターである（Ｍｕｅｌｌｅｒ－Ｔｉｄｏｗ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｉｎｔ  Ｊ  Ｍｏｌ  Ｍｅｄ．，２００３  Ｍａｒ，１１（３）：３１１－３１５；Ｓｕｃｃｅｓｓｉｖｅ  ｉｎｃｒｅａｓｅｓ  ｉｎ  ｈｕｍａｎ  ｃｙｃｌｉｎ  Ａ１  ｐｒｏｍｏｔｅｒ  ａｃｔｉｖｉｔｙ  ｄｕｒｉｎｇ  ｓｐｅｒｍａｔｏｇｅｎｅｓｉｓ  ｉｎ  ｔｒａｎｓｇｅｎｉｃ  ｍｉｃｅ）。ＳＰ－１０のプロモーター（－４０８／＋２８または－２６６／＋２８；ＳＰ－１０プロモーターと称される）は、精子細胞特異的転写にのみ指向される。実際、トランスジェニックマウスにおいて、ｐａｎ活性ＣＭＶエンハンサーに隣接するトランス遺伝子統合にかかわらず、－４０８／＋２８プロモーターは、精子細胞特異性を維持し、トランス遺伝子の異所性発現は得られない（Ｐ  Ｒｅｄｄｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｓｐｅｒｍａｔｉｄ－ｓｐｅｃｉｆｉｃ  ｐｒｏｍｏｔｅｒ  ｏｆ  ｔｈｅ  ＳＰ－１０  ｇｅｎｅ  ｆｕｎｃｔｉｏｎｓ  ａｓ  ａｎ  ｉｎｓｕｌａｔｏｒ  ｉｎ  ｓｏｍａｔｉｃ  ｃｅｌｌｓ；Ｄｅｖｅｌｏｐｍｅｎｔａｌ  Ｂｉｏｌｏｇｙ（２００３）２６２（１）：１７３－１８２）。レチノイン酸遺伝子８（Ｓｔｒａ８）プロモーター（Ｓｔｒａ８プロモーターとして称される）により刺激される４００ｂｐ調節領域は、減数分裂および減数分裂後生殖細胞中で選択的に活性であり、未分化生殖細胞中では活性でない（Ａｎｔｏｎａｎｇｅｌｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｅｘｐｒｅｓｓｉｏｎ  ｐｒｏｆｉｌｅ  ｏｆ  ａ  ４００－ｂｐ  Ｓｔｒａ８  ｐｒｏｍｏｔｅｒ  ｒｅｇｉｏｎ  ｄｕｒｉｎｇ  ｓｐｅｒｍａｔｏｇｅｎｅｓｉｓ；Ｍｉｃｒｏｓｃｏｐｙ  Ｒｅｓｅａｒｃｈ  ａｎｄ  Ｔｅｃｈｎｉｑｕｅ（２００９）７２（１１）：８１６－８２２）。表１：ＨＤアレルを有するコロニーの回収頻度参照。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>配子形成启动子是对配子形成过程具有选择性的启动子。 一些配子形成启动子在配子形成的减数分裂阶段之前起作用,而其他配子形成启动子在配子形成过程的不同时间被特异性激活。 特别感兴趣的是仅在细胞质共享停止后才在精子形成中具有活性的启动子。 实施方案包括置于细胞或胚胎中的外源基因,所述外源基因处于对配子形成有选择性的启动子的控制下,或者在选自由卵母细胞形成、卵子细胞形成、卵母细胞成熟、精子形成、成熟为精原细胞、成熟为初级精母细胞、成熟为次级精母细胞、成熟为精子细胞和成熟为精细胞组成的组的一个或多个配子形成子过程期间被选择性激活。 一些启动子在配子形成期间通常是有活性的,而其他启动子在某些子过程中开始并被激活,但可以在配子形成的其他阶段持续。 实施方案还包括置于细胞或胚胎中的外源基因,其处于对配子形成过程具有选择性的组织特异性启动子的控制下：例如,组织特异性启动子在选自睾丸、细管和附睾的组织中具有选择性活性。 减数分裂前和减数分裂后配子形成启动子是细胞周期蛋白A1启动子,其不仅在粗纱期的精母细胞中有活性,而且在更早的精子形成中也有活性（Mueller-Tidow等人,Int J Mol Med.,2003 Mar,11（3）：311-315；Successive increases in human cyclin A1 promoter activity during spermatogenesis in transgenic mice）。 SP-10的启动子（-408/+28或-266/+28；称为SP-10启动子）仅针对精子细胞特异性转录。 实际上,在转基因小鼠中,-408/+28启动子保持精子细胞特异性并且不产生转基因的异位表达,而与泛活性CMV增强子相邻的转基因整合无关（P Reddi等人,Spermatid-specific promoter of the SP-10gene functions as an insulator in somatic cells；Developmental Biology（2003）262（1）：173-182）。 由视黄酸基因8（Stra8）启动子（称为Stra8启动子）刺激的400bp调节区在减数分裂和减数分裂后生殖细胞中具有选择性活性,而在未分化生殖细胞中没有活性（Antonangeli等人,Expression profile of a 400-bp Stra8 promoter region during spermatogenesis；Microscopy Research and Technique（2009）72（11）：816-822）。 表1：具有HD等位基因的集落的回收频率参考。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  あるタイプのプロモーターを標的核酸配列に作動可能に連結させることができる。マーカーを有する精子を作製する場合、配偶子形成プロモーターまたは他の発現エレメントが好ましいが、しかしながら、マーカーのより一般的な発現が効率的であり得る。プロモーターのタイプとしては、限定されるものではないが、組織特異的プロモーター、構成的プロモーター、誘導性プロモーター、および特定の刺激に応答性または不応答性のプロモーターが挙げられる。他の実施形態において、顕著な組織または時間的特異性なしで核酸分子の発現を容易にするプロモーターを使用することができる（すなわち、構成的プロモーター）。例えば、ベータ－アクチンプロモーター、例えば、ニワトリベータ－アクチン遺伝子プロモーター、ユビキチンプロモーター、ミニＣＡＧプロモーター、グリセルアルデヒド－３－リン酸デヒドロゲナーゼ（ＧＡＰＤＨ）プロモーター、または３－ホスホグリセリン酸キナーゼ（ＰＧＫ）プロモーターを使用することができるとともに、ウイルスプロモーター、例えば、単純ヘルペスウイルスチミジンキナーゼ（ＨＳＶ－ＴＫ）プロモーター、ＳＶ４０プロモーター、またはサイトメガロウイルス（ＣＭＶ）プロモーターを使用することができる。一部の実施形態において、ニワトリベータアクチン遺伝子プロモーターおよびＣＭＶエンハンサーの融合物をプロモーターとして使用することができる。例えば、Ｘｕ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００１）Ｈｕｍ．Ｇｅｎｅ  Ｔｈｅｒ．，１２：５６３；およびＫｉｗａｋｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９６）Ｈｕｍ．Ｇｅｎｅ  Ｔｈｅｒ．，７：８２１参照。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>一种类型的启动子可以与靶核酸序列可操作地连接。 当产生具有标记物的精子时,配子形成启动子或其他表达元件是优选的,然而,标记物的更普遍表达可能是有效的。 启动子的类型包括但不限于组织特异性启动子、组成型启动子、诱导型启动子和响应于或不响应于特定刺激的启动子。 在其他实施方案中,可以使用促进核酸分子表达而没有显著的组织或时间特异性的启动子（即组成型启动子）。 例如,可以使用β-肌动蛋白启动子,例如鸡β-肌动蛋白基因启动子、泛素启动子、迷你CAG启动子、甘油醛-3-磷酸脱氢酶(GAPDH)启动子或3-磷酸甘油酸激酶(PGK)启动子,并且可以使用病毒启动子,例如单纯疱疹病毒胸苷激酶（HSV-TK）启动子、SV40启动子或巨细胞病毒(CMV)启动子。 在一些实施方案中,鸡β肌动蛋白基因启动子和CMV增强子的融合物可以用作启动子。 参见例如Xu等人,（2001）Hum.Gene Ther.,12:56 3； 和Kiwaki等人,（1996）Hum.Gene Ther.,7：821。</base:Paragraphs>

</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  一部の実施形態において、選択マーカーをコードする配列をリコンビナーゼ、例えば、ＣｒｅまたはＦｌｐなどについての認識配列によりフランキングさせることができる。例えば、選択マーカーは、選択マーカーを構築物から切り出すことができるようにｌｏｘＰ認識部位（Ｃｒｅリコンビナーゼにより認識される３４ｂｐ認識部位）またはＦＲＴ認識部位によりフランキングさせることができる。Ｃｒｅ／ｌｏｘ技術の概説についてはＯｒｂａｎ，ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｐｒｏｃ．Ｎａｔｌ．Ａｃａｄ．Ｓｃｉ．（１９９２）８９：６８６１、およびＢｒａｎｄ  ａｎｄ  Ｄｙｍｅｃｋｉ，Ｄｅｖ．Ｃｅｌｌ（２００４）６：７参照。選択マーカー遺伝子により中断されるＣｒｅまたはＦｌｐ活性化可能トランス遺伝子を含有するトランスポゾンを使用してトランス遺伝子の条件的発現を有するトランスジェニック動物を得ることもできる。例えば、マーカー／トランス遺伝子の発現をドライブするプロモーターは、ユビキタスまたは組織特異的のいずれかであり得、それはＦ０動物（例えば、ブタ）におけるマーカーのユビキタスまたは組織特異的発現をもたらす。トランス遺伝子の組織特異的活性化は、例えば、マーカー中断トランス遺伝子をユビキタスに発現するブタと、ＣｒｅもしくはＦｌｐを組織特異的に発現するブタとを掛け合わせることにより、またはマーカー中断トランス遺伝子を組織特異的に発現するブタと、ＣｒｅもしくはＦｌｐリコンビナーゼをユビキタスに発現するブタとを掛け合わせることにより達成することができる。トランス遺伝子の発現の制御またはマーカーの切り出しの制御により、トランス遺伝子の発現が可能となる。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在一些实施例中,编码选择标记的序列可以侧接重组酶（例如Cre或Flp）的识别序列。 例如,选择标记可以侧接loxP识别位点（34bp识别位点,由Cre重组酶识别）或FRT识别位点,使得选择标记可以从构建体中切除。 关于Cre/lox技术的综述,参见Orban等人,Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.（1992）89：6861和Brand和Dymecki,Dev.Cell（2004）6：7。 含有被选择标记基因中断的Cre或Flp可活化转基因的转座子也可用于获得具有转基因的条件性表达的转基因动物。 例如,驱动标志物/转基因表达的启动子可以是遍在的或组织特异性的,这导致标志物在F0动物（例如,猪）中的遍在的或组织特异性的表达。 转基因的组织特异性活化可以例如通过使遍在表达标志物中断的转基因的猪与组织特异性表达Cre或Flp的猪交配,或者通过使组织特异性表达标志物中断的转基因的猪与遍在表达Cre或Flp重组酶的猪交配来实现。 转基因的表达的控制或标志物的切除的控制允许转基因的表达。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  トランスポゾン系において、核酸構築物の転写単位、すなわち、外因性核酸配列に作動可能に連結している調節領域は、トランスポゾンの反転リピートによりフランキングされている。いくつかのトランスポゾン系、例として、例えば、Ｓｌｅｅｐｉｎｇ  Ｂｅａｕｔｙ（米国特許第６，６１３，７５２号明細書および米国特許出願公開第２００５／０００３５４２号明細書参照）；Ｆｒｏｇ  Ｐｒｉｎｃｅ（Ｍｉｓｋｅｙ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００３）Ｎｕｃｌｅｉｃ  Ａｃｉｄｓ  Ｒｅｓ．３１：６８７３）；Ｔｏｌ２（Ｋａｗａｋａｍｉ（２００７）Ｇｅｎｏｍｅ  Ｂｉｏｌｏｇｙ  ８（Ｓｕｐｐｌ．１）：Ｓ７；Ｍｉｎｏｓ（Ｐａｖｌｏｐｏｕｌｏｓ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００７）Ｇｅｎｏｍｅ  Ｂｉｏｌｏｇｙ  ８（Ｓｕｐｐｌ．１）：Ｓ２）；Ｈｓｍａｒ１（Ｍｉｓｋｅｙ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００７））Ｍｏｌ  Ｃｅｌｌ  Ｂｉｏｌ．２７：４５８９）；およびＰａｓｓｐｏｒｔが、核酸を細胞、例として、マウス、ヒト、およびブタ細胞中に導入するために開発されている。Ｓｌｅｅｐｉｎｇ  Ｂｅａｕｔｙトランスポゾンが特に有用である。トランスポゼースは、外因性核酸と同一の核酸構築物上でコードされるタンパク質として送達することができ、別個の核酸構築物上で導入することができ、またはｍＲＮＡ（例えば、インビトロ転写およびキャップ化ｍＲＮＡ）として提供することができる。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在转座子系统中,核酸构建体的转录单元,即与外源核酸序列可操作地连接的调控区,侧翼为转座子的反向重复序列。 几种转座子系统,包括例如睡美人（Sleeping Beauty）（参见美国专利号6,613,752和美国专利申请公开号2005/0003542）； Frog Prince（Miskey等人,（2003）Nucleic Acids Res.31：6873）； Tol2（Kawakami（2007）Genome Biology 8（增刊1）：S7；Minos（Pavlopoulos等人,（2007）Genome Biology 8（增刊1）：S2）；Hsmar1（Miskey等人,（2007））Mol Cell Biol.27：4589）； 和Passport已被开发用于将核酸引入细胞,包括小鼠、人和猪细胞。 睡美人转座子是特别有用的。 转座酶可以作为在与外源核酸相同的核酸构建体上编码的蛋白质递送,可以在单独的核酸构建体上引入,或者可以作为mRNA（例如,体外转录的和加帽的mRNA）提供。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  当技術分野において公知の種々の技術を使用して遺伝子を不活性化してノックアウト動物を作製し、および／または核酸構築物を動物中に導入してファウンダー動物を生産し、ノックアウトまたは核酸構築物がゲノム中に統合されている動物系列を作製することができる。このような技術としては、限定されるものではないが、前核マイクロインジェクション（米国特許第４，８７３，１９１号明細書）、生殖系列中へのレトロウイルス媒介遺伝子導入（Ｖａｎ  ｄｅｒ  Ｐｕｔｔｅｎ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９８５）Ｐｒｏｃ．Ｎａｔｌ．Ａｃａｄ．Ｓｃｉ．ＵＳＡ，８２：６１４８－１６５２）、胚性幹細胞中への遺伝子標的化（Ｔｈｏｍｐｓｏｎ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９８９）Ｃｅｌｌ，５６：３１３－３２１）、胚のエレクトロポレーション（Ｌｏ（１９８３）Ｍｏｌ．Ｃｅｌｌ．Ｂｉｏｌ．，３：１８０３－１８１４）、精子媒介遺伝子導入（Ｌａｖｉｔｒａｎｏ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００２）Ｐｒｏｃ．Ｎａｔｌ．Ａｃａｄ．Ｓｃｉ．ＵＳＡ，９９：１４２３０－１４２３５；Ｌａｖｉｔｒａｎｏ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２００６）Ｒｅｐｒｏｄ．Ｆｅｒｔ．Ｄｅｖｅｌｏｐ．，１８：１９－２３）、および体細胞、例えば、卵丘もしくは乳腺細胞、または生体、胎児、もしくは胚性幹細胞のインビトロ形質転換とそれに続く核移植（Ｗｉｌｍｕｔ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９７）Ｎａｔｕｒｅ，３８５：８１０－８１３；およびＷａｋａｙａｍａ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９８）Ｎａｔｕｒｅ，３９４：３６９－３７４）が挙げられる。前核マイクロインジェクション、精子媒介遺伝子導入、および体細胞核移植が特に有用な技術である。ゲノム改変されている動物は、細胞の全て、例として、生殖系列細胞が遺伝子改変を有する動物である。遺伝子改変がモザイクである動物を生産する方法を使用する場合、動物を同系交配することができ、ゲノム改変されている子孫を選択することができる。細胞が胚盤胞状態において改変される場合、例えば、クローン化を使用してモザイク動物を作製することができ、単一細胞が改変される場合、ゲノム改変が生じ得る。特定の遺伝子がノックアウト改変により不活性化される場合、ホモ接合性が通常要求される。特定の遺伝子がＲＮＡ干渉またはドミナントネガティブ方針により不活性化される場合、ヘテロ接合性が適切であることが多い。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可以使用本领域已知的各种技术使基因失活以产生敲除动物和/或将核酸构建体引入动物中以产生建立动物,从而产生其中敲除或核酸构建体整合到基因组中的动物谱系。 此类技术包括但不限于原核显微注射（美国专利号4,873,191）、逆转录病毒介导的基因转移到种系中（Van der Putten等人,（1985）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,82：6148-1652）、基因靶向到胚胎干细胞中（Thompson等人,（1989）Cell,56：313-321）、胚胎的电穿孔（Lo（1983）Mol.Cell.Biol.,3:18 03-1814）、精子介导的基因转移（Lavitrano等人,（2002）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,99：14230-14235； 原核显微注射、精子介导的基因转移和体细胞核移植是特别有用的技术。 基因组修饰的动物是其中所有细胞（包括种系细胞）具有遗传修饰的动物。 当使用产生其中遗传修饰是镶嵌的动物的方法时,可以使动物自交,并且可以选择基因组修饰的后代。 当细胞在囊胚状态下被修饰时,例如,可以使用克隆来产生镶嵌动物,并且当单个细胞被修饰时,可以发生基因组修饰。 当通过敲除修饰使特定基因失活时,通常需要纯合性。 当通过RNA干扰或显性负性策略使特定基因失活时,杂合性通常是合适的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可以使用本领域已知的各种技术使基因失活以产生敲除动物和/或将核酸构建体引入动物中以产生建立动物,从而产生其中敲除或核酸构建体整合到基因组中的动物谱系。 此类技术包括但不限于原核显微注射（美国专利号4,873,191）、逆转录病毒介导的基因转移到种系中（Van der Putten等人,（1985）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,82：6148-1652）、基因靶向到胚胎干细胞中（Thompson等人,（1989）Cell,56：313-321）、胚胎的电穿孔（Lo（1983）Mol.Cell.Biol.,3:18 03-1814）、精子介导的基因转移（Lavitrano等人,（2002）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,99：14230-14235； 原核显微注射、精子介导的基因转移和体细胞核移植是特别有用的技术。 基因组修饰的动物是其中所有细胞（包括种系细胞）具有遗传修饰的动物。 当使用产生其中遗传修饰是镶嵌的动物的方法时,可以使动物自交,并且可以选择基因组修饰的后代。 当细胞在囊胚状态下被修饰时,例如,可以使用克隆来产生镶嵌动物,并且当单个细胞被修饰时,可以发生基因组修饰。 当通过敲除修饰使特定基因失活时,通常需要纯合性。 当通过RNA干扰或显性负性策略使特定基因失活时,杂合性通常是合适的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  体細胞核移植において、上記の核酸構築物を含むトランスジェニック偶蹄目細胞（例えば、トランスジェニックブタ細胞またはウシ細胞）、例えば、胚割球、胎児線維芽細胞、成体耳線維芽細胞、または顆粒膜細胞を、除核卵母細胞中に導入して複合細胞を樹立することができる。卵母細胞は、極体付近で部分的に透明帯を切開し、次いで切開区域において細胞質を押し出すことにより除核することができる。典型的には、鋭く斜めに切られた先端部を有する注入ピペットを使用してトランスジェニック細胞を、第２減数分裂において停止させた除核卵母細胞中に注入する。一部の慣用例において、第２減数分裂において停止させた卵母細胞を卵と称する。ブタまたはウシ胚を生産した後（例えば、卵母細胞の融合および活性化により）、活性化の約２０～２４時間後に胚をレシピエント雌の卵管に移植する。例えば、Ｃｉｂｅｌｌｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９８）Ｓｃｉｅｎｃｅ，２８０：１２５６－１２５８および米国特許第６，５４８，７４１号明細書参照。ブタについて、レシピエント雌は、胚の移植約２０～２１日後に妊娠について確認することができる。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在体细胞核移植中,可以将包含上述核酸构建体的转基因偶蹄目细胞（例如,转基因猪细胞或牛细胞）（例如,胚胎卵裂球、胎儿成纤维细胞、成体耳成纤维细胞或颗粒细胞）引入去核卵母细胞中以建立复合细胞。 卵母细胞可以通过在极体附近切割部分透明带,然后在切割区域中挤出细胞质来去核。 通常,使用具有尖锐倾斜尖端的输注移液管将转基因细胞输注到在第二次减数分裂中停止的去核卵母细胞中。 在一些常规情况下,在第二减数分裂中停滞的卵母细胞被称为卵。 生产猪或牛胚胎后（例如,通过卵母细胞的融合和活化）,在活化的约20～24小时后将胚胎移植到受体雌性的输卵管中。 参见,例如,Cibelli等人,（1998）Science,280：1256-1258和美国专利号6,548,741。 对于猪,受体雌性可以在胚胎的移植约20～21天后确认妊娠。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.obj: Ｓａｍｂｒｏｏｋ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，１９８９，Ｍｏｌｅｃｕｌａｒ  Ｃｌｏｎｉｎｇ，Ａ  Ｌａｂｏｒａｔｏｒｙ  Ｍａｎｕａｌ，ｓｅｃｏｎｄ  ｅｄｉｔｉｏｎ，Ｃｏｌｄ  Ｓｐｒｉｎｇ  Ｈａｒｂｏｒ  Ｐｒｅｓｓ，Ｐｌａｉｎｖｉｅｗ
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  トランスジェニック動物を生成したら、標準的技術を使用して外因性核酸の発現を評価することができる。初回スクリーニングは、サザンブロット分析により達成して構築物の統合が生じたか否かを決定することができる。サザン分析の記載については、Ｓａｍｂｒｏｏｋ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，１９８９，Ｍｏｌｅｃｕｌａｒ  Ｃｌｏｎｉｎｇ，Ａ  Ｌａｂｏｒａｔｏｒｙ  Ｍａｎｕａｌ，ｓｅｃｏｎｄ  ｅｄｉｔｉｏｎ，Ｃｏｌｄ  Ｓｐｒｉｎｇ  Ｈａｒｂｏｒ  Ｐｒｅｓｓ，Ｐｌａｉｎｖｉｅｗ；ＮＹのセクション９．３７～９．５２参照。ポリメラーゼ連鎖反応（ＰＣＲ）技術を初回スクリーニングにおいて使用することもできる。ＰＣＲは、標的核酸を増幅させる手順または技術を指す。一般に、目的領域の末端またはその外側からの配列情報を用いて増幅させるべきテンプレートの逆鎖と配列が同一または類似のオリゴヌクレオチドプライマーを設計する。ＰＣＲを使用してＤＮＡおよびＲＮＡからの特異的配列、例として、全ゲノムＤＮＡまたは全細胞ＲＮＡからの配列を増幅させることができる。プライマーは、典型的には、１４～４０ヌクレオチド長であるが、１０ヌクレオチドから数百ヌクレオチド長に及び得る。ＰＣＲは、例えば、ＰＣＲ  Ｐｒｉｍｅｒ：Ａ  Ｌａｂｏｒａｔｏｒｙ  Ｍａｎｕａｌ，ｅｄ．Ｄｉｅｆｆｅｎｂａｃｈ  ａｎｄ  Ｄｖｅｋｓｌｅｒ，Ｃｏｌｄ  Ｓｐｒｉｎｇ  Ｈａｒｂｏｒ  Ｌａｂｏｒａｔｏｒｙ  Ｐｒｅｓｓ，１９９５に記載されている。核酸は、リガーゼ連鎖反応、鎖置換増幅、自律配列複製（ｓｅｌｆ－ｓｕｓｔａｉｎｅｄ  ｓｅｑｕｅｎｃｅ  ｒｅｐｌｉｃａｔｉｏｎ）、または増幅核酸配列ベース増幅により増幅させることもできる。例えば、Ｌｅｗｉｓ（１９９２）Ｇｅｎｅｔｉｃ  Ｅｎｇｉｎｅｅｒｉｎｇ  Ｎｅｗｓ，１２：１；Ｇｕａｔｅｌｌｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９０）Ｐｒｏｃ．Ｎａｔｌ．Ａｃａｄ．Ｓｃｉ．ＵＳＡ，８７：１８７４；およびＷｅｉｓｓ（１９９１）Ｓｃｉｅｎｃｅ，２５４：１２９２参照。胚盤胞段階において、胚は、ＰＣＲ、サザンハイブリダイゼーションおよびスプリンケレットＰＣＲによる分析のために個々に処理することができる（例えば、Ｄｕｐｕｙ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｐｒｏｃ  Ｎａｔｌ  Ａｃａｄ  Ｓｃｉ  ＵＳＡ（２００２）９９：４４９５参照）。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>一旦产生转基因动物,就可以使用标准技术评估外源核酸的表达。 初始筛选可以通过Southern印迹分析来实现,以确定是否已经发生构建体整合。 关于Southern分析的描述,参见Sambrook等人,1989,Molecular Cloning,A Laboratory Manual,第二版,Cold Spring Harbor Press,Plainview； 参见纽约的9.37-9.52节。 聚合酶链式反应(PCR)技术也可用于初始筛选。 PCR是指扩增靶核酸的程序或技术。 通常,使用来自目标区域的末端或其外侧的序列信息,设计与待扩增的模板的反向链序列相同或相似的寡核苷酸引物。 PCR可用于扩增来自DNA和RNA的特定序列,包括来自全基因组DNA或全细胞RNA的序列。 引物典型地为14～40个核苷酸长,但可以为10个核苷酸～数百个核苷酸长。 PCR描述于例如PCR Primer：A Laboratory Manual,Dieffenbach和Dveksler编辑,Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Press,1995。 核酸也可以通过连接酶链式反应、链置换扩增、自主序列复制或基于扩增的核酸序列的扩增来扩增。 参见例如Lewis（1992）Genetic Engineering News,12：1； Guatelli等人,（1990）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,87：1874； 和Weiss（1991）Science,254：1292。 在囊胚阶段,可以单独处理胚胎以通过PCR、Southern杂交和Springkeret PCR进行分析（参见,例如,Dupuy等人,Proc Natl Acad Sci USA（2002）99：4495）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  例えば、外因性核酸配列は、ポリペプチドをコードする核酸に対するＲＮＡ干渉を誘導し得る。例えば、標的ＤＮＡと相同な二本鎖小分子干渉ＲＮＡ（ｓｉＲＮＡ）または小分子ヘアピンＲＮＡ（ｓｈＲＮＡ）を使用してそのＤＮＡの発現を低減させることができる。ｓｉＲＮＡのための構築物は、例えば、Ｆｉｒｅ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９８）Ｎａｔｕｒｅ，３９１：８０６；Ｒｏｍａｎｏ  ａｎｄ  Ｍａｓｉｎｏ（１９９２）Ｍｏｌ．Ｍｉｃｒｏｂｉｏｌ．，６：３３４３；Ｃｏｇｏｎｉ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（１９９６）ＥＭＢＯ  Ｊ．，１５：３１５３；Ｃｏｇｏｎｉ  ａｎｄ  Ｍａｓｉｎｏ（１９９９）Ｎａｔｕｒｅ，３９９：１６６；Ｍｉｓｑｕｉｔｔａ  ａｎｄ  Ｐａｔｅｒｓｏｎ（１９９９）Ｐｒｏｃ．Ｎａｔｌ．Ａｃａｄ．Ｓｃｉ．ＵＳＡ，９６：１４５１；およびＫｅｎｎｅｒｄｅｌｌ  ａｎｄ  Ｃａｒｔｈｅｗ（１９９８）Ｃｅｌｌ，９５：１０１７に記載のとおり生産することができる。ｓｈＲＮＡのための構築物は、ＭｃＩｎｔｙｒｅ  ａｎｄ  Ｆａｎｎｉｎｇ（２００６）ＢＭＣ  Ｂｉｏｔｅｃｈｎｏｌｏｇｙ，６：１により記載されているとおりに生産することができる。一般に、ｓｈＲＮＡは、アニールし、短鎖ヘアピンを形成し得る相補的領域を含有する一本鎖ＲＮＡ分子として転写される。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>例如,外源核酸序列可诱导RNA干扰编码多肽的核酸。 例如,与靶DNA同源的双链小干扰RNA（siRNA）或小发夹RNA（shRNA）可用于减少DNA的表达。 siRNA的构建体描述于例如Fire等人,（1998）Nature,391：806； Romano和Masino（1992）Mol.Microbiol.,6:33 43； Cogoni等人,（1996）EMBO J.,15:31 53； Cogoni和Masino（1999）Nature,399：166； Misquitta和Paterson（1999）Proc.Natl.Acad.Sci.USA,96：1451； 和Kennerdell和Carthew（1998）Cell,95：1017。 shRNA的构建体可以如McIntyre and Fanning（2006）BMC Biotechnology,6：1所述产生。 通常,shRNA被转录为单链RNA分子,其含有可以退火并形成短发夹的互补区域。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
  家畜において、多くのアレルが、種々の形質、例えば、生産形質、体型形質、作業性形質、および他の機能的形質に結びつけられることが公知である。当業者はこれらの形質を監視し、定量化することに慣れている、例えば、Ｖｉｓｓｃｈｅｒ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，Ｌｉｖｅｓｔｏｃｋ  Ｐｒｏｄｕｃｔｉｏｎ  Ｓｃｉｅｎｃｅ，（１９９４）４０：１２３－１３７、米国特許第７，７０９，２０６号明細書、米国特許出願公開第２００１／００１６３１５号明細書、米国特許出願公開第２０１１／００２３１４０号明細書、および米国特許出願公開第２００５／０１５３３１７号明細書。動物系統は、生産形質、体型形質、作業性形質、受精能形質、母性形質、および疾患耐性形質からなる群の形質から選択される形質を含み得る。さらなる形質としては、組換え遺伝子産物の発現が挙げられる。実施形態は、１つ以上のそのような形質、または遺伝子導入された形質を有する動物を選択し、標識精子を含むようにそのゲノムを改変することを含む。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在家畜中,已知许多等位基因与各种性状相关,例如生产性状、体型性状、工作性状和其他功能性状。 本领域技术人员熟悉监测和定量这些性状,例如Visscher等人,Livestock Production Science,（1994）40：123-137、美国专利号7,709,206、美国专利申请公开号2001/0016315、美国专利申请公开号2011/0023140和美国专利申请公开号2005/0153317。 动物品系可以包括选自由以下组成的组的性状的性状：生产性状、体型性状、工作性状、生育力性状、母性性状和疾病抗性性状。 另外的性状包括重组基因产物的表达。 实施方案包括选择具有一种或多种这样的性状或转基因性状的动物并修饰其基因组以包括标记的精子。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 参考文献
detail.c_origin:
<base:Paragraphs>
実施例２：単および両アレルＫＯクローンの単離。
  Ｃａｒｌｓｏｎ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，２０１２は、トランスジェニック初代線維芽細胞を効率的に拡張させ、非トランスジェニック線維芽細胞（フィーダー細胞）と標準的密度（＞１５０個の細胞／ｃｍ<base:Sup>２</base:Sup>）においてプレーティングし、上記に適用されるトランスポゾン同時選択技術を使用する薬物選択に供した場合にコロニーとして単離する家畜における標的遺伝子の改変を記載している（Ｃａｒｌｓｏｎ  ｅｔ  ａｌ．，（２０１１）Ｔｒａｎｓｇｅｎｉｃ  Ｒｅｓ．，２０：１１２５および２０１２年５月９日に出願された米国特許出願公開第２０１２／０２２００３７号明細書）。これらの技術は、動物をクローン化するために使用することができる体細胞の遺伝子変化の作製に有用である。
</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>实施例2：单等位基因和双等位基因KO克隆的分离。 Carlson等人,2012描述了家畜中的靶基因的修饰,其中转基因原代成纤维细胞有效扩增,与非转基因成纤维细胞（饲养细胞）以标准密度（>150个细胞/cm<base:Sup>2</base:Sup>）铺板,并且当使用上文应用的转座子共选择技术进行药物选择时,作为集落分离（Carlson等人,（2011）Transgenic Res.,20:11 25和2012年5月9日提交的美国专利申请公开号2012/0220037）。 这些技术可用于产生可用于克隆动物的体细胞遗传改变。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To provide a nonionic powdery detergent free from oozing of a liquid nonionic surfactant at ambient temperature and having excellent powder fluidity and non-caking properties and a solubility which is not deteriorated with time.<P><P>The nonionic powdery detergent composition comprises (a) 12 to 35% by weight of a nonionic surfactant having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB in the range of 9.0 to 16.0,<P><P>(b) 10 to 60% by weight of a crystalline aluminosilicate and<P><P>(c) 5 to 20% by weight of an amorphous oil-absorbing carrier containing at least 30% by weight of silicon (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state and having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0.5 g or below.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明提供一种在环境温度下不会渗出液体非离子表面活性剂并具有优异的粉末流动性和不结块性能以及不随时间劣化的溶解度的非离子粉状洗涤剂。所述非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物包含：（a）12-35重量%的熔点不高于40℃的非离子表面活性剂； <P><P>>(b)10-60重量%的结晶铝硅酸盐和<P><P>>(c)5-20重量%的无定形吸油载体，所述无定形吸油载体相对于所述无水状态的载体的重量含有至少30重量%的硅（以SiO2计）并具有至少80ml/100g的吸油容量，所述载体产生具有至少9的pH或以0.5g或更低的量可溶于2%NaOH水溶液的分散体。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>15. A nonionic powder detergent composition comprising (a) 12 to 35% by weight of a polyoxyethylene alkyl ether having 10 to 20 carbon atoms, an average molar number of added ethylene oxide of 5 to 15 and a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C., (b) 10 to 60% by weight of a crystalline aluminosilicate, (c) 5 to 20% by weight of an amorphous oil- absorbing carrier selected from the group consisting of silica and aluminosilicates (c-1) containing at least 30% by weight of silicon in terms of SiO.sub.2, (c-2) having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier (c-3) giving a dispersion with a pH value of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0.  5 g or less and (d) below 5% by weight of sodium silicate, obtained by a process comprising the steps of:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>15. 一种非离子粉末洗涤剂组合物，其包含：（a）12-35重量%的聚氧乙烯烷基醚，其具有10-20个碳原子，平均加成环氧乙烷摩尔数为5-15，熔点不高于40℃； （c）5-20重量%的选自二氧化硅和硅铝酸盐的无定形吸油载体（c-1），其含有以SiO2计至少30重量%的硅，（c-2）具有至少80ml/100g的吸油能力，所述载体（c-3）得到pH值至少为9的分散体或以0。 (d)低于5重量%的硅酸钠，其通过包括以下步骤的方法获得：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The agent even more preferably comprises a mixture of 40-60% by weight of constituent C1 and 60-40% by weight of constituent C2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>该试剂甚至更优选包含40-60重量%的组分C1和60-40重量%的组分C2的混合物。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The oil-absorbing carriers used as the component (c) in the present invention include amorphous silica and aluminosilicates containing at least 30% by weight, preferably at least 40% by weight and more preferably at least 70% by weight (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state, of silicon, having an oil- absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, preferably at least 150 ml/100 g and more preferably at least 200 ml/100 g, and giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 (test method: JIS K 6220). Amorphous silica and aluminosilicates having an average particle diameter of up to around 200 &mgr; are available on the market, and the carrier of the present invention may be selected therefrom. Examples of such an oil- absorbing amorphous silica include Tokusil AL-1 (mfd. by Tokuyama Soda Co.  , Ltd.), Nipsil NA (mfd. by Nippon Silica Ind.), Carplex #100 (mfd. by Shionogi Pharmacy) and Sipernat D10 (Degussa AG.). Examples of the oil- absorbing amorphous aluminosilicate include an oil-absorbing carrier available on the market under a trade name of Tixolex 25 (Kofran Chemical) . The oil-absorbing carriers satisfying the above- described conditions are also found in clayey substances and they include sodium mordenite HSZ- 640 NAA (mfd. by Tosoh Corp.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在本发明中用作组分（c）的吸油载体包括无定形二氧化硅和硅铝酸盐，相对于无水状态的所述载体的重量，其含有至少30重量%，优选至少40重量%，更优选至少70重量%（以SiO2计）的硅，其吸油能力为至少80ml/100g，优选至少150 ml/100g，更优选至少200 ml/100g，并得到pH为至少9的分散体（测试方法：JIS K 6220）。 无定形二氧化硅和铝硅酸盐，其平均粒径高达约200μm； 本发明的载体可以在市场上获得，并且本发明的载体可以从中选择。 这种吸油无定形二氧化硅的实例包括Tokusil AL-1（由Tokuyama Soda Co.，Ltd.制造）、Nipsil NA（由Nippon Silica Ind.制造）、Carplex#100（由Shionogi Pharmacy制造）和Sipernat D 10（Degussa AG.）。 吸油无定形硅铝酸盐的实例包括在市场上以商品名Tixolex 25(Kofran Chemical）可获得的吸油载体。 满足上述条件的吸油载体也存在于粘土状物质中，它们包括丝光沸石钠HSZ-640 NAA（Tosoh Corp.制造）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To provide a nonionic powdery detergent free from oozing of a liquid nonionic surfactant at ambient temperature and having excellent powder fluidity and non-caking properties and a solubility which is not deteriorated with time.<P><P>The nonionic powdery detergent composition comprises (a) 12 to 35% by weight of a nonionic surfactant having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB in the range of 9.0 to 16.0,<P><P>(b) 10 to 60% by weight of a crystalline aluminosilicate and<P><P>(c) 5 to 20% by weight of an amorphous oil-absorbing carrier containing at least 30% by weight of silicon (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state and having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0.5 g or below.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明提供一种在环境温度下不会渗出液体非离子表面活性剂并具有优异的粉末流动性和不结块性能以及不随时间劣化的溶解度的非离子粉状洗涤剂。所述非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物包含：（a）12-35重量%的熔点不高于40℃的非离子表面活性剂； <P><P>>(b)10-60重量%的结晶铝硅酸盐和<P><P>>(c)5-20重量%的无定形吸油载体，所述无定形吸油载体相对于所述无水状态的载体的重量含有至少30重量%的硅（以SiO2计）并具有至少80ml/100g的吸油容量，所述载体产生具有至少9的pH或以0.5g或更低的量可溶于2%NaOH水溶液的分散体。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The oil-absorbing carriers used as the component (c) in the present invention include amorphous silica and aluminosilicates containing at least 30% by weight, preferably at least 40% by weight and more preferably at least 70% by weight (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state, of silicon, having an oil- absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, preferably at least 150 ml/100 g and more preferably at least 200 ml/100 g, and giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 (test method: JIS K 6220). Amorphous silica and aluminosilicates having an average particle diameter of up to around 200 &mgr; are available on the market, and the carrier of the present invention may be selected therefrom. Examples of such an oil- absorbing amorphous silica include Tokusil AL-1 (mfd. by Tokuyama Soda Co.  , Ltd.), Nipsil NA (mfd. by Nippon Silica Ind.), Carplex #100 (mfd. by Shionogi Pharmacy) and Sipernat D10 (Degussa AG.). Examples of the oil- absorbing amorphous aluminosilicate include an oil-absorbing carrier available on the market under a trade name of Tixolex 25 (Kofran Chemical) . The oil-absorbing carriers satisfying the above- described conditions are also found in clayey substances and they include sodium mordenite HSZ- 640 NAA (mfd. by Tosoh Corp.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在本发明中用作组分（c）的吸油载体包括无定形二氧化硅和硅铝酸盐，相对于无水状态的所述载体的重量，其含有至少30重量%，优选至少40重量%，更优选至少70重量%（以SiO2计）的硅，其吸油能力为至少80ml/100g，优选至少150 ml/100g，更优选至少200 ml/100g，并得到pH为至少9的分散体（测试方法：JIS K 6220）。 无定形二氧化硅和铝硅酸盐，其平均粒径高达约200μm； 本发明的载体可以在市场上获得，并且本发明的载体可以从中选择。 这种吸油无定形二氧化硅的实例包括Tokusil AL-1（由Tokuyama Soda Co.，Ltd.制造）、Nipsil NA（由Nippon Silica Ind.制造）、Carplex#100（由Shionogi Pharmacy制造）和Sipernat D 10（Degussa AG.）。 吸油无定形硅铝酸盐的实例包括在市场上以商品名Tixolex 25(Kofran Chemical）可获得的吸油载体。 满足上述条件的吸油载体也存在于粘土状物质中，它们包括丝光沸石钠HSZ-640 NAA（Tosoh Corp.制造）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When an oil-absorbing carrier comprising at least 30% by weight, particularly at least 70% by weight, of SiO.sub.2 versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state and giving a dispersion with a pH of below 9.0 is stored at a particularly high humidity, the dispersibility and solubility of the detergent are seriously deteriorated. Supposedly this is because the oil-absorbing carrier containing SiO.sub.2 and giving a dispersion with a pH of below 9.0 is dissolved in an alkaline free water formed during storage of the detergent to form sodium silicate having a high SiO.sub.2 content, which acts as the binder for zeolite to inhibit the dispersion and solubility of the detergent.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当在特别高的湿度下储存包含相对于无水状态的所述载体的重量至少30重量%，特别是至少70重量%的SiO2并得到pH低于9.0的分散体的吸油载体时，洗涤剂的分散性和溶解性严重劣化。 据推测，这是因为含有SiO2并得到pH低于9.0的分散体的吸油载体溶解在洗涤剂储存期间形成的无碱水中，形成SiO2含量高的硅酸钠，其作为沸石的粘合剂以抑制洗涤剂的分散和溶解性。</base:Paragraphs>

Those comprising 35% by weight or less, or preferably 25% by weight or less, of 0 to 3 mol of ethylene oxide added are preferred.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above-described powdery starting materials [tallow soap, zeolite A (in an amount corresponding to 25% by weight), amorphous aluminosilicate, sodium carbonate (average particle diameter: 290 . mu.), No. 2 sodium silicate, Glauber's salt, carboxymethylcellulose, sodium polyacrylate and fluororescent dye] were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 mfd. by Irie Shokai).  Polyoxyethylene dodecyl ether and coconut oil fatty acid diethanolamide were gradually introduced thereinto and then molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 402 &mgr;. The enzyme, perfume and a small amount (corresponding to 15% by weight) of zeolite A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition described above and a bulk density of 0.75 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将上述粉状原料[牛脂皂、沸石A（其量相当于25重量%)、无定形硅铝酸盐、碳酸钠（平均粒径:290μm)、2号硅酸钠、芒硝、羧甲基纤维素、聚丙烯酸钠和荧光染料]置于间歇式捏合机（由Irie Shokai制造的台式捏合机PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐引入聚氧乙烯十二烷基醚和椰子油脂肪酸二乙醇酰胺，然后向其中加入熔融的聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为402μm的粉状洗涤剂基料。 向其中加入酶、香料和少量（相当于15重量%）沸石A并混合在一起，得到具有上述组成和体积密度为0.75g/ml的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

Amorphous silica and aluminosilicates having an average particle diameter of up to around 200 &mgr; are available on the market, and the carrier of the present invention may be selected therefrom. Examples of such an oil- absorbing amorphous silica include Tokusil AL-1 (mfd. by Tokuyama Soda Co.  , Ltd.), Nipsil NA (mfd. by Nippon Silica Ind.), Carplex #100 (mfd. by Shionogi Pharmacy) and Sipernat D10 (Degussa AG.). detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When an oil-absorbing carrier comprising at least 30% by weight, particularly at least 70% by weight, of SiO.sub.2 versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state and giving a dispersion with a pH of below 9.0 is stored at a particularly high humidity, the dispersibility and solubility of the detergent are seriously deteriorated. Supposedly this is because the oil-absorbing carrier containing SiO.sub.2 and giving a dispersion with a pH of below 9.0 is dissolved in an alkaline free water formed during storage of the detergent to form sodium silicate having a high SiO.sub.2 content, which acts as the binder for zeolite to inhibit the dispersion and solubility of the detergent.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当在特别高的湿度下储存包含相对于无水状态的所述载体的重量至少30重量%，特别是至少70重量%的SiO2并得到pH低于9.0的分散体的吸油载体时，洗涤剂的分散性和溶解性严重劣化。 据推测，这是因为含有SiO2并得到pH低于9.0的分散体的吸油载体溶解在洗涤剂储存期间形成的无碱水中，形成SiO2含量高的硅酸钠，其作为沸石的粘合剂以抑制洗涤剂的分散和溶解性。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The powdery detergent was placed in a Petri dish and left to stand at 30&deg; C. and 70% RH for 3 days and 0.83 g of the detergent was taken as the sample, which was added to 1 l of city water at 10. degree.  C. and the solution was stirred with a magnetic stirrer for 10 min and filtered through a 200-mesh metal gauze. After drying, the filtration residue rate (%) was determined.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将粉末状洗涤剂置于培养皿中并在30℃下静置； 并且取0.83g洗涤剂作为样品，将其在10℃下添加到1L城市水中。 学位 将溶液用磁力搅拌器搅拌10分钟，并通过200目金属网过滤。 干燥后，测定过滤残留物率（%）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3 % by weight of tallow soap, zeolite 4A in an amount as specified in Table 2, an oil-absorbing carrier having properties as specified in Table 1 (wherein the pH of 5% dispersion was determined according to JIS K 6220) in an amount as specified in Table 2, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.  5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol having an average molecular weight of 12000 was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 385 &mgr;.  Further 0.54 by weight of an enzyme, 0.3% by weight of a perfume and 5% by weight of zeolite 4A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition as specified in Table 2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>3重量%的牛脂皂、表2中规定的量的沸石4A、表2中规定的量的具有表1中规定的性质的吸油载体（其中5%分散体的pH根据JIS K 6220测定）、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.1重量%的聚丙烯酸钠。 将5重量%荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的Bench Kneader PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐加入液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的平均分子量为12000的熔融聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为385微米的粉状洗涤剂基料。 此外，向其中加入0.54重量%的酶、0.3重量%的香料和5重量%的沸石4A并混合在一起，以获得具有表2中指定的组成的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3% by weight of tallow soap, zeolite 4A [component (b)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, an oil-absorbing carrier [component (c)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant in an amount as specified in Table 6 was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 385 &mgr;.0.5% by weight of an enzyme, 0.3% by weight of a perfume and 5% by weight of zeolite 4A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a nonionic powdery detergent having a bulk density of 0.7 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将3重量%的牛脂皂、表6中规定量的沸石4A[组分（b）]、表6中规定量的吸油载体[组分（c）]、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.5重量%的荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的台式捏合机PNV-1）中。 向其中逐渐加入表6中规定量的液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的熔融聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为385微米的粉状洗涤剂基料。向其中加入0.5重量%的酶、0.3重量%的香料和5重量%的沸石4A，混合在一起，得到堆积密度为0.7克/毫升的非离子粉状洗涤剂。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3 % by weight of tallow soap, zeolite A in an amount as specified in Table 4, an oil-absorbing carrier having properties as specified in Table 3 (wherein the oil-absorbing capacity was determined according to JIS K 6220) in an amount as specified in Table 4, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.  5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant in an amount as specified in Table 4 was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol having an average molecular weight of 6000 was added thereto. Further 0.5% by weight of an enzyme, 0. 3% by weight of a perfume, 5% by weight of zeolite A and 2% by weight of water were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product, having 11 composition as specified in Table 4.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>3重量%的牛脂皂、表4中规定的量的沸石A、表4中规定的量的具有表3中规定的性质的吸油载体（其中吸油能力根据JIS K 6220测定）、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.1重量%的牛脂皂、表4中规定的量的沸石A、表4中规定的量的具有表3中规定的性质的吸油载体（其中吸油能力根据JIS K 6220测定）、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.1重量%的牛脂皂。 将5重量%荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的Bench Kneader PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐引入表4中规定量的液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的平均分子量为6000的熔融聚乙二醇。 另外0.5重量%的酶。 向其中加入3重量%的香料、5重量%的沸石A和2重量%的水并混合在一起以获得具有表4中指定的组成的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3 % by weight of tallow soap, zeolite A in an amount as specified in Table 5, an oil-absorbing carrier (amorphous aluminosilicate) in an amount as specified in Table 5, the balance of sodium carbonate, 1% by weight of No. 2 sodium silicate, 2% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant in an amount as specified in Table 5 was slowly introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto, Further 0. 5% by weight of an enzyme, 0.5% by weight of a perfume, 5% by weight of zeolite A and 2% by weight of water were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition as specified in Table 5.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将3重量%的牛脂皂、表5中规定量的沸石A、表5中规定量的吸油载体（无定形硅铝酸盐）、余量的碳酸钠、1重量%的2号硅酸钠、2重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.5重量%的荧光染料置于间歇捏合机（Irie Shokai的台式捏合机PNV-1)中。 向其中缓慢引入表5中指定量的液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的熔融聚乙二醇，进一步加入0。 向其中加入5重量%的酶、0.5重量%的香料、5重量%的沸石A和2重量%的水并混合在一起以获得具有表5中指定的组成的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>700 g of an aqueous sodium silicate solution (Na.sub.2 O: 2.71% by weight, SiO.sub.2 :8.29% by weight and SiO.sub.2 /Na.sub.2 O molar ratio: 3.15) was heated to 60&deg; C. and 1010 g of an aqueous sodium aluminate solution (Na.sub.2 O:1.63% by weight, Al.sub.2 O.sub.3 :2. 26% by weight and Na.sub.2 O/Al.sub.2 O.sub.3 molar ratio: 1.18) was added to the solution under stirring at 1500 rpm. After the completion of the addition, the solution was heat-treated at that temperature for 15 min and the resulting wet cake was dried at 110&deg; C. and pulverized to obtain 100 g of fine powder of the aluminosilicate which was found to be amorphous by X-ray crystallography. The composition of the resulting amorphous aluminosilicate was: Na.sub.2 O:SiO.sub.2 :Al.sub.2 O.sub. 3 =29.4:44.5:26.1. The resulting amorphous aluminosilicate had an ion- exchange capacity of 121 CaCO.sub.3 mg/g, an oil-absorbing capacity of 225 ml/100 g, and a solubility in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution of 0. 01 g, and the pH of a 5% dispersion thereof was 11.2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将700g硅酸钠水溶液(Na2O:2.71重量%，SiO2:8.29重量%和SiO2/Na2O摩尔比：3.15）加热至60℃； 然后在1500rpm搅拌下将1010g铝酸钠水溶液(Na2O:1.63重量%，Al2O3:2.26重量%和Na2O/Al2O3摩尔比：1.18）加入到溶液中。 添加完成后，将溶液在该温度下热处理15min，并将所得湿滤饼在110℃下干燥； C.并粉碎，得到100 g硅铝酸盐细粉，通过X-射线结晶学发现其为无定形的。 所得无定形硅铝酸盐的组成为:Na2O:SiO2:Al2O3。 3=29.4:44.5:26.1。 所得无定形硅铝酸盐的离子交换容量为121CaCO3mg/g，吸油容量为225ml/100g，在2%NaOH水溶液中的溶解度为0.1。 并且其5%分散体的pH为11.2。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above-described powdery starting materials [tallow soap, zeolite A (in an amount corresponding to 25% by weight), amorphous aluminosilicate, sodium carbonate (average particle diameter: 290 . mu.), No. 2 sodium silicate, Glauber's salt, carboxymethylcellulose, sodium polyacrylate and fluororescent dye] were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 mfd. by Irie Shokai).  Polyoxyethylene dodecyl ether and coconut oil fatty acid diethanolamide were gradually introduced thereinto and then molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 402 &mgr;. The enzyme, perfume and a small amount (corresponding to 15% by weight) of zeolite A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition described above and a bulk density of 0.75 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将上述粉状原料[牛脂皂、沸石A（其量相当于25重量%)、无定形硅铝酸盐、碳酸钠（平均粒径:290μm)、2号硅酸钠、芒硝、羧甲基纤维素、聚丙烯酸钠和荧光染料]置于间歇式捏合机（由Irie Shokai制造的台式捏合机PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐引入聚氧乙烯十二烷基醚和椰子油脂肪酸二乙醇酰胺，然后向其中加入熔融的聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为402μm的粉状洗涤剂基料。 向其中加入酶、香料和少量（相当于15重量%）沸石A并混合在一起，得到具有上述组成和体积密度为0.75g/ml的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 百分比校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3% by weight of tallow soap, zeolite 4A [component (b)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, an oil-absorbing carrier [component (c)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant in an amount as specified in Table 6 was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 385 &mgr;.0.5% by weight of an enzyme, 0.3% by weight of a perfume and 5% by weight of zeolite 4A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a nonionic powdery detergent having a bulk density of 0.7 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将3重量%的牛脂皂、表6中规定量的沸石4A[组分（b）]、表6中规定量的吸油载体[组分（c）]、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.5重量%的荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的台式捏合机PNV-1）中。 向其中逐渐加入表6中规定量的液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的熔融聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为385微米的粉状洗涤剂基料。向其中加入0.5重量%的酶、0.3重量%的香料和5重量%的沸石4A，混合在一起，得到堆积密度为0.7克/毫升的非离子粉状洗涤剂。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The prediction of a steady, incompressible fluid flow over a large- scale flow field is an invaluable design tool. A well-known method of achieving such prediction is the solving of the Navier Stokes equations, shown below: ##EQU1## where V=V(u,v,w) is the vector velocity field containing the x, y, and z component of velocity, P is the fluid pressure, &ngr; is the kinematic fluid viscosity, and p is the constant fluid density. &nabla; indicates the divergence or gradient of a vector of scaler field respectively, and &nabla;.sup.2 indicates the vector Laplacian. The D/Dt expression is the symbol for the substantial derivative and the symbol &quot;t&quot; represents time.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>预测定常不可压缩流体在大尺寸流场上的流动是一种宝贵的设计工具。 实现这种预测的一种众所周知的方法是求解纳维尔-斯托克斯方程，如下所示：其中，v=v（u，v，w）是包含速度的x、y和z分量的矢量速度场，P是流体压力，kNgr； 是运动流体粘度，并且ρ是恒定流体密度。 &nabla； 表示定标器场的向量的散度或梯度，并且表示向量拉普拉斯算子。 D/Dt表达式是实质导数的符号和符号“t”。 代表时间。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In order to overcome this problem, a method called pseudocompressibility was introduced by A. J. Chorin in &quot;A Numerical Method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems&quot;, J. Comp. Physics, Vol. 2, pp. 12-16, 1967, to alter the incompressible equations shown above to the form shown in equations (3) and (4) below: ##EQU2## The difference between equations (1) and (2) and (3) and (4) can be seen as the addition of the &part;&rgr;/&part;t term in the conservation of fluid mass equation. This term is used to change the mathematical representation of the fluid equations, such that they can be solved easier and more directly. However, by adding the pressure time derivative term, the fluid behavior that these equations describe has been changed. In equations (1) and (2) the &quot;t&quot; symbol represents true physical time. In equation (3) and (4) &quot;t&quot; no longer represents time; it is only a mathematical iteration parameter used to allow the more straight forward solution method. A solution to equations (3) and (4) will provide only steady incompressible flow fields. If the original equations (1) and (2) were solved, unsteady flow fields could also be predicted. Therefore in the following technique described, the resulting flow fields predicted by the method discussed will be solutions for steady incompressible flow fields only.  The equations (1) and (2) are known as the incompressible Navier Stokes equations.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了克服这个问题，A.J.Chorin在“A Numerical method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems”，J.Comp.Chem.Soc.1990，28，289中引入了一种称为拟压缩性的方法。 等式（1）和（2）以及（3）和（4）之间的差异可以看作是在流体质量守恒等式中增加了项。 该术语用于改变流体方程的数学表示，使得它们可以更容易且更直接地求解。 然而，通过添加压力时间微分项，这些方程描述的流体行为已经改变。 在等式（1）和（2）中 符号代表真实的物理时间。 在等式（3）和（4）中，“t” 不再代表时间； 它只是用于允许更直接的解方法的数学迭代参数。 方程（3）和（4）的解将仅提供稳定的不可压缩流场。 如果求解原始方程（1）和(2)，也可以预测非定常流场。 因此，在所描述的以下技术中，由所讨论的方法预测的所得流场将仅是稳定的不可压缩流场的解。 方程（1）和（2）被称为不可压缩纳维尔-斯托克斯方程。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As mentioned above, the multiblock technique involves two processes.  The first involves the generation of a grid model consisting of a plurality of nodes defining a given geometry and the second is the dividing of the grid into computer manageable blocks. The method of the present invention assumes that a grid model is provided. Indeed, several grid generation software tools exist which perform this task. One such tool is the EAGLE program developed by Professor Joseph Thompson in &quot;A Composite Grid Generation Code for General 3-dimensional Regions--The EAGLE Code&quot;, AIAA J., Vol. 26, No. 3, p. 271, March 1988, and is herein incorporated by reference for illustration.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如上所述，多块技术涉及两个过程。 第一种涉及生成由限定给定几何形状的多个节点组成的网格模型，第二种是将网格划分为计算机可管理的块。 本发明的方法假设提供网格模型。 实际上，存在执行该任务的若干网格生成软件工具。 一种这样的工具是由Joseph Thompson教授在1988年3月在AIAA J.，Vol.26，No.3，p.271中开发的EAGLE程序，该程序通过引用结合于此以供说明。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As stated hereinbefore, the terminal blocks A, A', A&quot; and A'&quot; are derived from vinylaromatic compounds. Suitable vinylaromatic compounds are styrene, alpha-methyl styrene, vinyl toluene, vinyl xylene and vinyl naphthalene. A, A', A&quot; and A'&quot; may be equal or different.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如上所述，端基嵌段A，A′，A″ 和 衍生自乙烯基芳族化合物。 合适的乙烯基芳族化合物是苯乙烯、α-甲基苯乙烯、乙烯基甲苯、乙烯基二甲苯和乙烯基萘。 A，A′，A″ 和 可以是相同或不同的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>I.M. 2: a linear block copolymer A&quot;-B2-A'&quot;, wherein A&quot; and A'&quot; are polystyrene blocks having a number-averaged molecular weight of 16, 000 and B2 is an ethylene-butylene copolymer having a number-averaged molecular weight of 78,000, with a weight ratio of the styrene blocks to ethylene-butylene blocks of 30/70 and an average molecular weight by number of the block copolymer of about 110,000.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>I.M. 图2：线性嵌段共聚物A″-B2-A″，其中A″ 和 B2是数均分子量为16,000的聚苯乙烯嵌段，并且B2是数均分子量为78,000的乙烯-丁烯共聚物，其中苯乙烯嵌段与乙烯-丁烯嵌段的重量比为30/70，并且嵌段共聚物的数均分子量为约110,000。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Size control potential: Size of trees budded on the subject rootstocks will vary according to the vigor of the cultivar and/or type of soil and orchard management. &quot;Standard&quot; growing cultivars such as Red and Golden Delicious are reduced in size about 65% when compared to trees on apple seedling rootstocks.  Less vigorous varieties are more reduced in size and more vigorous varieties are less reduced in size.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>尺寸控制潜力：在主题砧木上出芽的树的尺寸将根据栽培种的活力和/或土壤类型和果园管理而变化。 标准 当与苹果幼苗砧木上的树相比时，生长的栽培种如红色和金色美味的尺寸减小约65%。 不太旺盛的品种尺寸减小得更多，而更旺盛的品种尺寸减小得更少。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Furthermore, the higher surface density of the catalytic seeds leads to a &quot;screening&quot; of the molybdenum layer and thereby avoids corrosion thereof.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>此外，催化种子的较高表面密度导致“筛分” 并且由此避免其腐蚀。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the control signal VDCE is in an &quot;H&quot; level, differential amplification circuit 20 is activated. Differential amplification circuit 20 compares the output voltage of level shifter circuit 40 to the reference voltage Vref from reference voltage generation circuit 10 and outputs a signal of an &quot;H&quot; or &quot;L&quot; level to node N3. When the output voltage of level shifter circuit 40 is lower than the reference voltage Vref from reference voltage generation circuit 10, a signal of &quot;L&quot; level is output to node N3. If the output voltage of level shifter circuit 40 is higher than the reference voltage Vref from reference voltage generation circuit 10, a signal of &quot;H&quot; level is output to node N3.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the control signal VDCE is in an &quot;L&quot; level, differential amplification circuit 20 is deactivated. In this case, transistor 201 is turned on, and node N3 is charged to &quot;H&quot;.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当控制信号VDCE处于“L”时 电平，差分放大电路20被去激活。 在这种情况下，晶体管201导通，并且节点N3被充电到“H”。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Driver circuit 30 is activated when the output signal of differential amplification circuit 20 is in an &quot;L&quot; level, and deactivated when the output signal of differential amplification circuit 20 is in an &quot;H&quot; level. An internal voltage Vint is supplied to power supply line L5 by driver circuit 30.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当差分放大电路20的输出信号为“L”时，驱动电路30被激活。 当差分放大电路20的输出信号处于“H”时，该输出信号被去激活。 水平。 内部电压Vint由驱动器电路30提供给电源线L5。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Level shifter circuit 40 is activated when the control signal /VDCE is in an &quot;L&quot; level, and deactivated when the control signal /VDCE is in an &quot;H&quot; level.  Level shifter circuit 40 resistance-divides the internal voltage Vint by the channel resistors R1 and R2 of transistors 401 and 402, and outputs the resistance-divided output voltage to node N5.  The output voltage is decided by the ratio of channel resistors R1 and R2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>电平移位器电路40在控制信号/VDCE处于“L”时被激活。 当控制信号/VDCE处于“H”状态时，该控制信号/VDCE被去激活，并且被去激活。 水平。 电平移位器电路40通过晶体管401和402的沟道电阻器R1和R2对内部电压Vint进行电阻分压，并将电阻分压的输出电压输出到节点N5。 输出电压由通道电阻R1和R2的比率决定。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Level shifter circuit 40 is activated when the control signal /VDCE is in an &quot;L&quot; level. The ratio of channel resistors R1 and R2 of transistors 401 and 402 is so set that an output voltage 2.7/4 times as large as the internal voltage Vint is supplied to node N5. In this case, if the internal voltage Vint is 4 V, the output voltage of node N5 is 2.  7 V.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当控制信号VDCE处于“H”时，差分放大电路20被激活。 水平。 参考电压生成电路10将电平移位器电路40的节点N5的输出电压与来自参考电压生成电路10的参考电压Vref(=2.7V)进行比较。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the output voltage of node N5 is smaller than 2.7 V, in other words when the internal voltage Vint is smaller than 4 V, the signal of node N3 attains an &quot;L&quot; level. Thus, transistor 301 in driver circuit 30 is turned on, and power supply line L5 is charged with the external power supply voltage Vext. As a result, the internal voltage Vint increases.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当节点N5的输出电压小于2.7V时，换句话说，当内部电压Vint小于4V时，节点N3的信号达到“I” 水平。 因此，驱动电路30中的晶体管301导通，并且电源线L5用外部电源电压Vext充电。 结果，内部电压Vint增加。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the row address strobe signal /RAS is in an &quot;H&quot; state, the semiconductor memory device attains a stand-by state, and when the row address strobe signal /RAS is an &quot;L&quot; state, the semiconductor memory device attains an active state. The sense amplifiers in memory array 3 are activated when the sense amplifier activation signal SE is an &quot;H&quot; state.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当行地址选通信号/RAS在“H”中时 当行地址选通信号/RAS为“L”时，半导体存储器件达到待机状态。 在该状态下，半导体存储器件达到激活状态。 当读出放大器激活信号SE是“H”时，存储器阵列3中的读出放大器被激活。 州。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the row address strobe signal /RAS is in an &quot;H&quot; state, the control signal VDCEP attains an &quot;L&quot; state, and the control signal /VDCEP attains an &quot;H&quot; level. As a result, internal down converter 1a is deactivated, and internal down converter 1b is activated. When the row address strobe signal /RAS is in an &quot;L&quot; state, the control signal VDCEP attains an &quot;H&quot; state, and the control signal /VDCEP attains an &quot;L&quot; state.  Thus, internal down converter 1a is activated while internal down converter 1b is deactivated.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当行地址选通信号/RAS在“H”中时 在该状态下，控制信号VDCEP达到“L”。 控制信号/VDCEP达到一个“H”状态，并且控制信号/VDCEP达到一个“H”状态。 水平。 结果，内部下变频器1a被去激活，并且内部下变频器1b被激活。 当行地址选通信号/RAS处于“L”时 在该状态下，控制信号VDCEP达到一个“H”。 控制信号/VDCEP达到一个“L”状态，并且控制信号/VDCEP达到一个“L”状态。 州。 因此，内部下变频器1a被激活，而内部下变频器1b被去激活。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When the sense amplifier activation signal SE is in an &quot;L&quot; state, the control signal VDCEM attains an &quot;L&quot; state and the control signal /VDCEM attains an &quot;H&quot; state. Thus, internal down converter 1c is deactivated, while internal down converter 1d is activated. When the sense amplifier activation signal SE attains an &quot;H&quot; level, the control signal VDCEM is pulled to an &quot;H&quot; level, and the control signal /VDCEM to an &quot;L&quot; level. Thus, internal down converter 1c is activated, while internal down converter 1d is deactivated.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Accordingly, when the control signal VDCEP is in an &quot;H&quot; state and the control signal /VDCEP &quot;L&quot;, the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1 (corresponding 1a in FIG. 4) shown in FIG. 1 are activated, and the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1b shown in FIG. 6 are deactivated. Conversely, when the control signal VDCEP is in an &quot;L&quot; state and the control signal /VDCEP is in an &quot;H&quot; state, the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1 (corresponding 1a in FIG. 4) shown in FIG. 1 are deactivated, while the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1b shown in FIG. 6 are activated.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>因此，当控制信号VDCEP处于“H”状态时， 当在状态和控制信号/VDCEP“L”的情况下，图1所示的内部下变频器1（对应于图4中的1a)的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被激活，并且图6所示的内部下变频器1b的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被去激活。 相反地，当控制信号VDCEP处于“L”时， 并且控制信号/VDCEP处于“H”状态。 在该状态下，图1所示的内部下变频器1（对应于图4中的1a)的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被去激活，而图6所示的内部下变频器1b的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被激活。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Accordingly, when the control signal VDCEP is in an &quot;H&quot; state and the control signal /VDCEP &quot;L&quot;, the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1 (corresponding 1a in FIG. 4) shown in FIG. 1 are activated, and the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1b shown in FIG. 6 are deactivated. Conversely, when the control signal VDCEP is in an &quot;L&quot; state and the control signal /VDCEP is in an &quot;H&quot; state, the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1 (corresponding 1a in FIG. 4) shown in FIG. 1 are deactivated, while the differential amplification circuit 20 and level shifter circuit 50 of internal down converter 1b shown in FIG. 6 are activated.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>因此，当控制信号VDCEP处于“H”状态时， 当在状态和控制信号/VDCEP“L”的情况下，图1所示的内部下变频器1（对应于图4中的1a)的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被激活，并且图6所示的内部下变频器1b的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被去激活。 相反地，当控制信号VDCEP处于“L”时， 并且控制信号/VDCEP处于“H”状态。 在该状态下，图1所示的内部下变频器1（对应于图4中的1a)的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被去激活，而图6所示的内部下变频器1b的差分放大电路20和电平移位器电路50被激活。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When a control signal VDCE of &quot;H&quot; level is applied, transistor 206 is turned on, and transistor 201 is turned off. Accordingly, the differential amplifier constituted by transistors 202 to 206 is activated, the conduction of driving transistor 301 is controlled by the output control voltage Vc from the differential amplifier. Thus, the level of the internal voltage (in other words internal power supply voltage) Vint is controlled to be the same as the reference voltage Vref applied from voltage selection circuit 90.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当控制信号VDCE为“H”时 当施加电平时，晶体管206导通，并且晶体管201截止。 因此，由晶体管202～206构成的差动放大器被激活，驱动晶体管301的导通由来自差动放大器的输出控制电压Vc控制。 因此，内部电压（换句话说，内部电源电压）Vint的电平被控制为与从电压选择电路90施加的参考电压Vref相同。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When a control signal VDCE of &quot;H&quot; level is applied, transistor 206 is turned on, and transistor 201 is turned off. Accordingly, the differential amplifier constituted by transistors 202 to 206 is activated, the conduction of driving transistor 301 is controlled by the output control voltage Vc from the differential amplifier. Thus, the level of the internal voltage (in other words internal power supply voltage) Vint is controlled to be the same as the reference voltage Vref applied from voltage selection circuit 90.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当控制信号VDCE为“H”时 当施加电平时，晶体管206导通，并且晶体管201截止。 因此，由晶体管202～206构成的差动放大器被激活，驱动晶体管301的导通由来自差动放大器的输出控制电压Vc控制。 因此，内部电压（换句话说，内部电源电压）Vint的电平被控制为与从电压选择电路90施加的参考电压Vref相同。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Meanwhile, when the control signal VDCE of &quot;L&quot; level is applied, transistor 201 is turned on, and transistor 206 is turned off.  Accordingly, the differential amplifier constituted by transistors 202 to 206 attains a non-activation state, and the control voltage Vc of &quot;H&quot; level is applied to the gate electrode of transistor 301. Since transistor 301 is turned off in response to the applied control voltage Vc, the internal voltage Vint is not output.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>同时，当控制信号VDCE为“L”时， 当施加电平时，晶体管201导通，并且晶体管206截止。 因此，由晶体管202至206构成的差分放大器达到非激活状态，并且“H”的控制电压Vc被施加到由晶体管202至206构成的差分放大器。 电平被施加到晶体管301的栅电极。 由于晶体管301响应于所施加的控制电压Vc而截止，因此不输出内部电压Vint。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The nonionic surfactant (a) used in the present invention is preferably one having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB value in the range of 9.0 to 16.0, and more preferably 9. 0 to 14.  0, from the viewpoints of the removal of dirt as well as foaming and rinsing properties. The term HLB as used herein refers to a value calculated by a method described in J. T. Davies and E. K. Rideal, &quot;Interfacial Phenomena&quot; (Academic Press, New York, 1963), pages 371 to 383.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用于本发明的非离子表面活性剂（a）优选是熔点不高于40℃； 并且HLB值在9.0至16.0的范围内，并且更优选9。 0至14。 从污垢的去除以及发泡和漂洗性能的角度来看，本发明的组合物可以具有更高的粘度。 本文所用的术语HLB是指通过J.T.Davies和E.K.Rideal，“Interfacial Phenomena”（界面现象）中描述的方法计算的值。 （Academic Press，New York，1963），第371-383页。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The nonionic powdery detergent composition of the present invention is desirably packed in a converted paper container, of which the inner walls are laminated with a polymer, to obtain a nonionic powdery detergent product. The polymers used for the lamination are preferably ones having a solubility parameter value of 7.5 to 11.5 [cal/cm.sup.3 ].sup.1/2, preferably 7.5 to 10.0 [cal/cm.sup.3 ].sup. 1/2 and more preferably 7.5 to 9.0 [cal/cm.sup.3 ].sup.1/2. The solubility parameter value of the polymer herein indicates a value defined in R. F. Fedors, &quot;Polymer Engineering and Science&quot;, 14. 147 (1974).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物理想地包装在转化的纸容器中，其内壁用聚合物层压，以获得非离子粉状洗涤剂产品。 用于层压的聚合物优选具有7.5至11.5[cal/cm3].sup.1/2，优选7.5至10.0[cal/cm3].sup.1/2的溶解度参数值的聚合物。 1/2且更优选7.5至9.0[cal/cm3].1/2。 本文中聚合物的溶解度参数值是指R.F.Fedors，“Polymer Engineering and Science”，14. 参见，例如，美国专利第147卷（1974）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The powder fluidity was determined according to &quot;Flow Rate&quot; of &quot;Flow Rate of Metal Powders&quot; described in ASTM: B213-48 by using a stand and a funnel specified in JIS K 3362 &quot;Testing Methods for Synthetic Detergent&quot;. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>粉末流动性根据“流速”测定。 金属粉末的流量 通过使用JIS K 3362“合成洗涤剂的测试方法”中规定的台架和漏斗，在ASTM B213-48中描述。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>粉末流动性根据“流速”测定。 金属粉末的流量 通过使用JIS K 3362“合成洗涤剂的测试方法”中规定的台架和漏斗，在ASTM B213-48中描述。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The following example sets forth the manner in which card 100 is utilized.  If the user has purchased groceries at a supermarket with a check, the user writes the check and activates the CHECK key on keyboard 101. Computer 113 is responsive to this activation to display the class, i.e. personal or business.  If the class displayed is correct, the user activates the OK key on keyboard 101. If the class is not accurate, the user activates the BUSINESS key on keyboard 101. If the BUSINESS key is activated, the class is toggled to the other classification. Computer 113 then determines if the designated class and category are valid for a check transaction. (The designated category is from a previous transaction.)  The validation consists of determining if there is a list in memory 114 for the selected class, type, and category. If the answer is no, computer 113 displays an error message in display 109 and allows the user to enter a valid category by use of the CATEGORY key which is described in the next paragraph. If a list is present, computer 113 displays the textual information defining this list. For example, if groceries was the designated category, computer 113 displays on display 109 the message &quot;personal-check-grocery&quot;. The user responds by activating the OK key. At this point in the operations, the smart card could also be programmed to request that the user enter the check number. Computer would also store the check number in the defined list. The user hands the smart card to the sales person who would insert it into a POS terminal.  The POS terminal transmits to the smart card via a smart card reader the date, payee, and amount. Computer 113 is responsive to this information that is communicated via signal interface 111 to store this information in the designated list.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>以下示例阐述了使用卡100的方式。 如果用户已经在超市购买了带有支票的杂货，则用户书写支票并激活键盘101上的CHECK键。 计算机113响应于该激活来显示类别，即个人或商务。 如果显示的类是正确的，则用户激活键盘101上的OK键。 如果类别不准确，则用户激活键盘101上的商务键。 如果业务键被激活，则类别被切换到另一类别。 然后，计算机113确定指定的类和类别对于支票交易是否有效。 （指定的类别来自先前的交易）验证包括确定存储器114中是否存在用于所选类别、类型和类别的列表。 如果答案为否，则计算机113在显示器109中显示错误消息，并允许用户通过使用下一段中描述的类别键来输入有效的类别。 如果存在列表，则计算机113显示定义该列表的文本信息。 例如，如果杂货是指定的类别，则计算机113在显示器109上显示消息“个人支票杂货”。 用户通过激活OK键来响应。 在操作的这一点上，智能卡也可以被编程以请求用户输入支票号码。 计算机还将校验号存储在定义的列表中。 用户将智能卡交给将其插入POS终端的销售人员。 POS终端通过智能卡阅读器向智能卡发送日期、收款人和金额。 计算机113响应于经由信号接口111传送的该信息，以将该信息存储在指定列表中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To set up the list in smart card 100, personal computer 340 performs the operations illustrated in FIG. 9. First the spreadsheet of FIG. 14 is searched from the first line to the last line looking for the first class line. A class line, such as line 1401, is designated by three &quot;#&quot;. A type line, such as line 1402, is designated by two &quot;#&quot;, and a category designated line is designated by each category having only one &quot;#&quot;. In addition, computer 340 maintains a table for the class, type, and categories which list the textual information for each with a unique number. These numbers are catenated to form the list pointer for each list. First, block 901 is executed to find the first class line of the spreadsheet. Next, the table of class numbers is searched to determine if this is a new class by decision block 902. If the answer is no, block 903 is executed which sets the class word equal to the old class number. If the answer is yes in decision block 902, block 904 assigns a new class number and sets the class word to that number. In addition, block 904 enters the new class number along with the textual information into the class table.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了在智能卡100中建立列表，个人计算机340执行图9所示的操作。 首先，从第一行到最后一行搜索图14的电子表格，以寻找第一类行。 一个类线，例如线1401，由三个“#”表示。 一个类型线，例如线1402，由两个“#”表示，而一个类别指定线由每个仅具有一个“#”的类别指定。 此外，计算机340维护用于类、类型和类别的表，其列出具有唯一编号的每一个的文本信息。 这些数字被链接以形成每个列表的列表指针。 首先，执行框901以找到电子表格的第一类行。 接下来，通过判定框902搜索类别号表以确定这是否是新类别。 如果答案为否，则执行块903，将类字设置为等于旧类号。 如果判定框902中的答案为是，则框904分配新的类编号并将类字设置为该编号。 此外，框904将新的类号与文本信息一起输入到类表中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Among the synthetic analogs of netropsin and distamycin are oligopeptides that have been designed to have sequence preferences different from their parent molecules. Such oligopeptides include the &quot;lexitropsin&quot; series of analogues. The N-methlypyrrole groups of the netropsin series were systematically replaced with N-methylimidazole residues, resulting in lexitropsins with increased and altered sequence specificities from the parent compounds (Kissinger, et al.). Further, a number of poly(N-methylpyrrolyl)-netropsin analogues have been designed and synthesized which extend the number of residues in the oligopeptides to increase the size of the binding site (Dervan, 1986).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在netropsin和偏端霉素的合成类似物中有寡肽，其被设计为具有与其母体分子不同的序列偏好。 这类寡肽包括来曲肽 一系列类似物。 netropsin系列的N-甲基吡咯基团被N-甲基咪唑残基系统地取代，导致来自母体化合物的序列特异性增加和改变的lexitropsins（Kissinger等人）。 此外，已经设计和合成了许多聚（N-甲基吡咯基）-netropsin类似物，其扩展了寡肽中的残基数以增加结合位点的大小(Dervan，1986)。</base:Paragraphs>

The N-methlypyrrole groups of the netropsin series were systematically replaced with N-methylimidazole residues, resulting in lexitropsins with increased and altered sequence specificities from the parent compounds (Kissinger, et al.). Further, a number of poly(N-methylpyrrolyl)-netropsin analogues have been designed and synthesized which extend the number of residues in the oligopeptides to increase the size of the binding site (Dervan, 1986).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在netropsin和偏端霉素的合成类似物中有寡肽，其被设计为具有与其母体分子不同的序列偏好。 这类寡肽包括来曲肽 一系列类似物。 netropsin系列的N-甲基吡咯基团被N-甲基咪唑残基系统地取代，导致来自母体化合物的序列特异性增加和改变的lexitropsins（Kissinger等人）。 此外，已经设计和合成了许多聚（N-甲基吡咯基）-netropsin类似物，其扩展了寡肽中的残基数以增加结合位点的大小(Dervan，1986)。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Adjacent is used to describe the distance relationship between two neighboring sites. Adjacent sites are 20 or less bp apart, and can be separated by any fewer number of bases including the situation where the sites are immediately abutting one another. &quot;Flanking&quot; is a synonym for adjacent.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>相邻用于描述两个相邻站点之间的距离关系。 相邻位点相隔20个或更少的bp，并且可以被任何更少数量的碱基分开，包括位点彼此直接邻接的情况。 侧翼 是相邻的同义词。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The results presented below in regard to the DNA-binding ability of the truncated UL9 protein suggest that full length DNA-binding proteins are not required for the DNA:protein assay of the present invention: only a portion of the protein containing the cognate site recognition function may be required.  The portion of a DNA-binding protein required for DNA- binding can be evaluated using a functional binding assay (Example 4A). The rate of dissociation can be evaluated (Example 4B) and compared to that of the full length DNA-binding protein.  However, any DNA-binding peptide, truncated or full length, may be used in the assay if it meets the criteria outlined in Section II.B.1, &quot;Criteria for choosing an appropriate DNA-binding protein&quot;. This remains true whether or not the truncated form of the DNA-binding protein has the same affinity as the full length DNA-binding protein.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>以下关于截短UL9蛋白的DNA结合能力的结果表明，本发明的DNA：蛋白质测定不需要全长DNA结合蛋白：可能仅需要含有同源位点识别功能的蛋白质的一部分。 DNA结合所需的DNA结合蛋白的部分可以使用功能性结合测定（实施例4A)来评估。 可以评估解离速率（实施例4B)并与全长DNA结合蛋白的解离速率进行比较。 然而，任何截短的或全长的DNA结合肽，如果它符合II.B.1节“选择合适的DNA结合蛋白的标准”中概述的标准，则可用于该测定。 无论截短形式的DNA结合蛋白是否具有与全长DNA结合蛋白相同的亲和力，这仍然是正确的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The full length UL9 and purified UL9-COOH proteins were tested for functional activity in &quot;band shift&quot; assays (see Example 4A). The buffer conditions were optimized for DNA:protein-binding (Example 4C) using the UL9-COOH polypeptide. These DNA-binding conditions also worked well for the full-length UL9 protein. Radiolabeled oligonucleotides (SEQ ID NO:614) that contained the 11 bp UL9 DNA-binding recognition sequence (SEQ ID NO:601) were mixed with each UL9 protein in appropriate binding buffer. The reactions were incubated at room temperature for 10 minutes (binding occurs in less than 2 minutes) and the products were separated electrophoretically on non-denaturing polyacrylamide gels (Example 4A).  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>测试全长UL9和纯化的UL9-COOH蛋白在“条带移位”中的功能活性。 测定（参见实施例4A)。 使用UL9-COOH多肽针对DNA：蛋白质结合（实施例4C)优化缓冲液条件。 这些DNA结合条件对于全长UL9蛋白也很好地起作用。 将含有11bp UL9 DNA结合识别序列（SEQ ID NO:601)的放射性标记的寡核苷酸（SEQ ID NO:614)与每种UL9蛋白在适当的结合缓冲液中混合。 将反应物在室温下温育10分钟（结合在小于2分钟内发生），并在非变性聚丙烯酰胺凝胶上电泳分离产物（实施例4A)。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>where &quot;z&quot; defines the difference in affinity for the DNA between P and X. For example, if z=4, then the affinity of the drug is 4- fold lower than the affinity of the protein for the DNA molecule. The concentration of X, therefore, must be 4-fold greater than the concentration of P, to compete equally for the DNA molecule. Thus, the equilibrium affinity constant of UL9 will define the minimum level of detection with respect to the concentration and/or affinity of the drug.  Low affinity DNA- binding molecules will be detected only at high concentrations; likewise, high affinity molecules can be detected at relatively low concentrations. With certain test sequences, complete inhibition of UL9 binding at markedly lower concentrations, than indicated by these analyses have been observed, probably indicating that certain sites among those chosen for feasibility studies have affinities higher than previously published. Note that relatively high concentrations of known drugs can be utilized for testing sequence specificity. In addition, the binding constant of UL9 can be readily lowered by altering the pH or salt concentration in the assay if it ever becomes desirable to screen for molecules that are found at low concentration (e.g., in a fermentation broth or extract).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>其中z 例如，如果z=4，则药物的亲和力比蛋白质对DNA分子的亲和力低4倍。 因此，X的浓度必须比P的浓度大4倍，以同等地竞争DNA分子。 因此，UL9的平衡亲和常数将定义相对于药物的浓度和/或亲和力的最低检测水平。 低亲和力DNA结合分子将仅在高浓度下检测到； 同样，可以在相对低的浓度下检测高亲和力分子。 对于某些测试序列，已经观察到在显著低于这些分析所示的浓度下UL9结合的完全抑制，可能表明选择用于可行性研究的那些位点中的某些位点具有高于先前公开的亲和力。 注意，相对高浓度的已知药物可用于测试序列特异性。 此外，如果期望筛选在低浓度下（例如，在发酵液或提取物中）发现的分子，则可以通过改变测定中的pH或盐浓度来容易地降低UL9的结合常数。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Samples from each cycle are sequenced using, for example, radio- labeled primers and dideoxy sequencing methodologies (Sanger) or the chemical methodologies outlined by Maxam and Gilbert. If the amplified sequences are not sufficiently resolved to obtain a unambiguous sequence information, then the DNA is further purified and sequenced. For example, the DNA is cleaved at the restriction endonuclease sites within the primer sequences and subcloned into a convenient sequencing vector, such as &quot;BLUESCRIPT&quot; (Stratagene, La Jolla, Calif.). The sequencing vectors carrying the amplified inserts are transformed into bacteria. The resulting cloned vectors are isolated and sequenced (in the case of &quot;BLUESCRIPT,&quot; using the commercially available primers and protocols).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>使用例如放射性标记的引物和双脱氧测序方法（Sanger）或Maxam和Gilbert概述的化学方法对来自每个循环的样品进行测序。 如果扩增的序列没有充分解析以获得明确的序列信息，则进一步纯化DNA并测序。 例如，在引物序列内的限制性内切酶位点切割DNA并将其亚克隆到方便的测序载体如“BLUESCRIPT”中。 （Stratagene,La Jolla,Calif.）。 将携带扩增的插入片段的测序载体转化到细菌中。 分离得到的克隆载体并测序（在“BLUESCRIPT”的情况下，使用市售引物和方案）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>For chemiluminescent detection, digoxigenin-labelled oligonucleotides (Example 1) can be detected using the chemiluminescent detection system &quot;SOUTHERN LIGHTS,&quot; developed by Tropix, Inc. (Bedord, Mass.). The detection system is diagrammed in FIGS. 11A and 11B. The technique can be applied to detect DNA that has been captured on either beads, filters, or in solution.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>对于化学发光检测，可以使用化学发光检测系统“SOUTHERN LIGHTS”检测地高辛标记的寡核苷酸（实施例1）。 由Tropix，Inc.（Bedord，Mass.)开发。 检测系统在图11A和11B中示出。 该技术可用于检测已捕获在珠粒、过滤器或溶液中的DNA。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Captured DNA was detected using the alkaline phosphatase- conjugated antibodies to digoxigenin as follows. One chemiluminescent substrate for alkaline phosphatase is 3-(2'-spiroadamantane)-4-methoxy-4- (3&quot;- phosphoryloxy) phenyl-1,2-dioxetane disodium salt (AMPPD) (Example 7) . Dephosphorylation of AMPPD results in an unstable compound, which decomposes, releasing a prolonged, steady emission of light at 477 nm.  Light measurement is very sensitive and can detect minute quantities of DNA (e.g., 10.sup.2 -10.sup.3 attomoles) (Example 7).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如下使用碱性磷酸酶缀合的地高辛抗体检测捕获的DNA。 碱性磷酸酶的一种化学发光底物是3-(2'-螺金刚烷）-4-甲氧基-4-(3″-磷酰氧基）苯基-1,2-二氧杂环丁烷二钠盐(AMPPD)（实施例7）。 AMPPD的脱磷酸化产生不稳定的化合物，其分解，在477nm处释放延长的、稳定的光发射。 光测量是非常灵敏的，并且可以检测微量的DNA（例如，10-10阿摩尔）（实施例7）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Second, DNA has a relatively more well-defined structure compared to RNA or protein. Since the general structure of DNA has less tertiary structural variation, identifying or designing specific binding molecules should be easier for DNA than for either RNA or protein. Double- stranded DNA is a repeating structure of deoxyribonucleotides that stack atop one another to form a linear helical structure. In this manner, DNA has a regularly repeating &quot;lattice&quot; structure that makes it particularly amenable to molecular modeling refinements and hence, drug design and development.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>其次，与RNA或蛋白质相比，DNA具有相对更明确定义的结构。 由于DNA的一般结构具有较少的三级结构变异，因此鉴定或设计特异性结合分子对于DNA应该比对于RNA或蛋白质更容易。 双链DNA是彼此堆叠以形成线性螺旋结构的脱氧核糖核苷酸的重复结构。 以这种方式，DNA具有规则重复的“网格” 这使得其特别适合于分子建模改进并因此适合于药物设计和开发。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>General applications of the assay include but are not limited to: screening libraries of unknown chemicals, either biological or synthetic compounds, for sequence-specific DNA-binding molecules, determining the sequence-specificity or preference and/or relative affinities of DNA- binding molecules, testing of modified derivatives of DNA-binding molecules for altered specificity or affinity, using the assay in secondary confirmatory or mechanistic experiments, using the data generated from the above applications to refine the predictive capabilities of molecular modeling systems, and using the refined molecular modeling systems to generate a new &quot;alphabet&quot; of DNA-binding subunits that can be polymerized to make novel heteropolymers designed de novo to bind specific DNA target sites.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>测定法的一般应用包括但不限于：筛选未知化学物质（生物或合成化合物）文库中的序列特异性DNA结合分子，确定DNA结合分子的序列特异性或偏好和/或相对亲和力，测试DNA结合分子的修饰衍生物的改变的特异性或亲和力，在二级确认或机械实验中使用测定法，使用从上述应用中产生的数据来改进分子建模系统的预测能力，以及使用改进的分子建模系统来产生新的“字母”。 DNA结合亚基可以被聚合以制备新的杂聚物，该杂聚物被从头设计以结合特定的DNA靶位点。</base:Paragraphs>

Alternatively, one test site or the other could be deleted from the test oligonucleotide.  </base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>By using a different DNA:protein interaction as the indicator system in a secondary screening assay, the &quot;false positives&quot; shown for TACN and ACNN (shown in FIG. 31) can be identified. The recognition sequence for the protein in a secondary screening assay simply needs to have a different screening sequence in the region flanking the test site than the UL9 screening sequence.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>通过在二次筛选测定中使用不同的DNA：蛋白质相互作用作为指示系统，可以检测到“假阳性”。 可以鉴定TACN和ACNN（图31中所示）。 在二次筛选测定中，蛋白质的识别序列仅需要在测试位点侧翼的区域中具有与UL9筛选序列不同的筛选序列。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay of the present invention will facilitate the predictive abilities of molecular modeling systems in two ways. First, ad hoc methods of structural prediction will be improved. Second, by employing pattern matching schemes, the comparison of sequences having similar or different affinities for a given set of DNA-binding molecules should empirically reveal sets of sequences that have similar structures (see Section VI.D, Using a Test Matrix). Molecular modeling programs are &quot;trained&quot; using the information concerning DNA-binding molecules and their preferred binding sequences. With this information coupled to the predicative power of molecular modeling programs, the design of DNA- binding molecules (subunits) that could be covalently linked becomes feasible.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的测定法将以两种方式促进分子建模系统的预测能力。 首先，将改进特别的结构预测方法。 其次，通过采用模式匹配方案，对给定组的DNA结合分子具有相似或不同亲和力的序列的比较应该凭经验揭示具有相似结构的序列组（参见第VI.D节，使用测试矩阵）。 分子建模程序是经过“训练”的。 使用关于DNA结合分子及其优选结合序列的信息。 通过将该信息与分子建模程序的预测能力相结合，可以共价连接的DNA结合分子（亚基）的设计变得可行。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One advantage of the present invention is that the assay is capable of screening for binding activity directed against any DNA sequence. Such sequences can be medically significant target sequences scrambled or randomly generated DNA sequences, or well-defined, ordered sets of DNA sequences. Other sets could be used for screening for molecules demonstrating sequence preferential binding (like Doxorubicin) to determine the sequences with highest binding affinity and/or to determine the relative affinities between a large number of different sequences. There is usefulness in taking either approach for detecting and/or designing new therapeutic agents. Section VI.C.3, &quot;Theoretical Considerations for Choosing Target Sequences&quot;, outlines the theoretical considerations for choosing DNA target sites in a biological system.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的一个优点是该测定法能够筛选针对任何DNA序列的结合活性。 此类序列可以是医学上重要的靶序列，乱序或随机产生的DNA序列，或明确定义的有序DNA序列组。 其他组可用于筛选显示序列优先结合的分子（如多柔比星），以确定具有最高结合亲和力的序列和/或确定大量不同序列之间的相对亲和力。 采用任一种方法来检测和/或设计新的治疗剂是有用的。 第VI.C.3节“选择靶序列的理论考虑”概述了在生物系统中选择DNA靶位点的理论考虑。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Molecules that interfere with the interaction of these transcription factors and their target DNA (i.e., DNA/Protein transcription complexes) are also expected to alter transcription initiated from the target DNA. A publicly available database of these factors and the sequences to which they bind is available from the National Library of Medicine and is called &quot;The Transcription Data Base, or TFD.&quot; The binding sites of these transcription factors can be identified in the 5' non-coding region of genes having known sequences (Example 15).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>干扰这些转录因子与其靶DNA（即DNA/蛋白质转录复合物）的相互作用的分子也预期改变从靶DNA起始的转录。 这些因子及其结合序列的公开数据库可从国家医学图书馆获得，并称为“转录数据库，或TFD”。 可以在具有已知序列的基因的5'非编码区中鉴定这些转录因子的结合位点（实施例15）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Since the binding constant of a dimer is the product of the binding constants of the monomers, when monomers with higher initial binding constants are formed into dimers (or multimers) the differential effect is proportionately increased, creating a wider &quot;window&quot; of affinity versus the number of binding sites. The breadth of the window essentially reflects the margin of effective drug concentration compared to the relative toxicity.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>由于二聚体的结合常数是单体结合常数的乘积，所以当具有较高初始结合常数的单体形成二聚体（或多聚体）时，差异效应成比例地增加，从而产生较宽的“窗口”。 亲和力与结合位点数量的关系。 窗口的宽度基本上反映了与相对毒性相比的有效药物浓度的界限。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Given the information already available on sequence- preferential binding of DNA-binding drugs, it is likely that each drug presented to the screening assay will have (i) a number of high affinity binding sites (e.g., 10 to 100-fold better affinity than the average site) , (ii) a larger number of sites that are bound with moderate affinity (3 to 10- fold better affinity than average), (iii) the bulk of the binding sites having average affinity, and (iv) a number of sites having worse- than- average affinity. This range of binding affinities will likely resemble a bell-shaped curve. The shape of the curve will probably vary for each drug. To exemplify, assume that approximately five 4 bp sites will be high affinity binding sites, and twenty 4 bp sites will be moderately high affinity binding sites, then any given drug may recognize roughly 25, high or moderately high affinity binding sites. If 50 to 100 drugs are screened, this represents a &quot;bank&quot; of potentially 250-500 high affinity sites and 1000-2500 moderately high affinity sites. Thus, the probability of finding a number of high affinity drug binding sites that match medically significant target sites is good. Furthermore, heterodimeric drugs can be designed to match DNA target sites of 8 or more bp, lending specificity to the potential pharmaceuticals.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>鉴于已经可获得的关于DNA结合药物的序列优先结合的信息，可能的是，呈现给筛选测定的每种药物将具有(i)许多高亲和力结合位点（例如，比平均位点高10至100倍的亲和力），(ii)以中等亲和力结合的更大数量的位点（比平均值高3至10倍的亲和力），(iii)大部分结合位点具有平均亲和力，和(iv)许多位点具有比平均更差的亲和力。 该结合亲和力范围将可能类似于钟形曲线。 对于每种药物，曲线的形状可能会变化。 为了举例说明，假设大约五个4bp位点将是高亲和力结合位点，并且二十个4bp位点将是中等高亲和力结合位点，则任何给定的药物可以识别大约25个高或中等高亲和力结合位点。 如果筛选了50到100种药物，这就代表了一个“银行” 可能有250-500个高亲和力位点和1000-2500个中等高亲和力位点。 因此，找到与医学上重要的靶位点匹配的许多高亲和力药物结合位点的概率是良好的。 此外，可以设计异二聚体药物以匹配8个或更多个bp的DNA靶位点，从而为潜在的药物提供特异性。</base:Paragraphs>

Thus, the probability of finding a number of high affinity drug binding sites that match medically significant target sites is good. Furthermore, heterodimeric drugs can be designed to match DNA target sites of 8 or more bp, lending specificity to the potential pharmaceuticals.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>鉴于已经可获得的关于DNA结合药物的序列优先结合的信息，可能的是，呈现给筛选测定的每种药物将具有(i)许多高亲和力结合位点（例如，比平均位点高10至100倍的亲和力），(ii)以中等亲和力结合的更大数量的位点（比平均值高3至10倍的亲和力），(iii)大部分结合位点具有平均亲和力，和(iv)许多位点具有比平均更差的亲和力。 该结合亲和力范围将可能类似于钟形曲线。 对于每种药物，曲线的形状可能会变化。 为了举例说明，假设大约五个4bp位点将是高亲和力结合位点，并且二十个4bp位点将是中等高亲和力结合位点，则任何给定的药物可以识别大约25个高或中等高亲和力结合位点。 如果筛选了50到100种药物，这就代表了一个“银行” 可能有250-500个高亲和力位点和1000-2500个中等高亲和力位点。 因此，找到与医学上重要的靶位点匹配的许多高亲和力药物结合位点的概率是良好的。 此外，可以设计异二聚体药物以匹配8个或更多个bp的DNA靶位点，从而为潜在的药物提供特异性。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Daunomycin is a member of an entirely different class of DNA- binding molecules, the anthracycline antibiotics, that bind to DNA via intercalation.  Heteropolymers are molecules composed of different types of DNA-binding subunits; for example, compounds composed of a distamycin molecule linked to a daunomycin molecule or a distamycin molecule linked to two daunomycin molecules. The term &quot;oligomeric&quot; is being used to describe molecules comprised of linked subunits each of which may be smaller than the parent compound.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>道诺霉素是完全不同类别的DNA结合分子（蒽环类抗生素）的成员，其通过嵌入与DNA结合。 杂聚物是由不同类型的DNA结合亚基组成的分子； 例如，由连接至道诺霉素分子的偏端霉素分子或连接至两个道诺霉素分子的偏端霉素分子组成的化合物。 低聚物一词 用于描述由连接的亚单位组成的分子，每个亚单位可以小于母体化合物。</base:Paragraphs>
