detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Generally, oligonucleotides were radiolabelled with gamma-.sup.  32 P- ATP or alpha-.sup.32 P-deoxynucleotide triphosphates and T4 polynucleotide kinase or the Klenow fragment of DNA polymerase, respectively. Labelling reactions were performed in the buffers and by the methods recommended by the manufacturers (New England Biolabs, Beverly Mass.; Bethesda Research Laboratories, Gaithersburg Md.; or Boehringer/Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.).  Oligonucleotides were separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn.; or Biorad, Richmond, Calif.  ) or &quot;NENSORB&quot; preformed columns (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  as per the manufacturers instructions.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>通常，寡核苷酸用γ-标记。 32P-ATP或α-32P-脱氧核苷酸三磷酸和T4多核苷酸激酶或DNA聚合酶的Klenow片段。 标记反应在缓冲液中并通过制造商（New England Biolabs,Beverly Mass.；Bethesda Research Laboratories,Gaithersburg Md.；或Boehringer/Mannheim,Indianapolis Ind.）推荐的方法进行。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 或Biorad,Richmond,Calif.）或“NENSORB”预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.； 预制柱（New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Digoxigenin-labelled oligonucleotides are detected using the chemiluminescent detection system &quot;SOUTHERN LIGHTS&quot; developed by Tropix, Inc.  (Bedford, Mass.). Use of this detection system is illustrated in FIGS. 11A and 11B. The technique can be applied to detect DNA that has been captured on either beads or filters.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>使用化学发光检测系统“SOUTHERN Light”检测地高辛标记的寡核苷酸。 由Tropix，Inc.（Bedford，Mass.)开发。 该检测系统的使用在图11A和11B中示出。 该技术可用于检测已捕获在珠粒或过滤器上的DNA。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In solution, the bead-DNA-anti-dig-AP is resuspended in &quot;SOUTHERN LIGHT&quot; assay buffer and AMPPD and measured directly in a luminometer. Large scale screening assays are performed using a 96-well plate-reading luminometer (Dynatech Laboratories, Chantilly, Va.).  Subpicogram quantities of DNA (10.sup.2 to 10.sup.3 attomoles (an attomole is 10.sup. -18 moles)) can be detected using the Tropix system in conjunction with the plate-reading luminometer.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在溶液中，将珠子-DNA-抗-Dig-AP重悬于“SOUTHERN LIGHT”中。 测定缓冲液和AMPPD并在光度计中直接测量。 使用96孔板读数光度计（Dynatech Laboratories,Chantilly,Va.）进行大规模筛选测定。 亚皮克量的DNA(102至10纳摩尔（一个纳摩尔是10-18摩尔））可以使用Tropix系统结合板读数光度计来检测。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Radioactive-labeling of the primer with .sup.32 P is accomplished by the enzymatic transfer of a radioactive phosphate from &ggr;-.sup. 32 P- ATP to the 5' end of the primer oligonucleotide using T4 polynucleotide kinase (Ausubel, et al.). For labeling 256 oligonucleotides, approximately 60 &mgr;g HSV primer was labeled as follows. The oligonucleotide was incubated for 1 hour at 37&deg; C. with 125 &mgr;l . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP (20 mCi total, 7000 Ci/mmol) and 600 units of T4 polynucleotide kinase in a 3 ml reaction volume containing 50 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 10 MM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM spermidine, and 1.5 mM dithiothreitol (freshly prepared). To stop the reaction, EDTA was added to a final concentration of 20 mM. Unincorporated nucleotides were removed using &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; chromatography in 10 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA (TE+50).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用32P对引物进行放射性标记是通过酶促转移放射性磷酸酯从99gR-完成的。 使用T4多核苷酸激酶（Ausubel等人）将32P-ATP连接到引物寡核苷酸的5'末端。 为了标记256个寡核苷酸，如下标记约60μg HSV引物。 将寡核苷酸在37℃下孵育1小时； C.与125名经理； γ-32P-ATP(20mCi，7000Ci/mmol)和600单位T4多核苷酸激酶在含有50mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5、10mM MgCl2、10mM亚精胺和1.5mM二硫苏糖醇（新鲜制备的）的3ml反应体积中。 为了终止反应，加入EDTA至终浓度为20mM。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”去除未掺入的核苷酸。 在10mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA(TE+50)中进行色谱。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The volume of the reaction mixture was increased by adding 75 &mgr; l a solution of 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 10 mM EDTA.  The reaction mixture was applied to a 1 ml &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; (in TE+50) spin column. The spin columns were prepared by plugging 1cc tuberculin syringes with silanized glass wool and adding a slurry of &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX.  &quot; The columns were prespun at 2000 rpm in a tabletop centrifuge for 4 minutes. The samples (reaction mixtures) were passed through the column by centrifugation (2000 rpm, 4 minutes at room temperature) to remove unincorporated deoxyribonucleotides. The incorporation of .sup.32 P was measured by placing a small volume of the sample in scintillation fluor and determining the disintegrations per minute (dpms) in a scintillation counter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>反应混合物的体积通过添加75μgr； 10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和10mM EDTA的溶液。 将反应混合物加到1ml G-25葡聚糖凝胶上。 （在TE+50中）旋转柱。 通过用硅烷化玻璃棉塞住1cc结核菌素注射器并加入G-25葡聚糖凝胶浆液来制备旋转柱。 " 将柱在台式离心机中以2000rpm预离心4分钟。 通过离心(2000rpm，在室温下4分钟）使样品（反应混合物）通过柱以除去未掺入的脱氧核糖核苷酸。 32P的掺入通过将小体积的样品置于闪烁荧光剂中并在闪烁计数器中测定每分钟的崩解(dpms)来测量。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Coating the plates with a blocking agent decreases variability in the assay.  Several types of blocking reagents typically used to block the adsorption of macromolecules to plastic are known, primarily from immunoscreening procedures.  For example, plates may be blocked with either 1% bovine serum albumin (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), or 0.1% gelatin, 0.0.5% &quot;TWEEN29&quot; in PBS.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用封闭剂包被板降低了测定中的可变性。 通常用于阻断大分子吸附到塑料上的几种类型的阻断试剂是已知的，主要来自免疫筛选程序。 例如，可以用溶于磷酸盐缓冲盐水(PBS)中的1%牛血清白蛋白(BSA)或0.1%明胶、0.0.5%“TWEEN29”封闭板。 在PBS中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Coating the plates with a blocking agent decreases variability in the assay.  Several types of blocking reagents typically used to block the adsorption of macromolecules to plastic are known, primarily from immunoscreening procedures.  For example, plates may be blocked with either 1% bovine serum albumin (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), or 0.1% gelatin, 0.0.5% &quot;TWEEN29&quot; in PBS.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用封闭剂包被板降低了测定中的可变性。 通常用于阻断大分子吸附到塑料上的几种类型的阻断试剂是已知的，主要来自免疫筛选程序。 例如，可以用溶于磷酸盐缓冲盐水(PBS)中的1%牛血清白蛋白(BSA)或0.1%明胶、0.0.5%“TWEEN29”封闭板。 在PBS中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To test for the effectiveness of using such blocking reagents, the plates were treated with the above reagents for 1 hour at room temperature, then washed three times with 0.05% &quot;TWEEN20&quot; in PBS and once with the assay buffer.  Assay reaction mixtures were aliquoted to the plates and tested as described above using dot blot capture assays. Both of the blocking reagents (BSA or gelatin) were effective in blocking DNA and protein binding--except when polypropylene plates were used. Based on these experiments, PVC plates blocked with BSA were determined to work well in the assay of the present invention.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了测试使用这种封闭试剂的有效性，将板用上述试剂在室温下处理1小时，然后用0.05%“吐温20”洗涤三次。 在PBS中，并用测定缓冲液一次。 将测定反应混合物等分到板中，并如上所述使用斑点印迹捕获测定进行测试。 两种封闭试剂（BSA或明胶）在封闭DNA和蛋白质结合方面都是有效的--除了当使用聚丙烯板时。 基于这些实验，确定用BSA封闭的PVC板在本发明的测定中工作良好。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The autoradiographs of the nitrocellulose filters were analyzed with a Molecular Dynamics (Sunnyvale, Calif.)  scanning laser densitometer using an ImageQuant software package (Molecular Dynamics). Using this software, a 96-well grid was placed on the image of the autoradiograph and the densitometer calculated the &quot;volume&quot; of each dot (&quot;volume&quot; is equivalent to the density of each pixel in the grid square multiplied by the area of the grid square). The program automatically subtracts background. The background was determined by either the background of a line or object drawn outside the grid or by using the gridlines as background for each individual dot.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>使用ImageQuant软件包（Molecular Dynamics）用Molecular Dynamics（Sunnyvale,Calif.）扫描激光密度计分析硝酸纤维素滤膜的放射自显影。 使用该软件，将96孔网格放置在放射自显影的图像上，并且密度计计算“体积”。 每个点的体积(“体积”等于网格正方形中每个像素的密度乘以网格正方形的面积）。 程序自动减去背景。 通过在网格外绘制的线或物体的背景或通过使用网格线作为每个单独点的背景来确定背景。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The autoradiographs of the nitrocellulose filters were analyzed with a Molecular Dynamics (Sunnyvale, Calif.)  scanning laser densitometer using an ImageQuant software package (Molecular Dynamics). Using this software, a 96-well grid was placed on the image of the autoradiograph and the densitometer calculated the &quot;volume&quot; of each dot (&quot;volume&quot; is equivalent to the density of each pixel in the grid square multiplied by the area of the grid square). The program automatically subtracts background. The background was determined by either the background of a line or object drawn outside the grid or by using the gridlines as background for each individual dot.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The % reduction in DNA:protein complex as a result of the presence of actinomycin D is called &quot;r %&quot;; the lower the r % score, the more effective the test molecule in blocking the DNA:protein interaction.  For each screen, the test oligonucleotides have been ranked from 1 to 256, based on the r % score; the rank of 1 denotes the lowest r % score (the test oligonucleotide most effected by the test molecule), the rank of 256 denotes the highest r % score (the test oligonucleotide least effected by the test molecule). The table also shows the average r % score and average rank of each test oligonucleotide; the averages are calculated from the sum of the individual scores and ranks divided by the number of screens, respectively. The test oligonucleotides are then ranked from 1 to 256 based on the average rank in all screens. The final ranking is shown in the two external columns on the table. Test oligonucleotides ranking less than 50 in any individual screen are shown in highlighted boxes.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>放线菌素D的存在导致DNA：蛋白质复合物减少的百分比称为“r%”。 r%得分越低，测试分子在阻断DNA：蛋白质相互作用方面越有效。 对于每次筛选，测试寡核苷酸已经基于r%分数从1到256排序； 等级1表示最低r%得分（受测试分子影响最大的测试寡核苷酸），等级256表示最高r%得分（受测试分子影响最小的测试寡核苷酸）。 该表还显示了每个测试寡核苷酸的平均r%得分和平均等级； 平均值分别由各个分数和等级的总和除以筛选数来计算。 然后基于所有筛选中的平均等级将测试寡核苷酸从1至256分级。 最终排序显示在表上的两个外部列中。 在任何单独筛选中排序小于50的测试寡核苷酸以突出显示的框显示。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>First, to examine possible preferences of the test molecule for a base at any particular position in the test site, the average r % scores are examined.  The average r % scores for each of the 64 possible test oligonucleotides at each position in the test site are averaged. For example, to determine the effect of having an A in the first position of the test site, the &quot;A.sub.1 &quot; position, the average r % scores for the 64 test oligonucleotides with A in the first position are averaged. The results of this analysis are shown in FIG. 21.  The mean score for all oligonucleotides in these screens was r % value 67; the standard deviation was 11.8.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>首先，为了检查测试分子对测试位点中任何特定位置的碱基的可能偏好，检查平均r%得分。 将测试位点中每个位置处的64种可能的测试寡核苷酸中的每一种的平均r%得分取平均值。 例如，为了确定在测试位点的第一位置上具有A的效果，在测试位点的第一位置上的“A1”是指在测试位点的第一位置上具有A的位置。 在一个位置，将在第一位置具有A的64个测试寡核苷酸的平均r%得分平均。 该分析的结果显示在图21中。 这些筛选中所有寡核苷酸的平均得分为r%值67； 标准偏差为11.8。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Assay mixtures are prepared as described in Example 10, using a high- ranking test oligonucleotide, e.g., TTCC (ranking=#1), as the radiolabelled oligonucleotide in the experiment. The test oligonucleotide TTCC is labelled to high specific activity with &ggr;-. sup.32 P-ATP as described in Example 8: in this example, the labeled TTCC oligonucleotide will be referred to as the &quot;high specific activity test oligonucleotide&quot;.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如实施例10中所述制备测定混合物，在实验中使用高级测试寡核苷酸，例如TTCC（等级=#1)作为放射性标记的寡核苷酸。 测试寡核苷酸TTCC用&GGR-标记至高比活性。 在本实施例中，标记的TTCC寡核苷酸被称为“高特异性活性测试寡核苷酸”。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体

The test oligonucleotide TTCC is labelled to high specific activity with &ggr;-. sup.32 P-ATP as described in Example 8: in this example, the labeled TTCC oligonucleotide will be referred to as the &quot;high specific activity test oligonucleotide&quot;.  </base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The competitor oligonucleotides are labeled as described in Example 8, except that the ATP used for kinasing the primer is 1:200 radiolabeled:nonradiolabeled. In other words, the competitor oligonucleotides are tracer labeled with radioactive phosphorous to a 200- fold lower specific activity than the high specific activity test oligonucleotide. Since all of the competitor oligonucleotides are labeled with the same radiolabeled primer molecule, the relative concentrations of the competitor DNAs can be determined with high accuracy. Further, since the specific activity is the same, the concentrations can be adjusted to be the same. For the purposes of this example, the competitor DNAs are referred to as &quot;low specific activity competitor oligonucleotides.&quot;</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如实施例8所述标记竞争寡核苷酸，只是用于激酶引物的ATP是1：200放射性标记：非放射性标记。 换句话说，竞争寡核苷酸是用放射性磷标记的示踪剂，比高比活性测试寡核苷酸的比活性低200倍。 由于所有竞争寡核苷酸都用相同的放射性标记的引物分子标记，因此可以高精度地确定竞争DNAs的相对浓度。 此外，由于比活性相同，因此可以将浓度调节至相同。 为了本实施例的目的，竞争DNAs被称为“低比活性竞争寡核苷酸”。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The competition assay described here facilitates the determination of actual rank between the test oligonucleotides that are detected as highly effective molecules in the original assay. The competition assay also facilitates the detection of false negatives. As described above, the results of the assay discussed in Example 10 imply &quot;directional&quot; binding of distamycin, in which the effect of binding is only detected when the molecule is bound in one direction with respect to the UL9 protein. Binding in the opposite direction (i.e., to the complementary test sequence) is not detected with the same activity in the assay.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本文所述的竞争测定有助于确定在原始测定中作为高效分子检测的测试寡核苷酸之间的实际等级。 竞争测定还有助于检测假阴性。 如上所述，在实施例10中讨论的试验结果意味着“定向” 偏端霉素的结合，其中仅当分子相对于UL9蛋白在一个方向上结合时才检测到结合效应。 在测定中未检测到具有相同活性的相反方向（即，与互补测试序列）的结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The purpose of this competition experiment is to use the test oligonucleotides to compete for the binding of distamycin. If the sequences complementary to the &quot;best binders&quot; are false negatives in the assay, they should nonetheless be effective competitors in the competition assay.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>该竞争实验的目的是使用测试寡核苷酸竞争偏端霉素的结合。 如果与“最佳结合物”互补的序列 如果在测定中是假阴性，则它们仍然应该是竞争测定中的有效竞争者。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>TATA-boxes have been determined for a large number of genes.  Typically, the TATA-box consensus sequence has been identified by examining the DNA sequence 5' of the RNA start site of a selected gene.  However, the most rigorous determinations of TATA boxes have also demonstrated the transcription factor binding site by DNA protection experiments and DNA:protein binding assays (using electrophoretic methods) . Many of these sites are annotated in the public databases &quot;EMBL&quot; and &quot;GENBANK&quot;, which both contain sequences of nucleic acids sequences.  Unfortunately, the flat field listing of these databases do not consistently annotate these sites. It is possible, however, to automatically search a database, using a text parsing language called AWK, to extract most sequence information that relates to annotated promoter sequences.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经确定了大量基因的TATA盒。 通常，通过检查所选基因的RNA起始位点的5'的DNA序列来鉴定TATA盒共有序列。 然而，TATA盒的最严格的测定也已经通过DNA保护实验和DNA：蛋白质结合测定（使用电泳方法）证明了转录因子结合位点。 这些站点中的许多都在公共数据库“EMBL”中注解。 和“GENBANK”，两者都含有核酸序列的序列。 不幸的是，这些数据库的平坦字段列表不能一致地注释这些站点。 然而，可以使用称为AWK的文本解析语言自动搜索数据库，以提取与注释的启动子序列相关的大多数序列信息。</base:Paragraphs>

It is possible, however, to automatically search a database, using a text parsing language called AWK, to extract most sequence information that relates to annotated promoter sequences.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经确定了大量基因的TATA盒。 通常，通过检查所选基因的RNA起始位点的5'的DNA序列来鉴定TATA盒共有序列。 然而，TATA盒的最严格的测定也已经通过DNA保护实验和DNA：蛋白质结合测定（使用电泳方法）证明了转录因子结合位点。 这些站点中的许多都在公共数据库“EMBL”中注解。 和“GENBANK”，两者都含有核酸序列的序列。 不幸的是，这些数据库的平坦字段列表不能一致地注释这些站点。 然而，可以使用称为AWK的文本解析语言自动搜索数据库，以提取与注释的启动子序列相关的大多数序列信息。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The following is a description of how selected promoter sites were located in the public database from &quot;EMBL.&quot; The flat field annotations from &quot;EMBL&quot; Version 32 as processed by &quot;INTELLIGENETICS&quot; (Mountain View, Calif.), were obtained with the set of UNIX programs call &quot;IG-SUITE.&quot; These programs were executed on a &quot;SUN IPX&quot; workstation. An AWK script was used to parse all the primate annotation files listed in the &quot;EMBL&quot; database. The AWK interpreter is supplied as part of the system software that comes with the &quot;SUN IPX&quot; workstation.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The program first examines the files for all header lines containing the word &quot;complete&quot; but not &quot;mRNA&quot; or &quot;pseudogene&quot;; the output is printed. Complete genes sometimes contain the promoter sequences but complete mRNA genes do not contain the promoters. mRNA genes are not of interest for the purpose of detecting promoter elements. Next, the AWK system looks for the word &quot;exon 1&quot; and if it finds it prints the header and &quot;DE&quot; line. Then it looks for &quot;5&quot; and prints the header line if it does not contain the word &quot;mRNA&quot;. Next it looks for the word &quot;transcription&quot; and if it finds it prints the preceding and following line along with description line.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>程序首先检查文件中包含单词“完成”的所有标题行。 而不是“mRNA” 或“假基因” 打印输出。 完整基因有时含有启动子序列，但完整mRNA基因不含有启动子。 为了检测启动子元件的目的，mRNA基因不是感兴趣的。 接下来，AWK系统寻找单词“外显子1”。 并且如果它发现它打印标题和“解密” 线。 然后它寻找“5” 并且如果标题行不包含单词“mRNA”，则打印标题行。 接下来它寻找单词“transcription” 并且如果它找到，则它打印前一行和后一行以及描述行。</base:Paragraphs>

Next, the AWK system looks for the word &quot;exon 1&quot; and if it finds it prints the header and &quot;DE&quot; line. Then it looks for &quot;5&quot; and prints the header line if it does not contain the word &quot;mRNA&quot;. Next it looks for the word &quot;transcription&quot; and if it finds it prints the preceding and following line along with description line.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>程序首先检查文件中包含单词“完成”的所有标题行。 而不是“mRNA” 或“假基因” 打印输出。 完整基因有时含有启动子序列，但完整mRNA基因不含有启动子。 为了检测启动子元件的目的，mRNA基因不是感兴趣的。 接下来，AWK系统寻找单词“外显子1”。 并且如果它发现它打印标题和“解密” 线。 然后它寻找“5” 并且如果标题行不包含单词“mRNA”，则打印标题行。 接下来它寻找单词“transcription” 并且如果它找到，则它打印前一行和后一行以及描述行。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Next, the AWK system examines the files for the word &quot;TATA&quot; in the header lines or references. This results is printed. After this it looks for the word &quot;promoter&quot; and if it finds it prints that line and the line after it which contains the information about the promoter. Then the program looks for &quot;protein.sub.-- bind&quot; and prints that line along with the next one. The description of &quot;protein.sub.-- bind&quot; is usually used to mark potential binding sites of transcription factors in the &quot;EMBL&quot; database. AWK then scans for any annotated primary mRNA start sites. The promoter sequence is found in front of the start site. Finally, any exon 1 start sites that are annotated in the feature table are extracted. Exon 1 start sites should also be the primary transcription start site and the TATA boxes usually are found approximately 25-35 base pairs 5' to the transcriptional start site.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>接下来，AWK系统检查用于单词“TATA”的文件。 在标题行或引用中。 打印该结果。 在这之后，它寻找词“促进者” 并且如果它找到，则它打印包含关于启动子的信息的那行和它之后的行。 然后程序寻找“蛋白质结合” 并将该线与下一条一起打印。 蛋白质结合的描述 通常用于标记转录因子的潜在结合位点。 数据库。 然后AWK扫描任何注释的初级mRNA起始位点。 启动子序列位于起始位点之前。 最后，提取特征表中注释的任何外显子1起始位点。 外显子1起始位点也应该是初级转录起始位点，并且TATA盒通常在转录起始位点的5'约25-35个碱基对处发现。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>After the AWK script is run on the database the output is manually examined.  Those sites that are clearly promoter sites are noted and nucleotide coordinates recorded. Other gene sequences are examined using the &quot;FINDSEQ&quot; program of &quot;IG.sub.-- SUITE&quot; to see if the promoter sites can be determined or if the references in the database describe the promoter sequences. If so, those nucleotide coordinates are noted. At the end of this examination &quot;FINDSEQ&quot; is used to extract any sequences containing promoter sequences by using an indirect file of &quot;LOCUS&quot; names constructed using a text editor.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在AWK脚本在数据库上运行之后，手动检查输出。 记录明显是启动子位点的那些位点并记录核苷酸坐标。 使用“FINDSEQ”检验其他基因序列。 一套程序 观察是否可以确定启动子位点或者数据库中的参考是否描述了启动子序列。 如果是，则记录那些核苷酸坐标。 在该检查结束时“FINDSEQ” 用于通过使用间接文件“LOCUS”提取含有启动子序列的任何序列。 使用文本编辑器构造的名称。</base:Paragraphs>

Other gene sequences are examined using the &quot;FINDSEQ&quot; program of &quot;IG.sub.-- SUITE&quot; to see if the promoter sites can be determined or if the references in the database describe the promoter sequences. If so, those nucleotide coordinates are noted. At the end of this examination &quot;FINDSEQ&quot; is used to extract any sequences containing promoter sequences by using an indirect file of &quot;LOCUS&quot; names constructed using a text editor.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在AWK脚本在数据库上运行之后，手动检查输出。 记录明显是启动子位点的那些位点并记录核苷酸坐标。 使用“FINDSEQ”检验其他基因序列。 一套程序 观察是否可以确定启动子位点或者数据库中的参考是否描述了启动子序列。 如果是，则记录那些核苷酸坐标。 在该检查结束时“FINDSEQ” 用于通过使用间接文件“LOCUS”提取含有启动子序列的任何序列。 使用文本编辑器构造的名称。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A parsing program was also written to extract each of the annotated sites from the file that &quot;FINDSEQ&quot; extracted from &quot;EMBL.&quot; This program extracts the following information: the promoter site name and four numbers representing the nucleotide coordinates of where the sequence is to start, what the coordinate of the first base of the site is, the coordinate of the last base of the site and the end of the sequence to be extracted. A large batch file was constructed to automatically extract each of the promoter sites. These sequences formed the basis of Table V. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>还编写了一个分析程序以从文件中提取每个注释的位点 摘自欧洲分子生物学杂志 该程序提取以下信息：启动子位点名称和代表序列起始位置的核苷酸坐标、位点的第一个碱基的坐标、位点的最后一个碱基的坐标和待提取序列的末端的四个数字。 构建大批文件以自动提取每个启动子位点。 这些序列形成表V的基础。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Plate I has a normalization factor of 1; Plate II has a normalization factor of 1875/1969=0.95; Plate III has a normalization factor of 1875/1781=1.05. The equation used to establish these numbers is as follows: &quot;Average average&quot;/line average=normalization factor.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>板I的归一化因子为1； 板II的归一化因子为1875/1969=0.95； 板III的归一化因子为1875/1781=1.05。 用于建立这些数字的等式如下:“平均平均值”/线平均值=归一化因子。</base:Paragraphs>

Then, for each test oligonucleotide, at each drug concentration and/or each time point, a normalized % score is calculated.  The normalized % score (n %) can be described as follows:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>光密度测定后，使用电子表格程序如“EXCEL”分析数据。 对于每个板，检查校准物样品并用于确定归一化值。 然后，对于每种测试寡核苷酸，在每种药物浓度和/或每个时间点，计算归一化的%分数。 归一化的%分数（n%）可以描述如下：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The water supply circuit CK1 is composed of a thermostat 34, a silicon controlled rectifier (SCR) T1, a transistor Q1 connected between an anode and a gate of the SCR T1, and a solid state relay (SSR1) as to control a valve 32 and a lamp 24 connected at an output end of the SSR1.  The water supply circuit CK1 also has two SCRs T2, T3, two transistors Q2, Q3 respectively connected between an anode and a gate of a corresponding SCR T2, T3, a diode D1 connected between a low level electrode Y0 and the transistor Q2, a diode D2 connected between a high level electrode Y1 and the transistor Q3, and an SCR T4 having a gate connected to the anode of the SCR T2. The electrodes Y0 and Y1 are immersed within a boiling tank 50 connected to a ground as mentioned. When a water level of the boiling tank 50 is below the low level electrode Y0, i.e., the low level electrode Y0 is in a high potential, the transistor Q2 and the SCR T2 are in an &quot;off&quot; status so that the SCR T4 is in an &quot;on&quot; status, then SSR1 will be activated, the valve 32 will be opened. When the water level of the boiling tank 50 reaches the high water level electrode Y1, the transistor Q3 and the SCR T3 will be in an &quot;on&quot; status, the SSR1 will be in an &quot;off&quot; status so that the valve 32 will be closed. Additionally, if the normally-closed contacts 36, 38 of the thermostat 34 are activated, the transistor Q1 and SCR T1 will also be turned off so that the valve 32 will also be closed.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>供水电路CK1由恒温器34、可控硅整流器（SCR）T1、连接在SCR T1的阳极和栅极之间的晶体管Q1、以及用于控制阀32的固态继电器（SSR1）和连接在SSR1的输出端的灯24组成。 供水电路CK1还具有两个SCR T2、T3，分别连接在相应SCR T2、T3的阳极和栅极之间的两个晶体管Q2、Q3，连接在低电平电极Y0和晶体管Q2之间的二极管D1，连接在高电平电极Y1和晶体管Q3之间的二极管D2，以及具有连接到SCR T2的阳极的栅极的SCR T4。 电极Y0和Y1浸没在沸腾罐50内，沸腾罐50如上所述地连接到地面。 当沸腾槽50的水位低于低电平电极Y0时，即低电平电极Y0处于高电位时，晶体管Q2和SCR T2处于“断开”状态 从而SCR T4处于“接通”状态 在该状态下，然后SSR1将被激活，阀32将被打开。 当沸腾槽50的水位达到高水位电极Y1时，晶体管Q3和SCR T3将处于接通状态 当SSR1处于“关闭”状态时，SSR1将处于“关闭”状态。 该状态使得阀32将被关闭。 另外，如果恒温器34的常闭触点36、38被激活，则晶体管Q1和SCR T1也将被关断，使得阀32也将被关闭。</base:Paragraphs>

When the water level of the boiling tank 50 reaches the high water level electrode Y1, the transistor Q3 and the SCR T3 will be in an &quot;on&quot; status, the SSR1 will be in an &quot;off&quot; status so that the valve 32 will be closed. Additionally, if the normally-closed contacts 36, 38 of the thermostat 34 are activated, the transistor Q1 and SCR T1 will also be turned off so that the valve 32 will also be closed.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>供水电路CK1由恒温器34、可控硅整流器（SCR）T1、连接在SCR T1的阳极和栅极之间的晶体管Q1、以及用于控制阀32的固态继电器（SSR1）和连接在SSR1的输出端的灯24组成。 供水电路CK1还具有两个SCR T2、T3，分别连接在相应SCR T2、T3的阳极和栅极之间的两个晶体管Q2、Q3，连接在低电平电极Y0和晶体管Q2之间的二极管D1，连接在高电平电极Y1和晶体管Q3之间的二极管D2，以及具有连接到SCR T2的阳极的栅极的SCR T4。 电极Y0和Y1浸没在沸腾罐50内，沸腾罐50如上所述地连接到地面。 当沸腾槽50的水位低于低电平电极Y0时，即低电平电极Y0处于高电位时，晶体管Q2和SCR T2处于“断开”状态 从而SCR T4处于“接通”状态 在该状态下，然后SSR1将被激活，阀32将被打开。 当沸腾槽50的水位达到高水位电极Y1时，晶体管Q3和SCR T3将处于接通状态 当SSR1处于“关闭”状态时，SSR1将处于“关闭”状态。 该状态使得阀32将被关闭。 另外，如果恒温器34的常闭触点36、38被激活，则晶体管Q1和SCR T1也将被关断，使得阀32也将被关闭。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The pump control circuit CK3 has a similar arrangement to the boiling circuit CK2 except that an SSR3 is used to control a pump 16 and a lamp 24&quot; and comprising an SCR T6, a transistor Q6, and a pumping indicating electrode Y6.  The pump control circuit CK3 also has a low water level electrode Y7 and a high water level electrode Y8 immersed within the hot water tank 70. When a water level of the hot water tank 70 is below the low water level electrode Y7 and a water level of the cool water tank 10 rises to the pumping indicating electrode Y6, the pump 16 will be activated. If the water level of the cool water tank 10 is below a long electrode Y5 immersed therewithin, the pump 16 will be turned off.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>泵控制电路CK3具有与沸腾电路CK2类似的布置，除了使用SSR3来控制泵16和灯24″之外。 并且包括SCR T6、晶体管Q6和泵送指示电极Y6。 泵控制电路CK3还具有浸没在热水箱70内的低水位电极Y7和高水位电极Y8。 当热水箱70的水位低于低水位电极Y7并且冷水箱10的水位上升到泵送指示电极Y6时，泵16将被激活。 如果冷却水箱10的水位低于浸入其中的长电极Y5，则泵16将关闭。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In order to overcome this problem, a method called pseudocompressibility was introduced by A. J. Chorin in &quot;A Numerical Method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems&quot;, J. Comp. Physics, Vol. 2, pp. 12-16, 1967, to alter the incompressible equations shown above to the form shown in equations (3) and (4) below: ##EQU2## The difference between equations (1) and (2) and (3) and (4) can be seen as the addition of the &part;&rgr;/&part;t term in the conservation of fluid mass equation. This term is used to change the mathematical representation of the fluid equations, such that they can be solved easier and more directly. However, by adding the pressure time derivative term, the fluid behavior that these equations describe has been changed. In equations (1) and (2) the &quot;t&quot; symbol represents true physical time. In equation (3) and (4) &quot;t&quot; no longer represents time; it is only a mathematical iteration parameter used to allow the more straight forward solution method. A solution to equations (3) and (4) will provide only steady incompressible flow fields. If the original equations (1) and (2) were solved, unsteady flow fields could also be predicted. Therefore in the following technique described, the resulting flow fields predicted by the method discussed will be solutions for steady incompressible flow fields only.  The equations (1) and (2) are known as the incompressible Navier Stokes equations.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了克服这个问题，A.J.Chorin在“A Numerical method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems”，J.Comp.Chem.Soc.1990，28，289中引入了一种称为拟压缩性的方法。 等式（1）和（2）以及（3）和（4）之间的差异可以看作是在流体质量守恒等式中增加了项。 该术语用于改变流体方程的数学表示，使得它们可以更容易且更直接地求解。 然而，通过添加压力时间微分项，这些方程描述的流体行为已经改变。 在等式（1）和（2）中 符号代表真实的物理时间。 在等式（3）和（4）中，“t” 不再代表时间； 它只是用于允许更直接的解方法的数学迭代参数。 方程（3）和（4）的解将仅提供稳定的不可压缩流场。 如果求解原始方程（1）和(2)，也可以预测非定常流场。 因此，在所描述的以下技术中，由所讨论的方法预测的所得流场将仅是稳定的不可压缩流场的解。 方程（1）和（2）被称为不可压缩纳维尔-斯托克斯方程。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>PPE: a polyphenylene ether derived from 2,6-dimethylphenol having an intrinsic viscosity of 38 ml/g measured at 25&deg; C. in chloroform. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>PPE：衍生自2,6-二甲基苯酚的聚苯醚，其在25℃下测量的特性粘度为38ml/g； C.在氯仿中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The constituents mentioned hereinbefore were compounded in an extruder in the quantities recorded in the table hereinafter. The average temperature adjustment of the extruder was 280&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将上文提及的组分在挤出机中以下表中记录的量配混。 挤出机的平均温度调节为280℃； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Standardised test pieces were manufactured from the polymer mixtures thus obtained in an injection molding machine. The test pieces were subjected to the following tests. The impact strength was determined according to Izod (ASTM 256) and according to DIN 53443 (Falling Dart Impact) at room temperature and at minus 30&deg; C. The gloss was determined according to ASTM D523 at an angle of 60&deg; and of 85.  degree.. The melt viscosity was measured according to ASTM D3835 at a shearing rate of 1,500 per second. The results are also recorded in the table hereinafter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在注塑机中由如此获得的聚合物混合物制造标准化试样。 对测试片进行以下测试。 冲击强度根据Izod（ASTM 256）并根据DIN 53443（落镖冲击）在室温和-30℃下测定； C.光泽度根据ASTM D523在60°的角度下测定； 和85。 学位 根据ASTM D3835在1,500/秒的剪切速率下测量熔体粘度。 结果也记录在下表中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Buffers and buffering systems are typically included within the nickel bath of the present invention. In this regard, buffering agents must be those which are not antagonistic to the plating system. Both acidic and alkaline buffering systems are generally operative including the common carboxylic acids such as acetic acid, propionic acid and the like. Typically, the bath may be buffered by adding a weak acid and its salts may be added in the desired amounts.  Typically, the amount of buffering agent or the buffering system which is present in these electroless nickel baths will vary depending upon conditions.  A total concentration thereof of at least approximately 0.005 mol per liter is generally suitable. The concentration of such buffering agent or system, however, will vary in accordance with the needs for maintaining pH control and usually will not exceed approximately 0.4 mol per liter.  Suitable operating conditions for the nickel baths of the present invention will generally range from approximately 50&deg; to 75. degree.  C., with a temperature of approximately 65&deg; C. being commonly used in both barrel and rack plating operations. However, temperatures above or below these specific temperatures can be used to obtain acceptable nickel deposits on the preformed metallurgy patterns on substrate surfaces.  Correspondingly, pH values for these baths will generally range from approximately 4.5 to approximately 7.5, with a pH of approximately 6.5 generally being preferred for most plating operations.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>缓冲剂和缓冲系统通常包括在本发明的镍浴中。 在这点上，缓冲剂必须是不对抗镀覆系统的那些。 酸性和碱性缓冲系统通常都是可操作的，包括常见的羧酸，例如乙酸、丙酸等。 通常，可以通过添加弱酸来缓冲浴，并且可以以所需量添加其盐。 通常，存在于这些无电镍浴中的缓冲剂或缓冲体系的量将根据条件而变化。 其至少约0.005mol/l的总浓度通常是合适的。 然而，这种缓冲剂或体系的浓度将根据保持pH控制的需要而变化，并且通常不超过约0.4mol/l。 本发明镍浴的合适操作条件通常为约50℃； 至75。 学位 温度约为65℃； C.通常用于滚镀和挂镀操作。 然而，高于或低于这些特定温度的温度可用于在基材表面上的预成形冶金图案上获得可接受的镍沉积物。 相应地，这些浴的pH值通常在约4.5至约7.5的范围内，其中对于大多数镀覆操作，约6.5的pH通常是优选的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Referring back to FIG. 8, the internal down converter operates at a high temperature (about in the range from 70&deg; C. to 80&deg; C.), the threshold voltage Vtp of the channel MOS transistor is reduced by about 0.07 V compared to its operating at a room temperature (for example at 25&deg; C.). Therefore, the reference voltage Vref (=3 Vtp) decreases at the time of high temperature operation by about 0.21 V as compared to at the time of room temperature operation. Accordingly, the reference voltage Vref is 2.49 V when operating at a high temperature.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>返回参考图8，内部下变频器在高温（大约在70℃至80℃的范围内）下操作，沟道MOS晶体管的阈值电压Vtp与在室温（例如在25℃)下操作相比降低了大约0.07V。 因此，与室温工作时相比，在高温工作时基准电压Vref（=3 Vtp）降低约0.21V。 因此，当在高温下操作时，参考电压Vref为2.49V。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As in the case of the example shown in FIG. 11, it is assumed that a condition for burn-in test (i.e. point P10 shown in FIG. 11 and 13) is required in a semiconductor device to which the internal down converter shown in FIG. 12 is applied. More specifically, 8 V for Vext and 5.3 V for Vint are necessary for executing a burn-in test in this example under an ambient temperature of 125&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如在图11所示的例子的情况下，假设在应用了图12所示的内部降压变换器的半导体器件中需要老化测试的条件（即，图11和13所示的点P10）。 更具体地，在该示例中，在125℃的环境温度下执行老化测试需要针对Vext的8V和针对Vint的5.3V； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In order to satisfy this condition, reference voltage generation circuit for burn-in test 10a shown in FIG. 12 has the characteristic shown in FIG. 13. More specifically, voltage selection circuit 90 can output the reference voltage Vref of 5.3 V when the power supply voltage Vext is 8 V at the ambient temperature of 125&deg; C. In other words, the internal voltage (Vint) which satisfies the condition for burn-in test (i.e. point P10 in FIG. 13) can be supplied to the internal circuit which is not shown. Furthermore, when an external power supply voltage Vext in excess of 6.0 V is supplied at the ambient temperature of 125. degree. C., a reference voltage Vref satisfying the relation Vref=Vext-2. 7 V is supplied to differential amplification circuit 20.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了满足该条件，图12所示的老化测试用基准电压生成电路10a具有图13所示的特性。 更具体地，当电源电压Vext在125℃的环境温度下为8V时，电压选择电路90可以输出5.3V的参考电压Vref。 换句话说，满足老化测试条件（即，图13中的点P10）的内部电压（Vint）可以提供给未示出的内部电路。 此外，当在125℃的环境温度下供应超过6.0V的外部电源电压Vext时，提供超过6.0V的外部电源电压Vext。 学位 参考电压Vref满足关系Vref=Vext-2。 7V被提供给差分放大电路20。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Meanwhile, if the ambient temperature decreases, in other words in the range of the ambient temperature from 0&deg; C. to 7&deg; C. for normal operation, the characteristic of the output reference voltage Vref is shifted to straight line 254 shown in FIG. 13. More specifically, reference voltage generation circuit for burn-in test 10a shown in FIG.  12 has a positive temperature characteristic, and therefore the output reference voltage Vref decreases along straight line 254 as a function of the decrease of the ambient temperature.  This brings about the following advantage in normal operation.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>同时，如果环境温度降低，换句话说，在环境温度从0℃至0℃的范围内； C至7℃； C.对于正常操作，输出参考电压Vref的特性被移位到图13中所示的直线254。 更具体地说，图12所示的老化测试用基准电压产生电路10a具有正温度特性，因此输出基准电压Vref作为环境温度下降的函数沿直线254下降。 这在正常操作中带来以下优点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Meanwhile, if the ambient temperature decreases, in other words in the range of the ambient temperature from 0&deg; C. to 7&deg; C. for normal operation, the characteristic of the output reference voltage Vref is shifted to straight line 254 shown in FIG. 13. More specifically, reference voltage generation circuit for burn-in test 10a shown in FIG.  12 has a positive temperature characteristic, and therefore the output reference voltage Vref decreases along straight line 254 as a function of the decrease of the ambient temperature.  This brings about the following advantage in normal operation.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>同时，如果环境温度降低，换句话说，在环境温度从0℃至0℃的范围内； C至7℃； C.对于正常操作，输出参考电压Vref的特性被移位到图13中所示的直线254。 更具体地说，图12所示的老化测试用基准电压产生电路10a具有正温度特性，因此输出基准电压Vref作为环境温度下降的函数沿直线254下降。 这在正常操作中带来以下优点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Various circuit structures can be employed for providing reference voltage generation circuit for burn-in test 10a shown in FIG.  14 with the above-described condition (i) and/or (ii). Generally, the threshold voltage Vtp of a PMOS transistor has a negative temperature characteristic. When the ambient temperature increases from 25&deg; C. to 125&deg; C., for example, the threshold voltage Vtp is decreased by about 0.1 V to 0.2 V. More specifically, as can be understood from equation (7), even if the resistance value R10 of resistor 136 does not have a temperature characteristic, I.sub.B can have a negative temperature characteristic. However, a material having a positive temperature characteristic is preferably used for resistor 136 to set a larger temperature coefficient for I.sub.B.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可以采用各种电路结构来提供具有上述条件（i）和/或（ii）的图14所示的老化测试用参考电压产生电路10a。 通常，PMOS晶体管的阈值电压Vtp具有负温度特性。 当环境温度从25℃升高时； C至125℃； 更具体地，如从等式（7）可以理解的，即使电阻器136的电阻值R10不具有温度特性，IB也可以具有负温度特性。 然而，具有正温度特性的材料优选地用于电阻器136以设定更大的温度系数用于I.B。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A burn-in test about a semiconductor integrated circuit device including the internal down converter as illustrated in FIG. 18 will be conducted as follows.  An external power supply voltage Vext giving the same ratio as that of an external power supply voltage Vext and an internal voltage Vint in normal operation at an ambient temperature of 25.  degree. C. (T=To=25&deg; C.) is selected as a burn-in point. Of course, the external voltage Vint is selected in the range not exceeding the breakdown voltage of the semiconductor elements in the circuit. More specifically, assuming that the semiconductor integrated circuit device is operated at the external power supply voltage Vext of 5 V and the internal voltage Vint of 3.3 in normal operation and the breakdown voltage is a little more than 7 V, Vext=7 V and Vint=4.6 V are selected for the burn-in point.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将如下进行关于包括如图18所示的内部降压变换器的半导体集成电路器件的老化测试。 外部电源电压Vext给出与在环境温度为25的正常操作中的外部电源电压Vext和内部电压Vint的比率相同的比率。 学位 T=T0=25℃)作为老化点。 当然，在不超过电路中半导体元件的击穿电压的范围内选择外部电压Vint。 更具体地，假设半导体集成电路器件在正常操作中在5V的外部电源电压Vext和3.3的内部电压Vint下操作，并且击穿电压稍大于7V，则选择Vext=7V和Vint=4.6V作为老化点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To provide a nonionic powdery detergent free from oozing of a liquid nonionic surfactant at ambient temperature and having excellent powder fluidity and non-caking properties and a solubility which is not deteriorated with time.<P><P>The nonionic powdery detergent composition comprises (a) 12 to 35% by weight of a nonionic surfactant having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB in the range of 9.0 to 16.0,<P><P>(b) 10 to 60% by weight of a crystalline aluminosilicate and<P><P>(c) 5 to 20% by weight of an amorphous oil-absorbing carrier containing at least 30% by weight of silicon (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state and having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0.5 g or below.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明提供一种在环境温度下不会渗出液体非离子表面活性剂并具有优异的粉末流动性和不结块性能以及不随时间劣化的溶解度的非离子粉状洗涤剂。所述非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物包含：（a）12-35重量%的熔点不高于40℃的非离子表面活性剂； <P><P>>(b)10-60重量%的结晶铝硅酸盐和<P><P>>(c)5-20重量%的无定形吸油载体，所述无定形吸油载体相对于所述无水状态的载体的重量含有至少30重量%的硅（以SiO2计）并具有至少80ml/100g的吸油容量，所述载体产生具有至少9的pH或以0.5g或更低的量可溶于2%NaOH水溶液的分散体。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>(a) 12 to 35% by weight of a nonionic surfactant having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB in the range of 9.  0 to 16.0.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>(a)12重量%至35重量%的熔点不高于40℃的非离子表面活性剂； 并且HLB在9的范围内。 0至16.0。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In other words, the invention provides a nonionic powder detergent composition comprising 12 to 35 wt. % of (a) a nonionic surfactant having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB value of 9.0 to 16.0, 10 to 60 wt. % of (b) a crystalline aluminosilicate and 5 to 20 wt. % of (c) an oil-absorbing carrier (c-1) containing at least 30 wt. % of silicon in terms of SiO.sub.2, (c- 2) having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier (c- 3) giving a dispersion with a pH value of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0. 5 g or less.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>换句话说，本发明提供了一种非离子粉末洗涤剂组合物，其包含12-35重量%的（a）熔点不高于40℃的非离子表面活性剂； 10-60重量%的(b)结晶铝硅酸盐和5-20重量%的(C)吸油载体(c-1)，所述吸油载体(c-1)含有以SiO2计至少30重量%的硅，(C-2)具有至少80ml/100g的吸油容量，所述载体(C-3)得到具有至少9的pH值的分散体或以0。 5g或更少。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The nonionic surfactant (a) used in the present invention is preferably one having a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C. and an HLB value in the range of 9.0 to 16.0, and more preferably 9. 0 to 14.  0, from the viewpoints of the removal of dirt as well as foaming and rinsing properties. The term HLB as used herein refers to a value calculated by a method described in J. T. Davies and E. K. Rideal, &quot;Interfacial Phenomena&quot; (Academic Press, New York, 1963), pages 371 to 383.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用于本发明的非离子表面活性剂（a）优选是熔点不高于40℃； 并且HLB值在9.0至16.0的范围内，并且更优选9。 0至14。 从污垢的去除以及发泡和漂洗性能的角度来看，本发明的组合物可以具有更高的粘度。 本文所用的术语HLB是指通过J.T.Davies和E.K.Rideal，“Interfacial Phenomena”（界面现象）中描述的方法计算的值。 （Academic Press，New York，1963），第371-383页。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The amorphous aluminosilicates having a high oil absorbency and a high ion-exchange capacity usable in the present invention are prepared by adding an aqueous solution of a low-alkali alkali metal aluminate having a M.sub.2 O/Al.sub.2 O.sub.3 (M being an alkali metal) molar ratio of 1.0 to 2.0 and a H.sub.2 O/M.sub.2 O molar ratio of 6.0 to 500 to an aqueous solution of an alkali metal silicate having a SiO. sub.2 /M. sub.  2 O molar ratio of 1.0 to 4.0 and a H.sub.2 O/M.sub.2 O molar ratio of 12 to 200 under vigorous stirring at 15&deg; to 60. degree. C., preferably 30&deg; to 50&deg; C. Alternatively, the aqueous solution of an alkali metal silicate may be added to the aqueous solution of an alkali metal aluminate.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可用于本发明的具有高吸油能力和高离子交换能力的无定形硅铝酸盐是通过将具有1.0-2.0摩尔比的M2O/Al2O3（M是碱金属）和6.0-500摩尔比的H2O/M2O的低碱金属铝酸盐的水溶液加入到具有SiO2的碱金属硅酸盐的水溶液中而制备的。 M. 短的 在15℃和剧烈搅拌下使H2O摩尔比为1.0至4.0和H2O/M.2O摩尔比为12至200； 至60。 学位 优选30℃； 至50℃； C.或者，可以将碱金属硅酸盐的水溶液加入到碱金属铝酸盐的水溶液中。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The intended product can be advantageously obtained by heat- treating a white slurry of precipitates thus formed at 70&deg; to 100.  degree. C., preferably 90&deg; to 100&deg; C., for 10 min to 10 h, preferably not longer than 5 h, followed by filtration, washing and drying. Thus the oil-absorbing amorphous aluminosilicate carrier having an ion-exchange capacity of at least 100 CaCO.sub.3 mg/g and an oil- absorbing capacity of at least 200 ml/100 g can be easily obtained (refer to Japanese Patent Laid-Open Nos. 191417/1987 and 191419/1987).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可以有利地通过在70℃下热处理由此形成的沉淀物的白色浆料来获得预期产物； 至100。 学位 优选90℃； 至100℃； 然后过滤、洗涤和干燥。 因此，可以容易地获得离子交换能力为至少100CaCO3mg/g和吸油能力为至少200ml/100g的吸油无定形硅铝酸盐载体（参见日本专利公开号191417/1987和191419/1987）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>More specifically, it is preferable to select such an oil- absorbing carrier that when 10 g thereof is dispersed in 100 ml of a 2% aqueous NaOH solution, the dispersion is stirred for 16 h while the temperature is kept at 25&deg; C., and SiO.sub.2 in the filtrate is subjected to colorimetric determination [as for the colorimetric determination, refer to Yukagaku, Vol. 25, p. 156 (1976)], the solubility thereof is 0.5 g or less, The oil-absorbing carriers satisfying this condition include sodium mordenite HSZ-640 NAA mfd. by Tosoh Corp. and some of the amorphous aluminosilicates of the above general formula (2).  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>更具体地，优选选择这样的吸油载体，使得当将10克吸油载体分散在100毫升2%NaOH水溶液中时，将分散体搅拌16小时，同时将温度保持在25℃； 对滤液中的SiO2进行比色测定[关于比色测定，参见Yukagaku，第25卷，第156页（1976）]，其溶解度为0.5g或更小，满足该条件的吸油载体包括丝光沸石HSZ-640 NAA。 以及一些上述通式（2）的无定形硅铝酸盐。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>An open box having a length of 10. 2 cm, a width of 6.2 cm and a height of 4 cm was made from a coated board (640 g/m.sup.2) and the four corners thereof were fixed with a stapler. 100 g of the sample was placed in the box. An acrylic resin plate (15 g) and a lead plate (250 g) (total weight: 265 g) were placed thereon, and they were left to stand in a thermohygrostatic chamber at 30&deg; C. and 80% RH for 7 days. The extent of oozing into the coated board after the test was determined based on the following criteria:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>长度为10的开口盒。 由涂覆板(640g/m.sup.2)制成2cm、6.2cm宽和4cm高的板，并用订书机固定其四个角。 将100g样品置于盒中。 将丙烯酸树脂板(15g)和铅板(250g)（总重量:265g)放置在其上，并将它们静置在30℃； C和80%RH下7天。 基于以下标准确定测试后渗入涂覆板中的程度：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The powdery detergent was placed in a Petri dish and left to stand at 30&deg; C. and 70% RH for 3 days and 0.83 g of the detergent was taken as the sample, which was added to 1 l of city water at 10. degree.  C. and the solution was stirred with a magnetic stirrer for 10 min and filtered through a 200-mesh metal gauze. After drying, the filtration residue rate (%) was determined.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将粉末状洗涤剂置于培养皿中并在30℃下静置； 并且取0.83g洗涤剂作为样品，将其在10℃下添加到1L城市水中。 学位 将溶液用磁力搅拌器搅拌10分钟，并通过200目金属网过滤。 干燥后，测定过滤残留物率（%）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The quantity of the oil-absorbing carrier dissolved in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution was determined by dispersing 10 g of the oil- absorbing carrier in 100 ml of a 2% aqueous NaOH solution, stirring the dispersion for 16 h while the temperature was kept at 25&deg; C. and dertermining SiO.sub.2 in the filtrate by colorimetric determination [as for the colorimetric determination, refer to Yukagaku, Vol. 25, p. 156 (1976)]. Namely, the quantity of the oil-absorbing carrier dissolved in the aqueous NaOH solution calculated from the SiO.sub.2 content of the oil- absorbing carrier previously determined by elementary analysis was calculated.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>700 g of an aqueous sodium silicate solution (Na.sub.2 O: 2.71% by weight, SiO.sub.2 :8.29% by weight and SiO.sub.2 /Na.sub.2 O molar ratio: 3.15) was heated to 60&deg; C. and 1010 g of an aqueous sodium aluminate solution (Na.sub.2 O:1.63% by weight, Al.sub.2 O.sub.3 :2. 26% by weight and Na.sub.2 O/Al.sub.2 O.sub.3 molar ratio: 1.18) was added to the solution under stirring at 1500 rpm. After the completion of the addition, the solution was heat-treated at that temperature for 15 min and the resulting wet cake was dried at 110&deg; C. and pulverized to obtain 100 g of fine powder of the aluminosilicate which was found to be amorphous by X-ray crystallography. The composition of the resulting amorphous aluminosilicate was: Na.sub.2 O:SiO.sub.2 :Al.sub.2 O.sub. 3 =29.4:44.5:26.1. The resulting amorphous aluminosilicate had an ion- exchange capacity of 121 CaCO.sub.3 mg/g, an oil-absorbing capacity of 225 ml/100 g, and a solubility in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution of 0. 01 g, and the pH of a 5% dispersion thereof was 11.2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将700g硅酸钠水溶液(Na2O:2.71重量%，SiO2:8.29重量%和SiO2/Na2O摩尔比：3.15）加热至60℃； 然后在1500rpm搅拌下将1010g铝酸钠水溶液(Na2O:1.63重量%，Al2O3:2.26重量%和Na2O/Al2O3摩尔比：1.18）加入到溶液中。 添加完成后，将溶液在该温度下热处理15min，并将所得湿滤饼在110℃下干燥； C.并粉碎，得到100 g硅铝酸盐细粉，通过X-射线结晶学发现其为无定形的。 所得无定形硅铝酸盐的组成为:Na2O:SiO2:Al2O3。 3=29.4:44.5:26.1。 所得无定形硅铝酸盐的离子交换容量为121CaCO3mg/g，吸油容量为225ml/100g，在2%NaOH水溶液中的溶解度为0.1。 并且其5%分散体的pH为11.2。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>100 parts by weight of No. 3 water glass (prepared by adding 150 parts by weight of ion-exchanged water to 100 parts by weight of commercially available No. 3 waterglass) was added dropwise to 800 parts by weight of an aqueous sodium aluminate solution (prepared by adding 2000 parts by weight of ion-exchanged water to 100 parts by weight of an aqueous sodium aluminate solution having Na.sub.2 O:Al.sub.2 O.sub. 3 :H. sub.2 O weight ratio of 20.3:28.2:51.5) over 20 min. After the reaction was conducted for 10 min, and the reaction mixture was heated at 100.  degree. C. and aged for 10 min. The resulting cake was taken by filtration and it was washed until the pH of the filtrate reached 12.0, dried at 100&deg; C. for 11 h and finely pulverized with a pulverizer to obtain an amorphous aluminosilicate. The composition of the resulting amorphous aluminosilicate was: Na.sub.2 O:SiO.sub.2 :Al.sub.2 O.sub.  3 =19.59:47. 39:33.03. The resulting amorphous aluminosilicate had an ion- exchange capacity of 115 CaCO.sub.3 mg/g and an oil-absorbing capacity of 250 ml/100 g, and the pH of a 5% dispersion thereof was 11.2 (solubility in a 2% NaOH solution was 0.02 g).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在20分钟内将100重量份3号水玻璃（通过向100重量份市售3号水玻璃中加入150重量份离子交换水制备）滴加到800重量份铝酸钠水溶液（通过向100重量份Na2O:Al2O3:H2O重量比为20.3:28.2:51.5的铝酸钠水溶液中加入2000重量份离子交换水制备）中。 反应进行10分钟后，将反应混合物在100℃加热。 学位 C.并老化10分钟。 通过过滤取出所得滤饼，并将其洗涤直至滤液的pH达到12.0，在100℃下干燥； C.处理11小时，并用粉碎机精细粉碎，得到无定形铝硅酸盐。 所得无定形硅铝酸盐的组成为:Na2O:SiO2:Al2O3。 3=19.59:47。 39：33.03. 所得无定形硅铝酸盐具有115CaCO3mg/g的离子交换能力和250ml/100g的吸油能力，并且其5%分散体的pH为11.2（在2%NaOH溶液中的溶解度为0.02g)。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>1500 g of the nonionic powdery detergent prepared as described above was placed in a paper container (14.8 cm width&times;8.7 cm length.  times. 16 cm height) of which inner walls are laminated with a polymer specified in Table 6 to form a film having a thickness of about 25 . mu..  An acrylic resin plate (15 g) and a lead plate (250 g) (total weight: 265 g) were placed thereon and they were left to stand in a thermohygrostatic chamber at 30&deg; C. and 80% RH for 10 days.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将1500g如上所述制备的非离子粉状洗涤剂置于纸容器(14.8cm宽×8.7cm长×16cm高）中，其内壁与表6中指定的聚合物层压以形成厚度为约25cm的膜。 mu。 将丙烯酸树脂板(15g)和铅板(250g)（总重量:265g)放置在其上，并将它们静置在30℃； C和80%RH下10天。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>15. A nonionic powder detergent composition comprising (a) 12 to 35% by weight of a polyoxyethylene alkyl ether having 10 to 20 carbon atoms, an average molar number of added ethylene oxide of 5 to 15 and a melting point of not higher than 40&deg; C., (b) 10 to 60% by weight of a crystalline aluminosilicate, (c) 5 to 20% by weight of an amorphous oil- absorbing carrier selected from the group consisting of silica and aluminosilicates (c-1) containing at least 30% by weight of silicon in terms of SiO.sub.2, (c-2) having an oil-absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, said carrier (c-3) giving a dispersion with a pH value of at least 9 or being soluble in a 2% aqueous NaOH solution in an amount of 0.  5 g or less and (d) below 5% by weight of sodium silicate, obtained by a process comprising the steps of:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>15. 一种非离子粉末洗涤剂组合物，其包含：（a）12-35重量%的聚氧乙烯烷基醚，其具有10-20个碳原子，平均加成环氧乙烷摩尔数为5-15，熔点不高于40℃； （c）5-20重量%的选自二氧化硅和硅铝酸盐的无定形吸油载体（c-1），其含有以SiO2计至少30重量%的硅，（c-2）具有至少80ml/100g的吸油能力，所述载体（c-3）得到pH值至少为9的分散体或以0。 (d)低于5重量%的硅酸钠，其通过包括以下步骤的方法获得：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The rate of dissociation was determined using competition assays. An excess of unlabelled oligonucleotide that contained the UL9 binding site was added to each reaction. This unlabelled oligonucleotide acts as a specific inhibitor, capturing the UL9 protein as it dissociates from the labelled oligonucleotide (Example 4B). The dissociation rate, as determined by a band-shift assay, for both full length UL9 and UL9-COOH was approximately 4 hours at 4&deg; C. or approximately 10 minutes at room temperature. Neither non-specific oligonucleotides (a 10,000-fold excess) nor sheared herring sperm DNA (a 100,000-fold excess) competed for binding with the oligonucleotide containing the UL9 binding site.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>使用竞争测定法测定解离速率。 向每个反应中加入过量的含有UL9结合位点的未标记寡核苷酸。 该未标记的寡核苷酸充当特异性抑制剂，在UL9蛋白与标记的寡核苷酸解离时捕获UL9蛋白（实施例4B)。 对于全长UL9和UL9-COOH，通过带移测定法测定的解离速率在4℃下为约4小时； 或在室温下约10分钟。 非特异性寡核苷酸（10,000倍过量）和剪切的鲱鱼精子DNA（100,000倍过量）都不与含有UL9结合位点的寡核苷酸竞争结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Clonal isolates of recombinant baculovirus infected Sf9 cells were grown in Grace's medium as described by Summers, et al. The cells were scraped from tissue culture plates and collected by centrifugation (2,000 rpm, for 5 minutes, 4&deg; C.). The cells were then washed once with phosphate buffered saline (PBS) (Maniatis, et al.). Cell pellets were frozen at -70&deg; C. For lysis the cells were resuspended in 1.5 volumes 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 1.7 M NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dithiothreitol (DTT), and 0.5 mM phenyl methyl sulfonyl fluoride (PMSF).  Cell lysates were cleared by ultracentrifugation (Beckman table top ultracentrifuge, TLS 55 rotor, 34 krpm, 1 hr, 4&deg; C.). The supernatant was dialyzed overnight at 4. degree. C. against 2 liters dialysis buffer (20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 50 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dtt, and 0.1 mM PMSF).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如Summers等所述，将重组杆状病毒感染的Sf9细胞的克隆分离物在Grace培养基中生长。将细胞从组织培养板上刮下并通过离心（2,000rpm，5分钟，4℃)收集。 然后用磷酸盐缓冲盐水(PBS)（Maniatis等人）洗涤细胞一次。 将细胞沉淀在-70℃下冷冻； C.为了裂解，将细胞重悬于1.5倍体积的20 mM HEPES，pH 7.5，10%甘油，1.7M NaCl，0.5 mM EDTA，1 mM二硫苏糖醇（DTT），和0.5 mM苯基甲基磺酰氟（PMSF）中。 通过超速离心（Beckman台式超速离心机，TLS 55转子，34krpm，1小时，4℃)澄清细胞裂解物。 将上清液在4℃透析过夜。 学位 C.针对2升透析缓冲液(20mM HEPES，pH 7.5，10%甘油，50mM NaCl，0.5mM EDTA，1mM dtt和0.1mM PMSF）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Clonal isolates of recombinant baculovirus infected Sf9 cells were grown in Grace's medium as described by Summers, et al. The cells were scraped from tissue culture plates and collected by centrifugation (2,000 rpm, for 5 minutes, 4&deg; C.). The cells were then washed once with phosphate buffered saline (PBS) (Maniatis, et al.). Cell pellets were frozen at -70&deg; C. For lysis the cells were resuspended in 1.5 volumes 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 1.7 M NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dithiothreitol (DTT), and 0.5 mM phenyl methyl sulfonyl fluoride (PMSF).  Cell lysates were cleared by ultracentrifugation (Beckman table top ultracentrifuge, TLS 55 rotor, 34 krpm, 1 hr, 4&deg; C.). The supernatant was dialyzed overnight at 4. degree. C. against 2 liters dialysis buffer (20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 50 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dtt, and 0.1 mM PMSF).</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>E. coli strain JM109 was transformed with pGEX-2T/C-UL9-COOH and was grown at 37&deg; C. to saturation density overnight. The overnight culture was diluted 1:10 with LB medium containing ampicillin and grown from one hour at 30&deg; C. IPTG (isopropyllthio-&bgr;- galactoside) (GIBCO-BRL) was added to a final concentration of 0.1 mM and the incubation was continued for 2-5 hours.  Bacterial cells containing the plasmid were subjected to the temperature shift and IPTG conditions, which induced transcription from the tac promoter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用pGEX-2T/C-UL9-COOH转化大肠杆菌菌株JM109，并在37℃下生长； C.至饱和密度过夜。 将过夜培养物用含有氨苄青霉素的LB培养基1:10稀释，并在30℃下生长1小时； C.加入IPTG（异丙基硫代-β-半乳糖苷）（GIBCO-BRL）至终浓度为0.1 mM，继续温育2-5小时。 使含有质粒的细菌细胞经受温度转变和IPTG条件，其诱导从tac启动子的转录。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In the competition assays, the binding reactions (Example 4A) were assembled with each of the oligonucleotides and placed on ice.  Unlabelled oligonucleo- tide (1 &mgr;g) was added 1, 2, 4, 6, or 21 hours before loading the reaction on an 8% polyacrylamide gel (run in TBE buffer (Maniatis, et al.)) to separate the reaction components. The dissociation rates, under these conditions, for the truncated UL9 (UL9- COOH) and the full length UL9 is approximately 4 hours at 4&deg; C. In addition, random oligonucleotides (a 10,000-fold excess) that did not contain the UL9 binding sequence and sheared herring sperm DNA (a 100, 000-fold excess) were tested: neither of these control DNAs competed for binding with the oligonucleotide containing the UL9 binding site.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在竞争测定中，用每种寡核苷酸组装结合反应（实施例4A)并置于冰上。 在将反应物上样到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶（在TBE缓冲液（Maniatis等人）中运行）之前1、2、4、6或21小时加入未标记的寡核苷酸(1mgr.g)以分离反应组分。 在这些条件下，截短的UL9(UL9-COOH)和全长UL9的解离速率在4℃下为约4小时； C.另外，测试了不含UL9结合序列的随机寡核苷酸（10,000倍过量）和剪切的鲱鱼精子DNA（100,000倍过量）：这些对照DNA都不与含有UL9结合位点的寡核苷酸竞争结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The optimized conditions used for the binding of UL9-COOH contained in bacterial extracts (Example 2E) to oligonucleotides containing the HSV ori sequence (SEQ ID NO:601) were as follows: 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.2, 50 mM KCl, 1 mM DTT, 0.005-0.1 ng radiolabeled (specific activity, approximately 10.sup.8 cpm/&mgr;g) or digoxiginated, biotinylated oligonucleotide probe, and 5-10 &mgr;g crude UL9-COOH protein preparation (1 mM EDTA is optional in the reaction mix). Under optimized conditions, UL9-COOH binds very rapidly and has a dissociation rate of about 4 hours at 4&deg; C. with non-biotinylated oligonucleotide and 5-10 minutes with biotinylated oligonucleotides. The dissociation rate of UL9-COOH changes markedly under different physical conditions.  Typically, the activity of a UL9 protein preparation was assessed using the gel band- shift assay and related to the total protein content of the extract as a method of standardization. The addition of herring sperm DNA depended on the purity of UL9 used in the experiment Binding assays were incubated at 25&deg; C. for 5-30 minutes.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用于细菌提取物（实施例2E)中含有的UL9-COOH与含有HSV ori序列（SEQ ID NO:601)的寡核苷酸结合的优化条件如下:20mM HEPES，pH 7.2，50mM KCl，1mM DTT，0.005-0.1ng放射性标记的（比活性，约10.sup.8cpm/μg/g)或洋地黄毒苷化的生物素化寡核苷酸探针，和5-10μg/g粗UL9-COOH蛋白质制备物(1mM EDTA在反应混合物中是任选的）。 在优化的条件下，UL9-COOH非常快速地结合，并且在4℃下具有约4小时的解离速率； C.用非生物素化的寡核苷酸，用生物素化的寡核苷酸5-10分钟。 UL9-COOH的解离速率在不同的物理条件下显著变化。 通常，使用凝胶带移测定评估UL9蛋白制剂的活性，并将其与提取物的总蛋白含量相关联作为标准化方法。 鲱鱼精子DNA的添加取决于实验结合测定中使用的UL9的纯度。 C.持续5-30分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Biotinylated agarose beads (immobilized D-biotin, Pierce, Rockford, Ill.)  are bound to avidin by treating the beads with 50 &mgr;g/.  mu.l avidin in binding buffer overnight at 4&deg; C. The beads are washed in binding buffer and used to capture biotinylated DNA. The beads are mixed with binding mixtures to capture biotinylated DNA. The beads are removed by centrifugation or by collection on a non-binding filter disc. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>生物素化的琼脂糖珠（固定化的D-生物素，Pierce，Rockford，Ill.）通过用50μg/ml处理珠与抗生物素蛋白结合。 在结合缓冲液中的μl抗生物素蛋白在4℃下过夜； C.将珠粒在结合缓冲液中洗涤并用于捕获生物素化的DNA。 将珠粒与结合混合物混合以捕获生物素化的DNA。 通过离心或通过在非结合过滤盘上收集除去珠粒。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Radioactive-labeling of the primer with .sup.32 P is accomplished by the enzymatic transfer of a radioactive phosphate from &ggr;-.sup. 32 P- ATP to the 5' end of the primer oligonucleotide using T4 polynucleotide kinase (Ausubel, et al.). For labeling 256 oligonucleotides, approximately 60 &mgr;g HSV primer was labeled as follows. The oligonucleotide was incubated for 1 hour at 37&deg; C. with 125 &mgr;l . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP (20 mCi total, 7000 Ci/mmol) and 600 units of T4 polynucleotide kinase in a 3 ml reaction volume containing 50 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 10 MM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM spermidine, and 1.5 mM dithiothreitol (freshly prepared). To stop the reaction, EDTA was added to a final concentration of 20 mM. Unincorporated nucleotides were removed using &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; chromatography in 10 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA (TE+50).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用32P对引物进行放射性标记是通过酶促转移放射性磷酸酯从99gR-完成的。 使用T4多核苷酸激酶（Ausubel等人）将32P-ATP连接到引物寡核苷酸的5'末端。 为了标记256个寡核苷酸，如下标记约60μg HSV引物。 将寡核苷酸在37℃下孵育1小时； C.与125名经理； γ-32P-ATP(20mCi，7000Ci/mmol)和600单位T4多核苷酸激酶在含有50mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5、10mM MgCl2、10mM亚精胺和1.5mM二硫苏糖醇（新鲜制备的）的3ml反应体积中。 为了终止反应，加入EDTA至终浓度为20mM。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”去除未掺入的核苷酸。 在10mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA(TE+50)中进行色谱。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radioactive primer was individually annealed to the top strand of each of the 256 test oligonucleotides. The bottom strand is synthesized using deoxyribonucleotides and Klenow fragment or T4 polymerase (Ausubel, et al.).  The annealing mixture typically contained 200 ng HSV primer mixed with 1 &mgr;g top strand in 20 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.  5, 1 mM spermidine, and 0.1 mM EDTA (35 &mgr;l reaction volume). The primer was annealed to the top strand by incubating the sample for 2 minutes at 70&deg; C., then placing the sample at room temperature or on ice. To the annealing mixture, 4.5 &mgr;l 10&times; Klenow buffer (10.  times.=200 mM Tris-HCL, 500 mM NaCl, 50 mM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM dithiothreitol), 5 &mgr;l 0.5 mM each dNTP (dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dTTP), and 1 &mgr;l Klenow fragment were added. This reaction mixture was incubated 30-60 minutes at room temperature (or up to 37&deg; C.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>
