detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA were incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay was begun by adding water (control samples) or distamycin (5-15 AM, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12-channel micropipettor.  After incubation with drug for 5-120 minutes, samples were taken and applied to nitrocellulose on a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell). The samples were held at 4&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或偏端霉素(5-15AM，测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育5-120分钟后，取样并施加到96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）上的硝酸纤维素上。 将样品保持在4℃； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A 96-well dot blot apparatus was used to capture the DNA:protein complexes on a nitrocellulose filter. The filters used in the dot blot apparatus were pretreated as follows. The nitrocellulose filter was pre- wetted with water and soaked in UL9 binding buffer. The filter was then placed on 1 to 3 pieces of 3 MM filter paper, which were also presoaked in UL9 binding buffer. All filters were chilled to 4&deg; C. prior to placement in the apparatus.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>使用96孔斑点印迹装置在硝酸纤维素滤膜上捕获DNA：蛋白质复合物。 如下预处理斑点印迹装置中使用的滤膜。 将硝酸纤维素过滤器用水预润湿并浸泡在UL9结合缓冲液中。 然后将过滤器置于1至3片3mm滤纸上，所述滤纸也在UL9结合缓冲液中预浸。 将所有过滤器冷却至4℃； C.在放置在设备中之前。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA were incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay was begun by adding water (control samples) or actinomycin D (25 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12-channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 30 minutes, samples were taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C. FIG. 18 shows the results of 8 screens of actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或放线菌素D(25μg/ml，测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育30分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.图18显示放线菌素D的8次筛选的结果。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA are incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay is begun by adding water (control samples) or test molecule (typically at 1- 5 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12- channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 5-120 minutes, samples are taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或测试分子（通常为1-5μg/ml测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育5-120分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Still referring primarily to FIG. 2, the main housing 11 provides the connection between the contact head 13 and the light fixture (not shown).  Specifically, a bushing 37 is provided with two holes 38, 39 which accommodate the screws 41, 42 which attach the bushing to the fixture. The screws 41, 42 pass through the holes 43, 44 of the washer 45 which also includes a center hole 46 for accommodating the lead wires of the light fixture (not shown). The washer is disposed on top of a wavy or undulating washer 47 which provides some resistance to the pivotal connection between the washer 45 and the bushing 37 so that the fixture maintains its position and is not rotated or shifted by normal household or environmental vibrations. An additional washer 48 with a ground connecting tab 49 is disposed between the wavy washer 47 and the over- center ring 51. The over-center ring 51 rides on top of the flange 52 of the bushing 37 and provides less than 360&deg; of rotation due to the engagement of the tab 53 on the over-center ring 51 with the step 54 disposed on the bushing 37. However, more than 360&deg; of rotation is provided because the over-center ring 51 is free to rotate with respect to the bottom 55 of the housing 11 until one of the steps on the over- center ring 51 shown at 56, 57 in FIG. 2 engaged the step shown at 58 in FIG. 26. The springs 125, 126 are disposed in the vertical passages 59, 60 which have a bottom (see FIGS. 24 and 26) and engage the keys 121, 122 disposed at a lower end of the ribs 62, 63 which are disposed in the corners of the sliding collar 12. As a result, the collar 12 is biased in the upward direction and removal and/or installation of the adapter 10 requires an initial pulling down of the collar 12. The ribs 62, 63 slidably engage the indents 64, 65 disposed in the diagonally opposed corners of the contact head body 13.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>仍然主要参考图2，主壳体11提供接触头13和灯具（未示出）之间的连接。 具体地，衬套37设置有两个孔38、39，这两个孔38、39容纳将衬套附接到固定装置的螺钉41、42。 螺钉41、42穿过垫圈45的孔43、44，垫圈45还包括用于容纳灯具（未示出）的引线的中心孔46。 该垫圈设置在波浪形或波状垫圈47的顶部上，该波浪形或波状垫圈47对垫圈45和衬套37之间的枢转连接提供一定的阻力，使得固定装置保持其位置并且不会由于正常的家庭或环境振动而旋转或移位。 具有接地连接片49的附加垫圈48设置在波形垫圈47和偏心环51之间。 偏心环51骑在衬套37的凸缘52的顶部上并且提供小于360度； 由于偏心环51上的凸片53与设置在衬套37上的台阶54的接合，因此旋转力可以减小。 然而，超过360度； 提供旋转，因为偏心环51相对于壳体11的底部55自由旋转，直到图2中的56、57处所示的偏心环51上的台阶中的一个接合图26中的58处所示的台阶。 弹簧125、126设置在具有底部（参见图24和26）的竖直通道59、60中，并且与设置在肋62、63的下端处的键121、122接合，肋62、63设置在滑动套环12的角部中。 因此，套环12在向上方向上偏置，并且适配器10的移除和/或安装需要套环12的初始下拉。 肋62、63可滑动地接合设置在接触头本体13的对角相对的角部中的凹口64、65。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To accommodate this design feature, the contact head 13, as shown in FIG. 8, includes a pair of upper opposing slots 98, 99 as illustrated in FIGS. 8 and 14. The slot 99 is accommodated over the ledge 92 and the slot 98 is accommodated over the thinner ledge 91. The orientation of these slots 98, 99 also prevent the adapter 10 from being installed in the wrong way or with the wrong polarity. Specifically, because the ledge 92 and the portion of the insert 94 covering the ledge 92 are too thick to be accommodated in the slot 98, any attempt to insert the adapter 10 in the wrong way, or rotated 180&deg; with respect to the appropriate alignment, will result in the thinner slot 98 being aligned with the thicker ledge 92. Because the thicker ledge 92 cannot be accommodated in the thinner slot 98, the portion of the contact head body 13 shown at 101 serves as a stop barrier and prevents the rotation of the adapter 10 when it is inserted through the central channel of the track 86 in the wrong way, or 180&deg; out of phase with respect to the correct alignment. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了适应这种设计特征，如图8所示，接触头13包括一对相对的上槽98、99，如图8和14所示。 狭槽99容纳在凸缘92上，并且狭槽98容纳在较薄的凸缘91上。 这些狭槽98、99的取向还防止适配器10以错误的方式或以错误的极性安装。 具体地，因为凸耳92和插入件94的覆盖凸耳92的部分太厚而不能容纳在狭槽98中，所以任何试图以错误的方式插入适配器10或旋转180度； 关于适当的对准，将导致较薄的槽98与较厚的凸缘92对准。 因为较厚的凸缘92不能容纳在较薄的槽98中，所以接触头本体13的以101示出的部分用作止挡屏障，并且当适配器10以错误的方式或180度插入穿过轨道86的中心通道时防止适配器10旋转； 相对于正确对准异相。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Surprisingly, the catalytic activity of the platinum metal layer deposited according to the present invention is about 40 to about 80 percent greater than without the additon of sulfonic acid and about 30 to about 40 percent greater than with sulfonate added. This is achieved with the same quantity of the catalyzing agent, with an increased number of seeds per &mgr;m.sup.2 (70 with the addition of sulfonic acid versus 20 with standard activation) and a seed size which is below the detection limit of field emission scanning electron microscopes. Thereby the surface of the catalizing agent layer is largely increased. The seed distribution is very homogenous over the surface.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>令人惊讶的是，根据本发明沉积的铂金属层的催化活性比不添加磺酸的情况高约40%至约80%，并且比添加磺酸盐的情况高约30%至约40%。 这是用相同量的催化剂实现的，其中每mgm2的晶种数量增加（加入磺酸时为70个，而标准活化时为20个），并且晶种尺寸低于场发射扫描电子显微镜的检测极限。 从而大大增加了催化剂层的表面。 种子分布在表面上非常均匀。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>are preferred. The crystalline aluminosilicates (zeolites) preferably used are synthetic zeolites having an average primary particle diameter of 0.1 to 10 &mgr; typified by zeolite A and zeolite X. Zeolite is incorporated in the form of a powder and/or a dry particle of zeolite aggregate obtained by drying a zeolite slurry.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>是优选的。 优选使用的结晶硅铝酸盐（沸石）是平均初级粒径为0.1-10微米的合成沸石； 沸石以通过干燥沸石浆料获得的沸石聚集体的粉末和/或干燥颗粒的形式掺入。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The oil-absorbing carriers used as the component (c) in the present invention include amorphous silica and aluminosilicates containing at least 30% by weight, preferably at least 40% by weight and more preferably at least 70% by weight (in terms of SiO.sub.2) versus the weight of said carrier in an anhydrous state, of silicon, having an oil- absorbing capacity of at least 80 ml/100 g, preferably at least 150 ml/100 g and more preferably at least 200 ml/100 g, and giving a dispersion with a pH of at least 9 (test method: JIS K 6220). Amorphous silica and aluminosilicates having an average particle diameter of up to around 200 &mgr; are available on the market, and the carrier of the present invention may be selected therefrom. Examples of such an oil- absorbing amorphous silica include Tokusil AL-1 (mfd. by Tokuyama Soda Co.  , Ltd.), Nipsil NA (mfd. by Nippon Silica Ind.), Carplex #100 (mfd. by Shionogi Pharmacy) and Sipernat D10 (Degussa AG.). Examples of the oil- absorbing amorphous aluminosilicate include an oil-absorbing carrier available on the market under a trade name of Tixolex 25 (Kofran Chemical) . The oil-absorbing carriers satisfying the above- described conditions are also found in clayey substances and they include sodium mordenite HSZ- 640 NAA (mfd. by Tosoh Corp.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在本发明中用作组分（c）的吸油载体包括无定形二氧化硅和硅铝酸盐，相对于无水状态的所述载体的重量，其含有至少30重量%，优选至少40重量%，更优选至少70重量%（以SiO2计）的硅，其吸油能力为至少80ml/100g，优选至少150 ml/100g，更优选至少200 ml/100g，并得到pH为至少9的分散体（测试方法：JIS K 6220）。 无定形二氧化硅和铝硅酸盐，其平均粒径高达约200μm； 本发明的载体可以在市场上获得，并且本发明的载体可以从中选择。 这种吸油无定形二氧化硅的实例包括Tokusil AL-1（由Tokuyama Soda Co.，Ltd.制造）、Nipsil NA（由Nippon Silica Ind.制造）、Carplex#100（由Shionogi Pharmacy制造）和Sipernat D 10（Degussa AG.）。 吸油无定形硅铝酸盐的实例包括在市场上以商品名Tixolex 25(Kofran Chemical）可获得的吸油载体。 满足上述条件的吸油载体也存在于粘土状物质中，它们包括丝光沸石钠HSZ-640 NAA（Tosoh Corp.制造）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The composition of the present invention preferably contains sodium carbonate as an alkali. Sodium carbonate includes heavy sodium carbonate (heavy ash) and light sodium carbonate (light ash). It has an average particle diameter of 10 to 2000 &mgr;, preferably 100 to 1000 &mgr; . Sodium carbonate is incorporated in an amount of 5 to 35% by weight, preferably 5 to 25% by weight, based on the whole composition.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的组合物优选含有碳酸钠作为碱。 碳酸钠包括重碳酸钠（重灰分）和轻质碳酸钠（轻灰分）。 其平均粒径为10-2000微米，优选100-1000微米； 碳酸钠以基于整个组合物按重量计5%至35%、优选按重量计5%至25%的量掺入。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The nonionic powdery detergent composition of the present invention can be easily produced by mixing a crystalline aluminosilicate, an oil- absorbing carrier and, if necessary, a powdery component such as sodium carbonate together, while a liquid nonionic surfactant is gradually added thereto or sprayed thereon to obtain a homogeneous mixture, and then mixing it with minor components such as perfume or enzyme, a crystalline aluminosilicate powder as the surface- modifying agent, a bleaching agent used when the composition is a bleach- detergent, etc. When the particle diameter of the powdery detergent is increased (200 to 1000 &mgr;, preferably 300 to 700 &mgr;), the properties of the powder during the storage for a long period of time are further improved.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物可以通过将结晶铝硅酸盐、吸油载体和（如果需要的话）粉状组分如碳酸钠混合在一起，同时将液体非离子表面活性剂逐渐加入其中或喷洒在其上以获得均匀混合物，然后将其与少量组分如香料或酶、作为表面改性剂的结晶铝硅酸盐粉末、当组合物是漂白洗涤剂时使用的漂白剂等混合来容易地制备。 优选300至700℃)，粉末在长时间储存期间的性质进一步改善。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The lamination can be conducted by any conventional process. It is preferred, however, to apply the polymer to the surface of a paper having a basis weight of 400 to 700 g/m.sup.2 to form a polymer film having a thickness of 5 to 40 &mgr;, preferably 10 to 40 &mgr;. The shape of the container is preferably one having only little bonded parts.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>层压可以通过任何常规方法进行。 然而，优选将聚合物施加到基重为400至700g/m2的纸的表面上，以形成厚度为5至40μm、优选10至40μm的聚合物膜。 容器的形状优选是仅具有很少粘合部分的形状。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3 % by weight of tallow soap, zeolite 4A in an amount as specified in Table 2, an oil-absorbing carrier having properties as specified in Table 1 (wherein the pH of 5% dispersion was determined according to JIS K 6220) in an amount as specified in Table 2, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.  5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol having an average molecular weight of 12000 was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 385 &mgr;.  Further 0.54 by weight of an enzyme, 0.3% by weight of a perfume and 5% by weight of zeolite 4A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition as specified in Table 2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>3重量%的牛脂皂、表2中规定的量的沸石4A、表2中规定的量的具有表1中规定的性质的吸油载体（其中5%分散体的pH根据JIS K 6220测定）、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.1重量%的聚丙烯酸钠。 将5重量%荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的Bench Kneader PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐加入液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的平均分子量为12000的熔融聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为385微米的粉状洗涤剂基料。 此外，向其中加入0.54重量%的酶、0.3重量%的香料和5重量%的沸石4A并混合在一起，以获得具有表2中指定的组成的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above-described powdery starting materials [tallow soap, zeolite A (in an amount corresponding to 25% by weight), amorphous aluminosilicate, sodium carbonate (average particle diameter: 290 . mu.), No. 2 sodium silicate, Glauber's salt, carboxymethylcellulose, sodium polyacrylate and fluororescent dye] were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 mfd. by Irie Shokai).  Polyoxyethylene dodecyl ether and coconut oil fatty acid diethanolamide were gradually introduced thereinto and then molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 402 &mgr;. The enzyme, perfume and a small amount (corresponding to 15% by weight) of zeolite A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a final detergent product having a composition described above and a bulk density of 0.75 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将上述粉状原料[牛脂皂、沸石A（其量相当于25重量%)、无定形硅铝酸盐、碳酸钠（平均粒径:290μm)、2号硅酸钠、芒硝、羧甲基纤维素、聚丙烯酸钠和荧光染料]置于间歇式捏合机（由Irie Shokai制造的台式捏合机PNV-1)中。 向其中逐渐引入聚氧乙烯十二烷基醚和椰子油脂肪酸二乙醇酰胺，然后向其中加入熔融的聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为402μm的粉状洗涤剂基料。 向其中加入酶、香料和少量（相当于15重量%）沸石A并混合在一起，得到具有上述组成和体积密度为0.75g/ml的最终洗涤剂产品。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>3% by weight of tallow soap, zeolite 4A [component (b)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, an oil-absorbing carrier [component (c)] in an amount as specified in Table 6, the balance of sodium carbonate, 3% by weight of sodium polyacrylate and 0.5% by weight of a fluorescent dye were placed in a batch kneader (Bench Kneader PNV-1 of Irie Shokai). A liquid nonionic surfactant in an amount as specified in Table 6 was gradually introduced thereinto and then 2% by weight of molten polyethylene glycol was added thereto to obtain a powdery detergent base having an average particle diameter of 385 &mgr;.0.5% by weight of an enzyme, 0.3% by weight of a perfume and 5% by weight of zeolite 4A were added thereto and mixed together to obtain a nonionic powdery detergent having a bulk density of 0.7 g/ml.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将3重量%的牛脂皂、表6中规定量的沸石4A[组分（b）]、表6中规定量的吸油载体[组分（c）]、余量的碳酸钠、3重量%的聚丙烯酸钠和0.5重量%的荧光染料置于间歇式捏合机（Irie Shokai的台式捏合机PNV-1）中。 向其中逐渐加入表6中规定量的液体非离子表面活性剂，然后向其中加入2重量%的熔融聚乙二醇，得到平均粒径为385微米的粉状洗涤剂基料。向其中加入0.5重量%的酶、0.3重量%的香料和5重量%的沸石4A，混合在一起，得到堆积密度为0.7克/毫升的非离子粉状洗涤剂。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>11. The nonionic powdery detergent composition according to claim 1, which has a bulk density of 0.6 to 1.2 g/cm.sup.3 and an average particle diameter of 200 to 1000 &mgr;.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>11. 根据权利要求1所述的非离子粉状洗涤剂组合物，其具有0.6至1.2g/cm3的堆积密度和200至1000g/cm3的平均粒径。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In the preliminary studies, distamycin A was tested with 5 different test sequences flanking the UL9 screening sequence: SEQ ID NO:605 to SEQ ID NO:609.  The results shown in FIG. 10A demonstrate that Distamycin A preferentially disrupts binding to the test sequences UL9 polyT, UL9 polyA and, to a lesser extent, UL9 ATAT. FIG. 10A also shows the concentration dependence of the inhibitory effect of distamycin A: at 1 . mu.M distamycin A most of the DNA:protein complexes are intact (top band) with free probe appearing in the UL9 polyT and UL9 polyA lanes, and some free probe appearing in the UL9 ATAT lane; at 4 &mgr;M free probe can be seen in the UL9 polyT and UL9 polyA lanes; at 16 &mgr;M free probe can be seen in the UL9 polyT and UL9 polyA lanes; and at 40 . mu.M the DNA:protein in the polyT, UL9 polyA and UL9 ATAT lanes are near completely disrupted while some DNA:protein complexes in the other lanes persist. These results were consistent with the reported preference of Distamycin A for non-alternating AT-rich sequences.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在初步研究中，偏端霉素A用UL9筛选序列侧翼的5种不同测试序列进行测试：SEQ ID NO:605至SEQ ID NO:609。 图10A中所示的结果表明偏端霉素A优先破坏与测试序列UL9 polyT、UL9 polyA的结合，并且在较小程度上破坏与UL9 ATAT的结合。 图10A还显示偏端霉素A：at 1的抑制作用的浓度依赖性。 大多数DNA：蛋白质复合物是完整的（顶部条带），其中游离探针出现在UL9 polyT和UL9 polyA泳道中，并且一些游离探针出现在UL9 ATAT泳道中； 在UL9 polyT和UL9 polyA泳道中可以看到4μg/ml游离探针； 在UL9 polyT和UL9 polyA泳道中可以看到16μM的游离探针； 以及在40处。 polyT、UL9 polyA和UL9 ATAT泳道中的DNA：蛋白质几乎完全被破坏，而其他泳道中的一些DNA：蛋白质复合物持续存在。 这些结果与报道的偏端霉素A对非交替的富含AT的序列的偏好一致。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Doxorubicin was tested with 8 different test sequences flanking the UL9 screening sequence: SEQ ID NO:605 to SEQ ID NO:609, and SEQ ID NO:611 to SEQ ID NO:613. The results shown in FIG. 10C demonstrate that Doxorubicin preferentially disrupts binding to oriEco3, the test sequence of which differs from oriEco2 by only one base (compare SEQ ID NO:612 and SEQ ID NO:613). FIG.  10C also shows the concentration dependence of the inhibitory effect of Doxorubicin: at 15 &mgr;M Doxorubicin, the UL9 binding to the screening sequence is strongly affected when oriEco3 is the test sequence, and more mildly affected when polyT, UL9 GGGC, or oriEco2 was the test sequence; and at 35 &mgr;M Doxorubicin most DNA:protein complexes are nearly completely disrupted, with UL9 polyT and UL9ATAT showing some DNA still complexed with protein. Also, effects similar to those observed at 15 &mgr;M were also observed using Doxorubicin at 150 &mgr;M, but at a later time point.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用UL9筛选序列侧翼的8种不同测试序列测试多柔比星：SEQ ID NO:605至SEQ ID NO:609和SEQ ID NO:611至SEQ ID NO:613。 图10C中所示的结果表明，多柔比星优先破坏与oriEco3的结合，其测试序列与oriEco2仅有一个碱基不同（比较SEQ ID NO:612和SEQ ID NO:613)。 图10C还显示了多柔比星的抑制作用的浓度依赖性：在15μM多柔比星下，当oriEco3是测试序列时，UL9与筛选序列的结合受到强烈影响，并且当polyT、UL9 GGGC或oriEco2是测试序列时，受到更轻微的影响； 并且在35μM多柔比星下，大多数DNA：蛋白质复合物几乎完全被破坏，其中UL9polyT和UL9ATAT显示一些DNA仍然与蛋白质复合。 此外，使用150μM的多柔比星也观察到与在15μM观察到的效果类似的效果，但在稍后的时间点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用UL9筛选序列侧翼的8种不同测试序列测试多柔比星：SEQ ID NO:605至SEQ ID NO:609和SEQ ID NO:611至SEQ ID NO:613。 图10C中所示的结果表明，多柔比星优先破坏与oriEco3的结合，其测试序列与oriEco2仅有一个碱基不同（比较SEQ ID NO:612和SEQ ID NO:613)。 图10C还显示了多柔比星的抑制作用的浓度依赖性：在15μM多柔比星下，当oriEco3是测试序列时，UL9与筛选序列的结合受到强烈影响，并且当polyT、UL9 GGGC或oriEco2是测试序列时，受到更轻微的影响； 并且在35μM多柔比星下，大多数DNA：蛋白质复合物几乎完全被破坏，其中UL9polyT和UL9ATAT显示一些DNA仍然与蛋白质复合。 此外，使用150μM的多柔比星也观察到与在15μM观察到的效果类似的效果，但在稍后的时间点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Doxorubicin was tested with 8 different test sequences flanking the UL9 screening sequence: SEQ ID NO:605 to SEQ ID NO:609, and SEQ ID NO:611 to SEQ ID NO:613. The results shown in FIG. 10C demonstrate that Doxorubicin preferentially disrupts binding to oriEco3, the test sequence of which differs from oriEco2 by only one base (compare SEQ ID NO:612 and SEQ ID NO:613). FIG.  10C also shows the concentration dependence of the inhibitory effect of Doxorubicin: at 15 &mgr;M Doxorubicin, the UL9 binding to the screening sequence is strongly affected when oriEco3 is the test sequence, and more mildly affected when polyT, UL9 GGGC, or oriEco2 was the test sequence; and at 35 &mgr;M Doxorubicin most DNA:protein complexes are nearly completely disrupted, with UL9 polyT and UL9ATAT showing some DNA still complexed with protein. Also, effects similar to those observed at 15 &mgr;M were also observed using Doxorubicin at 150 &mgr;M, but at a later time point.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>There are two major components in the assay, the test oligonucleotide (i.e., the test sequence) and the DNA-binding domain of UL9, which is described below.  A number of theoretical considerations have been employed in establishing the assay system. In one embodiment of the invention, the assay is used as a mass-screening assay: in this embodiment the smallest volumes and concentrations possible were desirable. Each assay typically uses about 0.1-0.5 ng DNA in a 15-20 &mgr; l reaction volume (approximately 0.3-1.5 nM). The protein concentration is in excess and can be varied to increase or decrease the sensitivity of the assay. In the simplest scenario (stearic hindrance), where the small molecule is acting as a competitive inhibitor and the ratio of DNA:protein and DNA-binding test molecule:DNA is 1:1, the system kinetics can be described by the following equations: ##EQU1##</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在测定中存在两个主要组分，测试寡核苷酸（即，测试序列）和UL9的DNA结合结构域，其在下文中描述。 在建立测定系统中已经采用了许多理论考虑。 在本发明的一个实施方案中，该测定法用作质量筛选测定法：在该实施方案中，可能的最小体积和浓度是期望的。 每个测定通常在15-20μgR中使用约0.1-0.5ng DNA； 反应体积（约0.3-1.5nm)。 蛋白质浓度是过量的，并且可以改变以增加或降低测定的灵敏度。 在最简单的情况下（硬脂酸位阻），其中小分子充当竞争性抑制剂并且DNA：蛋白质和DNA结合测试分子：DNA的比率为1:1，系统动力学可以通过以下等式描述：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Many of the experiments described above for UL9 DNA:protein- binding studies have made use of radio-labelled oligonucleotides. The techniques involved in radiolabelling of oligonucleotides have been discussed above. A specific activity of 10.sup.8 -10.sup.9 dpm per &mgr;g DNA is routinely achieved using standard methods (e.g., end-labeling the oligonucleotide with adenosine &ggr;-[.sup.32 P]-5' triphosphate and T4 polynucleotide kinase). This level of specific activity allows small amounts of DNA to be measured either by autoradiography of gels or filters exposed to film or by direct counting of samples in scintillation fluid.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>上述针对UL9 DNA：蛋白质结合研究的许多实验使用了放射性标记的寡核苷酸。 上文已经讨论了涉及寡核苷酸的放射性标记的技术。 使用标准方法（例如，用腺苷和GGR-[32P]-5'三磷酸和T4多核苷酸激酶末端标记寡核苷酸）常规地实现每mgr g DNA 10-8-10dpm的比活性。 这种比活性水平允许通过凝胶或暴露于胶片的滤膜的放射自显影或通过闪烁液中样品的直接计数来测量少量DNA。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>When a competitor DNA has some affinity for the test molecule, competition (r % rising towards 100%) would be observed at some competitor DNA concentration. The difference in concentration between two competing DNA sequences to achieve an equivalent r % (e.g., 90%) should reflect the relative difference in absolute affinity between the two competitor DNA molecules. For example, if 5 &mgr;M TTAC is required to achieve a change in r % from 50% to 90% in the presence of a test molecule and 200 &mgr;M CCCC is required to achieve the same change in r %, then the fold difference in affinity between TTAC and CCCC for the test molecule is 200/5=40-fold.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>当竞争物DNA对测试分子具有一些亲和力时，在一些竞争物DNA浓度下将观察到竞争（r%上升至100%）。 两个竞争DNA序列之间达到相等r%（例如90%）的浓度差异应反映两个竞争DNA分子之间绝对亲和力的相对差异。 例如，如果在测试分子存在下需要5μg/ml TTAC以实现r%从50%到90%的变化，并且需要200μg/ml CCCC以实现相同的r%变化，则TTAC和CCCC之间对于测试分子的亲和力的倍数差异为200/5=40倍。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A second method used particularly in determining the half-lives for oligonucleotide:protein complexes is filter binding (Woodbury, et al.  ). Nitrocellulose disks (Schleicher and Schuell, BA85 filters) that have been soaked in binding buffer (see below) were placed on a vacuum filter apparatus.  DNA:protein binding reactions (see below; typically 15-30 &mgr; l) are diluted to 0.5 ml with binding buffer (this dilutes the concentration of components without dissociating complexes) and applied to the discs with vacuum applied.  Under low salt conditions the DNA:protein complex sticks to the filter while free DNA passes through.  The discs are placed in scintillation counting fluid (New England Nuclear) , and the cpm determined using a scintillation counter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>特别用于确定寡核苷酸：蛋白质复合物的半衰期的第二种方法是过滤结合（Woodbury等人）。 将已经浸泡在结合缓冲液（见下文）中的硝酸纤维素盘（Schleicher和Schuell，BA85过滤器）置于真空过滤装置上。 用结合缓冲液将DNA：蛋白质结合反应物（见下文，通常为15-30μg/ml）稀释至0.5ml（这稀释了组分的浓度而没有解离复合物），并在施加真空的情况下施加到盘上。 在低盐条件下，DNA：蛋白质复合物粘附到过滤器上，而游离DNA通过。 将盘置于闪烁计数流体中，并使用闪烁计数器测定cpm。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In the competition assays, the binding reactions (Example 4A) were assembled with each of the oligonucleotides and placed on ice.  Unlabelled oligonucleo- tide (1 &mgr;g) was added 1, 2, 4, 6, or 21 hours before loading the reaction on an 8% polyacrylamide gel (run in TBE buffer (Maniatis, et al.)) to separate the reaction components. The dissociation rates, under these conditions, for the truncated UL9 (UL9- COOH) and the full length UL9 is approximately 4 hours at 4&deg; C. In addition, random oligonucleotides (a 10,000-fold excess) that did not contain the UL9 binding sequence and sheared herring sperm DNA (a 100, 000-fold excess) were tested: neither of these control DNAs competed for binding with the oligonucleotide containing the UL9 binding site.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在竞争测定中，用每种寡核苷酸组装结合反应（实施例4A)并置于冰上。 在将反应物上样到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶（在TBE缓冲液（Maniatis等人）中运行）之前1、2、4、6或21小时加入未标记的寡核苷酸(1mgr.g)以分离反应组分。 在这些条件下，截短的UL9(UL9-COOH)和全长UL9的解离速率在4℃下为约4小时； C.另外，测试了不含UL9结合序列的随机寡核苷酸（10,000倍过量）和剪切的鲱鱼精子DNA（100,000倍过量）：这些对照DNA都不与含有UL9结合位点的寡核苷酸竞争结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The optimized conditions used for the binding of UL9-COOH contained in bacterial extracts (Example 2E) to oligonucleotides containing the HSV ori sequence (SEQ ID NO:601) were as follows: 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.2, 50 mM KCl, 1 mM DTT, 0.005-0.1 ng radiolabeled (specific activity, approximately 10.sup.8 cpm/&mgr;g) or digoxiginated, biotinylated oligonucleotide probe, and 5-10 &mgr;g crude UL9-COOH protein preparation (1 mM EDTA is optional in the reaction mix). Under optimized conditions, UL9-COOH binds very rapidly and has a dissociation rate of about 4 hours at 4&deg; C. with non-biotinylated oligonucleotide and 5-10 minutes with biotinylated oligonucleotides. The dissociation rate of UL9-COOH changes markedly under different physical conditions.  Typically, the activity of a UL9 protein preparation was assessed using the gel band- shift assay and related to the total protein content of the extract as a method of standardization. The addition of herring sperm DNA depended on the purity of UL9 used in the experiment Binding assays were incubated at 25&deg; C. for 5-30 minutes.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用于细菌提取物（实施例2E)中含有的UL9-COOH与含有HSV ori序列（SEQ ID NO:601)的寡核苷酸结合的优化条件如下:20mM HEPES，pH 7.2，50mM KCl，1mM DTT，0.005-0.1ng放射性标记的（比活性，约10.sup.8cpm/μg/g)或洋地黄毒苷化的生物素化寡核苷酸探针，和5-10μg/g粗UL9-COOH蛋白质制备物(1mM EDTA在反应混合物中是任选的）。 在优化的条件下，UL9-COOH非常快速地结合，并且在4℃下具有约4小时的解离速率； C.用非生物素化的寡核苷酸，用生物素化的寡核苷酸5-10分钟。 UL9-COOH的解离速率在不同的物理条件下显著变化。 通常，使用凝胶带移测定评估UL9蛋白制剂的活性，并将其与提取物的总蛋白含量相关联作为标准化方法。 鲱鱼精子DNA的添加取决于实验结合测定中使用的UL9的纯度。 C.持续5-30分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The binding reaction conditions for the full length baculovirus- produced UL9 polypeptide have also been optimized. The optimal conditions for the current assay were determined to be as follows: 20 mM Hepes; 100 mM NaCl; 0.5 mM dithiothreitol; 1 mM EDTA; 5% glycerol; from 0 to 10.sup. 4 -fold excess of sheared herring sperm DNA; 0.005-0.1 ng radiolabeled (specific activity, approximately 10.sup.8 cpm/&mgr;g) or digoxiginated, biotinylated oligonucleotide probe, and 5-10 &mgr;g crude UL9 protein preparation. The full length protein also binds well under the optimized conditions established for the truncated UL9-COOH protein.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>还优化了全长杆状病毒产生的UL9多肽的结合反应条件。 本测定的最佳条件确定如下:20mM Hepes； 100 mM NaCl； 0.5 mM二硫苏糖醇； 1mM EDTA； 5%甘油； 从0到10 4倍过量的剪切鲱鱼精子DNA； 0.005-0.1ng放射性标记的（比活性，约108cpm/μg）或地高辛标记的生物素化寡核苷酸探针，和5-10μg粗UL9蛋白制剂。 在针对截短的UL9-COOH蛋白建立的优化条件下，全长蛋白也很好地结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The binding reaction conditions for the full length baculovirus- produced UL9 polypeptide have also been optimized. The optimal conditions for the current assay were determined to be as follows: 20 mM Hepes; 100 mM NaCl; 0.5 mM dithiothreitol; 1 mM EDTA; 5% glycerol; from 0 to 10.sup. 4 -fold excess of sheared herring sperm DNA; 0.005-0.1 ng radiolabeled (specific activity, approximately 10.sup.8 cpm/&mgr;g) or digoxiginated, biotinylated oligonucleotide probe, and 5-10 &mgr;g crude UL9 protein preparation. The full length protein also binds well under the optimized conditions established for the truncated UL9-COOH protein.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>还优化了全长杆状病毒产生的UL9多肽的结合反应条件。 本测定的最佳条件确定如下:20mM Hepes； 100 mM NaCl； 0.5 mM二硫苏糖醇； 1mM EDTA； 5%甘油； 从0到10 4倍过量的剪切鲱鱼精子DNA； 0.005-0.1ng放射性标记的（比活性，约108cpm/μg）或地高辛标记的生物素化寡核苷酸探针，和5-10μg粗UL9蛋白制剂。 在针对截短的UL9-COOH蛋白建立的优化条件下，全长蛋白也很好地结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The oligonucleotides shown in FIG. 5 were radiolabelled as described above.  The competition assays were performed as described in Example 4B using UL9-COOH. Radiolabelled oligonucleotides were mixed with the UL9- COOH protein in binding buffer (typical reaction: 0.1 ng oligonucleotide . sup.32 P-DNA, 1 &mgr;l UL9-COOH extract, 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.2, 50 mM KCl, 1 mM EDTA, and 1 mM DTT). The reactions were incubated at room temperature for 10 minutes. A zero time point sample was then taken and loaded onto an 8% polyacrylamide gel (run use TBE). One pg of the unlabelled 17 bp competitive DNA oligonucleotide (SEQ ID NO:616) (Example 4B) was added at 5, 10, 15, 20, or 60 minutes before loading the reaction sample on the gel. The results of this analysis are shown in FIG.  9: the screening sequences that flank the UL9 binding site (SEQ ID NO:605-SEQ ID NO:613) are very dissimilar but have little effect on the off-rate of UL9. Accordingly, these results show that the UL9 DNA binding protein is effective to bind to a screening sequence in duplex DNA with a binding affinity that is substantially independent of test sequences placed adjacent the screening sequence. Filter binding experiments gave the same result.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>图5中所示的寡核苷酸如上所述进行放射性标记。 如实施例4B中所述使用UL9-COOH进行竞争测定。 将放射性标记的寡核苷酸与UL9-COOH蛋白在结合缓冲液中混合（典型反应:0.1ng寡核苷酸32P-DNA，1μg UL9-COOH提取物，20mM HEPES，pH 7.2，50mM KCl，1mM EDTA和1mM DTT）。 将反应在室温下温育10分钟。 然后取零时间点样品并加载到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶上（使用TBE运行）。 在将反应样品加载到凝胶上之前5、10、15、20或60分钟加入1pg未标记的17bp竞争性DNA寡核苷酸（SEQ ID NO:616)（实施例4B)。 该分析的结果显示在图9中：位于UL9结合位点侧翼的筛选序列（SEQ ID NO:605-SEQ ID NO:613)非常不相似，但对UL9的解离速率几乎没有影响。 因此，这些结果表明，UL9 DNA结合蛋白以基本上不依赖于与筛选序列相邻放置的测试序列的结合亲和力有效地结合双链体DNA中的筛选序列。 滤膜结合实验给出了相同的结果。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A concentrated solution of Distamycin A was prepared in dH.sub.  2 0 and was added to the binding reactions at the following concentrations: 0, 1 . mu.M, 4 &mgr;M, 16 &mgr;M, and 40 &mgr;M. The drug was added and incubated at room temperature for 1 hour. The reaction mixtures were then loaded on an 8% polyacrylamide gel (Example 5) and the components separated electrophoretically. Autoradiographs of these gels are shown in FIG. 10A. The test sequences tested were as follows: UL9 polyT, SEQ ID NO:609; UL9 CCCG, SEQ ID NO:605; UL9 GGGC, SEQ ID NO:606; UL9 polyA, SEQ ID NO:608; and UL9 ATAT, SEQ ID NO:607. These results demonstrate that Distamycin A preferentially disrupts binding to UL9 polyT, UL9 polyA and UL9 ATAT.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>偏端霉素A的浓溶液在dH.sub.中制备。 并且以以下浓度添加到结合反应中： M，4个M，16个M，40个M。 加入药物并在室温下温育1小时。 然后将反应混合物加载到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶（实施例5）上，并电泳分离组分。 这些凝胶的放射自显影显示在图10A中。 测试的测试序列如下:UL9 polyT，SEQ ID NO:609； UL9 CCCG，SEQ ID NO:605； UL9 GGGC，SEQ ID NO:606； UL9 polyA，SEQ ID NO:608； 和UL9 ATAT，SEQ ID NO:607。 这些结果表明偏端霉素A优先破坏与UL9 polyT、UL9 polyA和UL9 ATAT的结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A concentrated solution of Actinomycin D was prepared in dH.sub.  2 O and was added to the binding reactions at the following concentrations: 0 &mgr;M and 50 &mgr;M. The drug was added and incubated at room temperature for 1 hour.  Equal volumes of dH.sub.2 0 were added to the control samples. The reaction mixtures were then loaded on an 8% polyacrylamide gel (Example 5) and the components separated electrophoretically. Autoradiographs of these gels are shown in FIG. 10B.  In addition to the test sequences tested above with Distamycin A, the following test sequences were also tested with Actinomycin D: ATori1, SEQ ID NO:611; oriEco2, SEQ ID NO:612, and oriEco3, SEQ ID NO:613.  These results demonstrate that actinomycin D preferentially disrupts the binding of UL9 to the oligonucleotides UL9 CCCG and UL9 GGGC.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>放线菌素D的浓溶液在dH.sub.中制备。 然后以以下浓度加入到结合反应中:0μM和50μM。 加入药物并在室温下温育1小时。 向对照样品中加入等体积的DH20。 然后将反应混合物加载到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶（实施例5）上，并电泳分离组分。 这些凝胶的放射自显影显示在图10B中。 除了以上用偏端霉素A测试的测试序列之外，还用放线菌素D测试了以下测试序列:ATori1，SEQ ID NO:611； oriEco2，SEQ ID NO:612，和oriEco3，SEQ ID NO:613。 这些结果表明放线菌素D优先破坏UL9与寡核苷酸UL9 CCCG和UL9 GGGC的结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Biotinylated agarose beads (immobilized D-biotin, Pierce, Rockford, Ill.)  are bound to avidin by treating the beads with 50 &mgr;g/.  mu.l avidin in binding buffer overnight at 4&deg; C. The beads are washed in binding buffer and used to capture biotinylated DNA. The beads are mixed with binding mixtures to capture biotinylated DNA. The beads are removed by centrifugation or by collection on a non-binding filter disc. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>生物素化的琼脂糖珠（固定化的D-生物素，Pierce，Rockford，Ill.）通过用50μg/ml处理珠与抗生物素蛋白结合。 在结合缓冲液中的μl抗生物素蛋白在4℃下过夜； C.将珠粒在结合缓冲液中洗涤并用于捕获生物素化的DNA。 将珠粒与结合混合物混合以捕获生物素化的DNA。 通过离心或通过在非结合过滤盘上收集除去珠粒。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Radioactive-labeling of the primer with .sup.32 P is accomplished by the enzymatic transfer of a radioactive phosphate from &ggr;-.sup. 32 P- ATP to the 5' end of the primer oligonucleotide using T4 polynucleotide kinase (Ausubel, et al.). For labeling 256 oligonucleotides, approximately 60 &mgr;g HSV primer was labeled as follows. The oligonucleotide was incubated for 1 hour at 37&deg; C. with 125 &mgr;l . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP (20 mCi total, 7000 Ci/mmol) and 600 units of T4 polynucleotide kinase in a 3 ml reaction volume containing 50 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 10 MM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM spermidine, and 1.5 mM dithiothreitol (freshly prepared). To stop the reaction, EDTA was added to a final concentration of 20 mM. Unincorporated nucleotides were removed using &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; chromatography in 10 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA (TE+50).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用32P对引物进行放射性标记是通过酶促转移放射性磷酸酯从99gR-完成的。 使用T4多核苷酸激酶（Ausubel等人）将32P-ATP连接到引物寡核苷酸的5'末端。 为了标记256个寡核苷酸，如下标记约60μg HSV引物。 将寡核苷酸在37℃下孵育1小时； C.与125名经理； γ-32P-ATP(20mCi，7000Ci/mmol)和600单位T4多核苷酸激酶在含有50mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5、10mM MgCl2、10mM亚精胺和1.5mM二硫苏糖醇（新鲜制备的）的3ml反应体积中。 为了终止反应，加入EDTA至终浓度为20mM。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”去除未掺入的核苷酸。 在10mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA(TE+50)中进行色谱。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radioactive primer was individually annealed to the top strand of each of the 256 test oligonucleotides. The bottom strand is synthesized using deoxyribonucleotides and Klenow fragment or T4 polymerase (Ausubel, et al.).  The annealing mixture typically contained 200 ng HSV primer mixed with 1 &mgr;g top strand in 20 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.  5, 1 mM spermidine, and 0.1 mM EDTA (35 &mgr;l reaction volume). The primer was annealed to the top strand by incubating the sample for 2 minutes at 70&deg; C., then placing the sample at room temperature or on ice. To the annealing mixture, 4.5 &mgr;l 10&times; Klenow buffer (10.  times.=200 mM Tris-HCL, 500 mM NaCl, 50 mM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM dithiothreitol), 5 &mgr;l 0.5 mM each dNTP (dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dTTP), and 1 &mgr;l Klenow fragment were added. This reaction mixture was incubated 30-60 minutes at room temperature (or up to 37&deg; C.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radioactive primer was individually annealed to the top strand of each of the 256 test oligonucleotides. The bottom strand is synthesized using deoxyribonucleotides and Klenow fragment or T4 polymerase (Ausubel, et al.).  The annealing mixture typically contained 200 ng HSV primer mixed with 1 &mgr;g top strand in 20 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.  5, 1 mM spermidine, and 0.1 mM EDTA (35 &mgr;l reaction volume). The primer was annealed to the top strand by incubating the sample for 2 minutes at 70&deg; C., then placing the sample at room temperature or on ice. To the annealing mixture, 4.5 &mgr;l 10&times; Klenow buffer (10.  times.=200 mM Tris-HCL, 500 mM NaCl, 50 mM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM dithiothreitol), 5 &mgr;l 0.5 mM each dNTP (dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dTTP), and 1 &mgr;l Klenow fragment were added. This reaction mixture was incubated 30-60 minutes at room temperature (or up to 37&deg; C.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The volume of the reaction mixture was increased by adding 75 &mgr; l a solution of 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 10 mM EDTA.  The reaction mixture was applied to a 1 ml &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; (in TE+50) spin column. The spin columns were prepared by plugging 1cc tuberculin syringes with silanized glass wool and adding a slurry of &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX.  &quot; The columns were prespun at 2000 rpm in a tabletop centrifuge for 4 minutes. The samples (reaction mixtures) were passed through the column by centrifugation (2000 rpm, 4 minutes at room temperature) to remove unincorporated deoxyribonucleotides. The incorporation of .sup.32 P was measured by placing a small volume of the sample in scintillation fluor and determining the disintegrations per minute (dpms) in a scintillation counter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>反应混合物的体积通过添加75μgr； 10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和10mM EDTA的溶液。 将反应混合物加到1ml G-25葡聚糖凝胶上。 （在TE+50中）旋转柱。 通过用硅烷化玻璃棉塞住1cc结核菌素注射器并加入G-25葡聚糖凝胶浆液来制备旋转柱。 " 将柱在台式离心机中以2000rpm预离心4分钟。 通过离心(2000rpm，在室温下4分钟）使样品（反应混合物）通过柱以除去未掺入的脱氧核糖核苷酸。 32P的掺入通过将小体积的样品置于闪烁荧光剂中并在闪烁计数器中测定每分钟的崩解(dpms)来测量。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radiolabeled double-stranded oligonucleotides were then diluted to the same specific activity (equal dpms per volume). Typically, a concentration of 0.1 to 1 ng/&mgr;l oligonucleotide was used in the assay. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>然后将放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸稀释至相同的比活性（相等的dpms/体积）。 通常，在测定中使用0.1至1ng/mgL寡核苷酸的浓度。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Prior to the application of the assay sample to the wells of the dot- blot apparatus, the wells were filled with 375 &mgr;l of UL9 binding buffer.  Typically, 5-50 &mgr;l of sample (usually 10-15 &mgr;l) were pipetted into the wells containing binding buffer and a vacuum applied to the system to pull the sample through the nitrocellulose.  Unbound DNA passes through the nitrocellulose, protein-bound DNA sticks to the nitrocellulose. The filters were dried and exposed to X-ray film to generate autoradiographs.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在将测定样品施加到斑点印迹装置的孔中之前，用375μl UL9结合缓冲液填充孔。 通常，将5-50μl样品（通常10-15μl)移液到含有结合缓冲液的孔中，并对系统施加真空以将样品拉过硝酸纤维素。 未结合的DNA通过硝酸纤维素，蛋白质结合的DNA粘附到硝酸纤维素。 将滤膜干燥并暴露于X射线胶片以产生放射自显影。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>FIG. 15 shows the results of 4 separate experiments with distamycin. The test samples were treated with 10 &mgr;M distamycin for 30 minutes. The r % scores are shown for each of the 4 experiments (labeled 918A, 918B, 1022A, and 1022B) and the ranks of each oligonucleotide in each experiment are shown. The test oligonucleotides have been ranked from 1 to 256 based on their average rank. The average rank was the sum of the ranks in the individual experiments divided by the number of experiments. </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>图15显示了偏端霉素的4个单独实验的结果。 将测试样品用10μM偏端霉素处理30分钟。 显示了4个实验（标记为918A、918B、1022A和1022B)中的每一个的r%得分，并且显示了每个实验中每种寡核苷酸的等级。 测试寡核苷酸已基于其平均等级从1到256分级。 平均等级是各个实验中的等级总和除以实验次数。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA were incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay was begun by adding water (control samples) or actinomycin D (25 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12-channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 30 minutes, samples were taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C. FIG. 18 shows the results of 8 screens of actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或放线菌素D(25μg/ml，测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育30分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.图18显示放线菌素D的8次筛选的结果。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA are incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay is begun by adding water (control samples) or test molecule (typically at 1- 5 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12- channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 5-120 minutes, samples are taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或测试分子（通常为1-5μg/ml测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育5-120分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As described above, the internal down converter according to the fifth embodiment includes reference voltage generation circuit for burn- in test 10a having a positive temperature characteristic, and therefore the internal voltage Vint having the temperature characteristic shown in FIG. 13 is supplied as the internal power supply voltage.  Accordingly, in a wider range of the external power supply voltage Vext, in other words in the range 3.3 V&lE;Vext&lE;6.0+&agr; V, the internal voltage Vint of 3.3 V (constant) can be supplied as the internal power supply voltage to the internal circuit (not shown) under the ambient temperature for normal operation. Stated differently, an internal down converter capable of operating in a wider range of external power supply voltage, taking into account execution of burn-in test is provided.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如上所述，根据第五实施例的内部降压变换器包括具有正温度特性的老化测试用参考电压产生电路10a，因此具有图13所示温度特性的内部电压Vint被提供作为内部电源电压。 因此，在外部电源电压Vext的较宽范围内，换句话说，在3.3Vext； 在正常操作的环境温度下，可以将3.3V（恒定）的内部电压Vint作为内部电源电压提供给内部电路（未示出）。 换句话说，提供了一种考虑到老化测试的执行而能够在更宽的外部电源电压范围内工作的内部降压变换器。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Distamycin A binds relatively weakly to DNA (K.sub.A =2&times; 10. sup. 5 M.sup.-1) with a preference for non-alternating AT-rich sequences (Jain, et al.; Sobell; Sobell, et al.). Actinomycin D binds DNA more strongly (K.sub.A =7.6&times;10.sup.-7 M.sup.-1) than Distamycin A and has been reported to have a relatively strong preference for the dinucleotide sequence dGdC (Luck, et al.; Zimmer; Wartel). Each of these molecules poses a stringent test for the assay. Distamycin A tests the sensitivity of the assay because of its relatively weak binding.  Actinomycin D challenges the ability to utilize flanking sequences since the UL9 recognition sequence contains a dGdC dinucleotide: therefore, it might be anticipated that all of the oligonucleotides, regardless of the test sequence flanking the assay site, might be equally affected by actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>偏端霉素A与DNA的结合相对较弱(KA=2×105M-1)，优选非交替的富含AT的序列（Jain等；Sobell；Sobell等）。 放线菌素D比偏端霉素A更强地结合DNA(KA=7.6×10-7M-1)，并且据报道对二核苷酸序列dGdC具有相对强的偏好性（Luck等人；Zimmer；Wartel）。 这些分子中的每一种都为测定提出了严格的测试。 偏端霉素A由于其相对弱的结合而测试测定的灵敏度。 放线菌素D挑战利用侧翼序列的能力，因为UL9识别序列含有dGdC二核苷酸：因此，可以预期所有寡核苷酸（无论测定位点侧翼的测试序列如何）可能同样受到放线菌素D的影响。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>There are approximately 3&times;10.sup.9 base pairs (bp) in the human genome. Of the known DNA-binding drugs for which there is crystallographic data, most bind 2-5 bp sequences. There are 4.sup.4 =256 different 4 base sequences; therefore, on average, a single 4 bp site is found roughly 1.2&times;10.sup.7 times in the human genome. An individual 8 base site would be found, on average, about 50,000 times in the genome.  On the surface, it might appear that drugs targeted at even an 8 bp site might be deleterious to the cell because there are so many binding sites; however, several other considerations must be recognized.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>人类基因组中大约有3×109个碱基对(bp)。 在具有结晶学数据的已知DNA结合药物中，大多数结合2-5bp序列。 存在4=256个不同的4个基本序列； 因此，在人类基因组中发现单个4bp位点平均大约1.2倍于107倍。 单个8个碱基的位点平均在基因组中被发现约50,000次。 在表面上，可能似乎靶向甚至8bp位点的药物可能对细胞有害，因为存在如此多的结合位点； 然而，必须认识到若干其他考虑。</base:Paragraphs>

An individual 8 base site would be found, on average, about 50,000 times in the genome.  On the surface, it might appear that drugs targeted at even an 8 bp site might be deleterious to the cell because there are so many binding sites; however, several other considerations must be recognized.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>人类基因组中大约有3×109个碱基对(bp)。 在具有结晶学数据的已知DNA结合药物中，大多数结合2-5bp序列。 存在4=256个不同的4个基本序列； 因此，在人类基因组中发现单个4bp位点平均大约1.2倍于107倍。 单个8个碱基的位点平均在基因组中被发现约50,000次。 在表面上，可能似乎靶向甚至8bp位点的药物可能对细胞有害，因为存在如此多的结合位点； 然而，必须认识到若干其他考虑。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Any particular DNA-binding small molecule screened in the assay may only recognize a 2-4 base pair site, and even if the recognition is quite specific, the molecule may be toxic because there are so many target sites in the genome (3&times;10.sup.9 /4.sup.4 4 bp sites, for example). However, if drugs with differential affinity for different sites are identified, the toxicity of DNA-binding drugs may be drastically reduced by creating dimers, trimers, or multimers with these drugs (Example 13). From theoretical considerations of the free energy changes accompanying the binding of drugs to DNA, the intrinsic binding constant of a dimer should be the square of the binding constant of the monomer (Le Pecq, J. B.). Experimental data confirmed this expectation in 1978 with dimer analogs of ethidium bromide (Kuhlmann, et al.).  Dimerization of several intercalating molecules, in fact, yields compounds with DNA affinities raised from 10.sup.5 M.sup.-1 for the corresponding monomer to 10.sup.8 to 10.sup.9 M.sup.-1 for the dimers (Skorobogaty, et al.; Gaugain, et al. (1978a and b); Le Pecq, et al.; Pelaprat, et al.). Trimerization, which theoretically should yield binding affinities that are the cube of the affinity of the homomonomeric subunit or the product of affinities of the heteromonomeric subunits, has yielded compounds with affinities as high as 10.sup.12 M.sup.-1 (Laugaa, et al.). Such affinity is markedly better than the affinities seen for many DNA regulatory proteins.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在测定中筛选的任何特定DNA结合小分子可能仅识别2-4个碱基对位点，并且即使识别是相当特异性的，该分子也可能是有毒的，因为在基因组中存在如此多的靶位点（例如3倍于10.9/4.4个4bp位点）。 然而，如果鉴定出对不同位点具有不同亲和力的药物，则通过用这些药物产生二聚体、三聚体或多聚体，可以显著降低DNA结合药物的毒性（实施例13）。 从伴随药物与DNA结合的自由能变化的理论考虑，二聚体的固有结合常数应该是单体结合常数的平方（Le Pecq,J.B.）。 实验数据在1978年用溴化乙锭的二聚体类似物证实了这种预期（Kuhlmann等人）。 事实上，几种嵌入分子的二聚化产生的化合物的DNA亲和力从相应单体的10.sup.sup.-1提高到二聚体的10.sup.sup.-1～10.sup.-1(Skorobogaty等人；Gaugain等人(1978a和b）；Le Pecq等人；Pelaprat等人）。 理论上应产生同单体亚基的亲和力的立方或异单体亚基的亲和力的乘积的结合亲和力的三聚化已产生亲和力高达10.12M-1的化合物（Laugaa等人）。 这种亲和力明显优于对许多DNA调节蛋白所见的亲和力。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As a hypothetical example, if a relatively weak DNA-binding drug, drug X, which binds a 4 bp site with an affinity of 2&times;10.sup.  5 M. sup.-1 was dimerized, the bis-X drug would now recognize an 8 bp site with a theoretical affinity of 4&times;10.sup.10 M.sup.-1. The difference in affinity between the monomer X and the bis-X form is 200, 000-fold. The number of 4 bp sites in the genome is approximately 1.2.  times.10.sup.7 versus the number of 8 bp sites in the genome which is approximately 5. times.10.sup.4. Accordingly, there are 256-fold fewer 8 bp sites than 4 bp sites. Thus, the number of high affinity target sites is 256-fold fewer for the bis-X molecule than the number of low affinity target sites for the monomer X, with a 200,000-fold difference in affinity between the two types of sites.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>作为假设的实例，如果使用相对弱的DNA结合药物，药物X，其以2×10的亲和力结合4bp位点。 当bis-X药物被二聚化时，该双-X药物现在将识别8bp位点，其理论亲和力为4×10-10M-1。 单体X和双X形式之间的亲和力差异为200,000倍。 基因组中4bp位点的数量约为1.2。 基因组中8bp位点的数量约为5bp。 第四次 因此，8bp位点比4bp位点少256倍。 因此，双-X分子的高亲和力靶位点的数量比单体X的低亲和力靶位点的数量少256倍，两种类型的位点之间的亲和力差异为200,000倍。</base:Paragraphs>

The difference in affinity between the monomer X and the bis-X form is 200, 000-fold. The number of 4 bp sites in the genome is approximately 1.2.  times.10.sup.7 versus the number of 8 bp sites in the genome which is approximately 5. times.10.sup.4. Accordingly, there are 256-fold fewer 8 bp sites than 4 bp sites. Thus, the number of high affinity target sites is 256-fold fewer for the bis-X molecule than the number of low affinity target sites for the monomer X, with a 200,000-fold difference in affinity between the two types of sites.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>作为假设的实例，如果使用相对弱的DNA结合药物，药物X，其以2×10的亲和力结合4bp位点。 当bis-X药物被二聚化时，该双-X药物现在将识别8bp位点，其理论亲和力为4×10-10M-1。 单体X和双X形式之间的亲和力差异为200,000倍。 基因组中4bp位点的数量约为1.2。 基因组中8bp位点的数量约为5bp。 第四次 因此，8bp位点比4bp位点少256倍。 因此，双-X分子的高亲和力靶位点的数量比单体X的低亲和力靶位点的数量少256倍，两种类型的位点之间的亲和力差异为200,000倍。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As discussed above, once the sequence preferences are known, the information may be used to design oligomeric molecules (homopolymers or heteropolymers) with substantially greater sequence specificity and substantially higher binding affinity. For example, if a DNA-binding molecule, X, binds a 4 bp sequence 5'-ACGT-3'/5'-ACGT-3' with an equilibrium affinity constant of 2&times;10.sup.5 M.sup.-1, then the dimer of X, X.sub.2, should bind the dimer of the sequence, 5'-ACGTACGT- 3'/5'-ACGTACGT-3', with an equilibrium affinity constant of (2&times;10.  sup.5 M.sup.-1).sup.2 =4&times;10.sup.10 M.sup.-2.  The DNA-binding dimer molecule, X.sub.2, recognizes an 8 bp sequence, conferring higher sequence specificity, with a binding affinity that is theoretically 200, 000-fold higher than the DNA-binding monomer, X.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如上所述，一旦已知序列偏好，该信息可用于设计具有显著更高的序列特异性和显著更高的结合亲和力的寡聚物分子（均聚物或杂聚物）。 例如，如果DNA结合分子X结合4bp序列5′-ACGT-3′/5′-ACGT-3′，平衡亲和常数为2×10-5m-1，则X的二聚体X2应结合序列5′-ACGTACGT-3′/5′-ACGTACGT-3′，平衡亲和常数为(2×10-5m-1)2=4×10-5m-2。 DNA结合二聚体分子X2识别8bp序列，赋予更高的序列特异性，结合亲和力理论上比DNA结合单体X高200,000倍。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Streptavidin-conjugated superparamagnetic polystyrene beads (Dynabeads M-280 Streptavidin, Dynal AS, 6-7&times;10.sup.8 beads/ml) are washed in binding buffer then used to capture biotinylated oligonucleotides (Example 1). The beads are added to a 15 ul binding reaction mixture containing binding buffer and biotinylated oligonucleotide. The beads/oligonucleotide mixture is incubated for varying lengths of time with the binding mixture to determine the incubation period to maximize capture of protein-free biotinylated oligonucleotides. After capture of the biotinylated oligonucleotide, the beads can be retrieved by placing the reaction tubes in a magnetic rack (96-well plate magnets are available from Dynal). The beads are then washed.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在结合缓冲液中洗涤链霉抗生物素蛋白缀合的超顺磁性聚苯乙烯珠粒（Dynabeads M-280链霉抗生物素蛋白，Dynal AS，6-7次108珠粒/ml)，然后用于捕获生物素化的寡核苷酸（实施例1）。 将珠粒加入到含有结合缓冲液和生物素化寡核苷酸的15μL结合反应混合物中。 将珠粒/寡核苷酸混合物与结合混合物一起温育不同长度的时间以确定温育期，从而使无蛋白质生物素化寡核苷酸的捕获最大化。 在捕获生物素化的寡核苷酸后，可以通过将反应管放置在磁架（96孔板磁体可从Dynal获得）中来回收珠粒。 然后洗涤珠粒。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radioactive primer was individually annealed to the top strand of each of the 256 test oligonucleotides. The bottom strand is synthesized using deoxyribonucleotides and Klenow fragment or T4 polymerase (Ausubel, et al.).  The annealing mixture typically contained 200 ng HSV primer mixed with 1 &mgr;g top strand in 20 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.  5, 1 mM spermidine, and 0.1 mM EDTA (35 &mgr;l reaction volume). The primer was annealed to the top strand by incubating the sample for 2 minutes at 70&deg; C., then placing the sample at room temperature or on ice. To the annealing mixture, 4.5 &mgr;l 10&times; Klenow buffer (10.  times.=200 mM Tris-HCL, 500 mM NaCl, 50 mM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM dithiothreitol), 5 &mgr;l 0.5 mM each dNTP (dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dTTP), and 1 &mgr;l Klenow fragment were added. This reaction mixture was incubated 30-60 minutes at room temperature (or up to 37&deg; C.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The following discussion provides perspective and illustrates the improvement in the actual number of target sites in the human genome for when using a dimer of distamycin versus a monomer of distamycin. The human genome is about 3&times;10.sup.9 bp. If the number of favored target sites for distamycin is four, and the number of possible 4 bp sequences is 4.sup.4 =256, then the number of favored target sites in the genome is (4/256) (3&times;10.sup.9)=4.7&times;10.sup.7, or about 50 million favored target sites.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>以下讨论提供了前景并说明了当使用偏端霉素二聚体相对于偏端霉素单体时，人基因组中靶位点的实际数目的改善。 人类基因组约为10个碱基的3倍。 如果偏端霉素的有利靶位点的数目为4，并且可能的4bp序列的数目为4=256，则基因组中有利靶位点的数目为(4/256)(3乘以109)=4.7乘以107，或约5000万个有利靶位点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Given that the number of possible 8 bp sites is 4.sup.8 =65,536, if all possible combinatorial 8 bp sites derived from the favored 4 bp sites (2.sup.4 =16; FIG. 25) are favored, then the number of favored 8 bp target sites is (16/65,536)(3&times;10.sup.9)=7.3&times;10.sup.5 or about 700,000 possible sites. This represents a 64-fold reduction in the number of highest affinity target sites between distamycin and bis- distamycin; alternatively, this result can be viewed as a 64-fold increase in specificity.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>假定可能的8bp位点的数量是4.8=65,536，如果来自有利的4bp位点的所有可能的组合8bp位点(2.4=16；图25）是有利的，则有利的8bp靶位点的数量是(16/65,536)(3倍109)=7.3倍105或约700,000个可能的位点。 这表示偏端霉素和双偏端霉素之间的最高亲和力靶位点的数量减少了64倍； 或者，该结果可以被视为特异性增加64倍。</base:Paragraphs>

This represents a 64-fold reduction in the number of highest affinity target sites between distamycin and bis- distamycin; alternatively, this result can be viewed as a 64-fold increase in specificity.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Likewise, given that the number of possible 12 bp sites is 4.  sup. 12 =1.7&times;10.sup.7, if all possible favored 12 bp sites (3.sup.4 =81) are favored, then the number of favored 12 bp target sites is (81/1.  7.  times.10.sup.7) (3&times;10.sup.9)=1.4&times;10.sup.4 : i.e., 14,000 possible highest affinity sites. This represents an approximately 3000- fold decrease in the number of highest affinity target sites between distamycin and tris-distamycin and a 500-fold decrease in the number of highest affinity target sites between bis-distamycin and tris-distamycin.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>同样，考虑到可能的12bp位点的数量为4。 超级的 如果所有可能的有利的12bp位点(3=81)都是有利的，则有利的12bp靶位点的数量是(81/1.7×107)(3×109)=1.4×104，即14,000个可能的最高亲和力位点。 这表示偏端霉素和tris-偏端霉素之间的最高亲和力靶位点的数目减少了约3000倍，而双-偏端霉素和tris-偏端霉素之间的最高亲和力靶位点的数目减少了500倍。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As the target site increases in size, (i) the number of target sites in a defined number of nucleotides decreases, and (ii) the specificity increases.  Further, the affinity of binding is typically the product of the binding affinities of component parts (see Section VI.E.1 above). As an example, the published binding constant for distamycin to bulk genomic DNA is about 2&times;10.sup.5 M.sup.-1. Dimers of distamycin will have a theoretical binding affinity of the square of the binding constant of distamycin:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>随着靶位点大小的增加，(i)限定数目的核苷酸中的靶位点数目减少，和(ii)特异性增加。 此外，结合亲和力通常是组分部分的结合亲和力的乘积（参见上文第VI.E.1节）。 作为一个实例，偏端霉素与大量基因组DNA的公开结合常数为约2×105M-1。 偏端霉素二聚体的理论结合亲和力为偏端霉素结合常数的平方：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>（平均K距离=2×10 5米-1；K双距离=(2×10 5米-1）2=4×10 10米-1）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Thus, if distamycin shows only a 10-fold higher affinity (2&times; 10. sup.6 M.sup.-1) for the top favored binding sites than the average binding sites in DNA, then the affinity constant for bis- distamycin to an 8 bp site comprised of two favored binding sites is 100- fold higher than for an 8 bp sequence comprised of two average binding sites:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>因此，如果偏端霉素对最有利的结合位点的亲和力仅比对DNA中平均结合位点的亲和力高10倍(2×106M-1)，则双偏端霉素对由两个有利结合位点组成的8bp位点的亲和力常数比对由两个平均结合位点组成的8bp序列的亲和力常数高100倍：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In the above-described example, since the reference voltage VrefP generated by reference voltage generation circuit 10 has a negative temperature characteristic, the materials of resistance components R1 and R2 are so selected that the output voltage of level shifter circuit 50 also has a negative temperature characteristic. In this case, the temperature coefficient &agr;.sub.1 of resistance component R1 is set larger than the temperature coefficient &agr;.sub.2 of resistance component R2.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在上述例子中，由于由参考电压产生电路10产生的参考电压VrefP具有负温度特性，所以选择电阻元件R1和R2的材料，使得电平移位器电路50的输出电压也具有负温度特性。 在这种情况下，电阻成分R1的温度系数Δgr1被设定为大于电阻成分R2的温度系数Δgr2。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>As described above, the internal down converter according to the fifth embodiment includes reference voltage generation circuit for burn- in test 10a having a positive temperature characteristic, and therefore the internal voltage Vint having the temperature characteristic shown in FIG. 13 is supplied as the internal power supply voltage.  Accordingly, in a wider range of the external power supply voltage Vext, in other words in the range 3.3 V&lE;Vext&lE;6.0+&agr; V, the internal voltage Vint of 3.3 V (constant) can be supplied as the internal power supply voltage to the internal circuit (not shown) under the ambient temperature for normal operation. Stated differently, an internal down converter capable of operating in a wider range of external power supply voltage, taking into account execution of burn-in test is provided.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如上所述，根据第五实施例的内部降压变换器包括具有正温度特性的老化测试用参考电压产生电路10a，因此具有图13所示温度特性的内部电压Vint被提供作为内部电源电压。 因此，在外部电源电压Vext的较宽范围内，换句话说，在3.3Vext； 在正常操作的环境温度下，可以将3.3V（恒定）的内部电压Vint作为内部电源电压提供给内部电路（未示出）。 换句话说，提供了一种考虑到老化测试的执行而能够在更宽的外部电源电压范围内工作的内部降压变换器。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>At a room temperature (25&deg; C.), the resistance value R.sub.  1 of resistance component R1 in level shifter circuit 50 is set to be 13 K. OMEGA., and the resistance value R.sub.2 of resistance component R2 to 27 K&OHgr;.  Therefore, when the internal voltage VintP is 4 V, 2.7 V is output to node N5 in level shifter circuit 50.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在室温(25℃)下，电阻值R 电平移位器电路50中的电阻元件R1的电阻值R1被设置为13KΩ，电阻元件R2的电阻值R2被设置为27KΩ。 因此，当内部电压VintP为4V时，将2.7V输出到电平移位器电路50中的节点N5。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>where &agr;.sub.1 represents the temperature coefficient of resistance component R1, &agr;.sub.2 the temperature coefficient of the resistance component R2, and &Dgr;T the temperature difference between an operation temperature and a reference temperature (room temperature). In this example, since R.sub.1 =13 [K&OHgr;], R.sub.2 =27 (K&OHgr;], . alpha.  .sub.1 =4&times;10.sup.-3 [/&deg; C.], &agr;.sub. 2 =-5&times; 10.sup.-4 [/&deg; C.], and &Dgr;T=80-25=55 [&deg; C. ], R.sub.1 '=15.9 [K&OHgr;] and R.sub.2 '=26.3 [K&OHgr;] are given.</base:Paragraphs>

If the resistance values and temperature coefficient of resistance components R1 and R2 in level shifter circuit 50 are set so as to satisfy the following equation, the internal voltage VintP becomes constant both when operating at a room temperature and at a high temperature.  ##EQU1## where R.sub.1 represents the resistance value of the resistance component R1 at a reference temperature, and R.sub.2 represents the resistance value of resistance component R2 at the reference temperature. &agr;.sub.1 represents the temperature coefficient of resistance component R1, .  alpha..sub.2 the temperature coefficient of resistance component R2, and &agr;.sub.3 the temperature coefficient of the reference voltage. Vi represents the internal voltage at the reference temperature, while Vr the reference voltage at the reference temperature. &Dgr;T represents the difference between the operation temperature and the reference temperature. The temperature coefficient &agr;.sub.3 of the reference voltage is given by the following equation:</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>注意，电平移位器电路50中的电阻部件R1和R2的电阻值和温度系数不限于上述示例。 如果电平移位器电路50中的电阻部件R1和R2的电阻值和温度系数被设置为满足以下等式，则当在室温和高温下操作时，内部电压VintP都变得恒定。 其中R1表示电阻部件R1在参考温度下的电阻值，并且R2表示电阻部件R2在参考温度下的电阻值。 ΔGR1表示电阻元件R1的温度系数。 α2是电阻元件R2的温度系数，αGR3是参考电压的温度系数。 Vi表示参考温度下的内部电压，而Vr表示参考温度下的参考电压。 表示操作温度与参考温度之间的差。 参考电压的温度系数ΔG3由以下等式给出：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>FIG. 9 illustrates the operations performed by personal computer 340 of FIG.  3 to obtain the list information including class, type, category, and numeric values for categories, from a spreadsheet.  FIG. 10 illustrates the operations performed by personal computer 340 for obtaining list information from smart card 100 and then inserting the list information into a spreadsheet. FIG. 13 illustrates a sample spreadsheet that advantageously could be prepared using the Microsoft Excel&reg; spreadsheet program. FIG. 14 illustrates the contents of a file representing the spreadsheet of FIG. 13 that was stored using the Excel spreadsheet program with the CSV (comma-separated values) protocol.  This protocol can also be read by the Excel spreadsheet program and subsequently stored in the normal Excel protocol. Lines 1301 through 1304 of FIG. 13 correspond to lines 1401-1404 of FIG. 4, respectively. As can be seen from FIG.  14, the columns of FIG. 13 are shown as being separated by commas. For example, line 1403 shows the columns of line 1303 by the utilization of commas.  Similarly, the numeric values of line 1304 can be easily found in line 1404 by counting commas to obtain the right column.  </base:Paragraphs>
