detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One illustration of how this system could be used is as follows.  Each cognate site could be placed 5' to a reporter gene (such as genes encoding &bgr;-galactoside or luciferase) such that binding of the protein to the cognate site would enhance transcription of the reporter gene. The presence of a sequence-specific DNA-binding drug that blocked the DNA:protein interaction would decrease the enhancement of the reporter gene expression. Several DNA enhancers could be coupled to reporter genes, then each construct compared to one another in the presence or absence of small DNA-binding test molecules. In the case where multiple protein/cognate binding sites are used for screening, a competitive inhibitor that blocks one interaction but not the others could be identified by the lack of transcription of a reporter gene in a transfected cell line or in an in vitro assay. Only one such DNA-binding sequence, specific for the protein of interest, could be screened with each assay system. This approach has a number of limitations including limited testing capability and the need to construct the appropriate reporter system for each different protein/cognate site of interest.  Another example of a system to detect sequence-specific DNA-binding molecules would involve cloning a DNA-binding protein of interest, expressing the protein in an expression system (e.g., bacterial, baculovirus, or mammalian expression systems), preparing a purified or partially purified sample of protein, then using the protein in an in vitro competition assay to detect molecules that blocked the DNA:protein interaction.  These types of systems are analogous to many receptor:ligand or enzyme:substrate screening assays developed in the past, but have the same limitations as outlined above in that a new system must be developed for every different protein/cognate site combination of interest. The capacity for screening numerous different sequences is therefore limited.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>可以如何使用该系统的一个说明如下。 每个同源位点可以置于报道基因（例如编码β-半乳糖苷或荧光素酶的基因）的5'端，使得蛋白质与同源位点的结合将增强报道基因的转录。 阻断DNA：蛋白质相互作用的序列特异性DNA结合药物的存在将降低报告基因表达的增强。 可以将几种DNA增强子与报道基因偶联，然后在存在或不存在小DNA结合测试分子的情况下将每个构建体彼此比较。 在使用多个蛋白质/同源结合位点进行筛选的情况下，可以通过在转染的细胞系中或在体外测定中缺乏报告基因的转录来鉴定阻断一种相互作用但不阻断其他相互作用的竞争性抑制剂。 每种测定系统只能筛选一种对感兴趣的蛋白质特异的这样的DNA结合序列。 该方法具有许多限制，包括有限的测试能力和需要为每个不同的感兴趣的蛋白质/同源位点构建适当的报告系统。 检测序列特异性DNA结合分子的系统的另一个实例将涉及克隆感兴趣的DNA结合蛋白，在表达系统（例如，细菌、杆状病毒或哺乳动物表达系统）中表达蛋白质，制备纯化或部分纯化的蛋白质样品，然后在体外竞争测定中使用蛋白质来检测阻断DNA：蛋白质相互作用的分子。 这些类型的系统类似于过去开发的许多受体：配体或酶：底物筛选测定，但具有与上述相同的局限性，因为必须为每种不同的感兴趣的蛋白质/同源位点组合开发新的系统。 因此，筛选许多不同序列的能力是有限的。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Other hybrid proteins can be utilized to prepare DNA-binding proteins of interest. For example, fusing a DNA-binding protein coding sequence in- frame with a sequence encoding the thrombin site and also in- frame with the &bgr;-galactoside coding sequence. Such hybrid proteins can be isolated by affinity or immunoaffinity columns (Maniatis, et al.; Pierce, Rockford Ill.).  Further, DNA-binding proteins can be isolated by affinity chromatography based on their ability to interact with their cognate DNA binding site. For example, the UL9 DNA-binding site (SEQ ID NO:601) can be covalently linked to a solid support (e.g., CnBr- activated Sepharose 4B beads, Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.), extracts passed over the support, the support washed, and the DNA-binding then isolated from the support with a salt gradient (Kadonaga). Alternatively, other expression systems in bacteria, yeast, insect cells or mammalian cells can be used to express adequate levels of a DNA-binding protein for use in this assay.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>其他杂合蛋白可用于制备感兴趣的DNA结合蛋白。 例如，将DNA结合蛋白编码序列与编码凝血酶位点的序列框内融合，并且还与β-半乳糖苷编码序列框内融合。 这种杂合蛋白可以通过亲和或免疫亲和柱分离（Maniatis等；Pierce,Rockford III.）。 此外，DNA结合蛋白可以基于其与其同源DNA结合位点相互作用的能力通过亲和色谱分离。 例如，UL9 DNA结合位点（SEQ ID NO:601)可以与固体支持物（例如，CNBr活化的琼脂糖4B珠，Pharmacia，Piscataway N.J.）共价连接，提取物通过支持物，洗涤支持物，然后用盐梯度（Kadonaga）从支持物中分离DNA结合。 或者，细菌、酵母、昆虫细胞或哺乳动物细胞中的其他表达系统可用于表达足够水平的DNA结合蛋白以用于该测定。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>E. coli strain JM109 was transformed with pGEX-2T/C-UL9-COOH and was grown at 37&deg; C. to saturation density overnight. The overnight culture was diluted 1:10 with LB medium containing ampicillin and grown from one hour at 30&deg; C. IPTG (isopropyllthio-&bgr;- galactoside) (GIBCO-BRL) was added to a final concentration of 0.1 mM and the incubation was continued for 2-5 hours.  Bacterial cells containing the plasmid were subjected to the temperature shift and IPTG conditions, which induced transcription from the tac promoter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用pGEX-2T/C-UL9-COOH转化大肠杆菌菌株JM109，并在37℃下生长； C.至饱和密度过夜。 将过夜培养物用含有氨苄青霉素的LB培养基1:10稀释，并在30℃下生长1小时； C.加入IPTG（异丙基硫代-β-半乳糖苷）（GIBCO-BRL）至终浓度为0.1 mM，继续温育2-5小时。 使含有质粒的细菌细胞经受温度转变和IPTG条件，其诱导从tac启动子的转录。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Many of the experiments described above for UL9 DNA:protein- binding studies have made use of radio-labelled oligonucleotides. The techniques involved in radiolabelling of oligonucleotides have been discussed above. A specific activity of 10.sup.8 -10.sup.9 dpm per &mgr;g DNA is routinely achieved using standard methods (e.g., end-labeling the oligonucleotide with adenosine &ggr;-[.sup.32 P]-5' triphosphate and T4 polynucleotide kinase). This level of specific activity allows small amounts of DNA to be measured either by autoradiography of gels or filters exposed to film or by direct counting of samples in scintillation fluid.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>上述针对UL9 DNA：蛋白质结合研究的许多实验使用了放射性标记的寡核苷酸。 上文已经讨论了涉及寡核苷酸的放射性标记的技术。 使用标准方法（例如，用腺苷和GGR-[32P]-5'三磷酸和T4多核苷酸激酶末端标记寡核苷酸）常规地实现每mgr g DNA 10-8-10dpm的比活性。 这种比活性水平允许通过凝胶或暴露于胶片的滤膜的放射自显影或通过闪烁液中样品的直接计数来测量少量DNA。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One example of the preparation of a site-specifically biotinylated oligonucleotide is outlined in FIG. 4. An oligonucleotide primer complementary to the 3' sequences of the screening sequence- containing oligonucleotide was synthesized. This oligonucleotide terminated at the residue corresponding to the C in position 9 of the screening sequence. The primer oligonucleotide was hybridized to the oligonucleotide containing the screening sequence.  Biotin-11-dUTP (Bethesda Research Laboratories (BRL), Gaithersburg Md.)  and Klenow enzyme were added to this complex (FIG. 4) and the resulting partially double-stranded biotinylated complexes were separated from the unincorporated nucleotides using either pre-prepared &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; spin columns (Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.)  or &quot;NENSORB&quot; columns (New England Nuclear) as per manufacturer's instructions. The remaining single-strand region was converted to double-strands using DNA polymerase I Klenow fragment and dNTPs resulting in a fully double- stranded oligonucleotide.  A second &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; column was used to purify the double-stranded oligonucleotide. Oligonucleotides were diluted or resuspended in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA and stored at -20&deg; C. For radiolabelling the complexes, .sup. 32 P-alpha-dCTP (New England Nuclear, Wilmington, Del.)  replaced dCTP for the double-strand completion step.  Alternatively, the top strand, the primer, or the fully double- stranded oligonucleotide have been radiolabeled with &ggr;-.sup.32 P- ATP and polynucleotide kinase (NEB, Beverly, Mass.). Most of our preliminary studies have employed radiolabeled, double-stranded oligonucleotides. The oligonucleotides are prepared by radiolabeling the primer with T4 polynucleotide kinase and . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP, annealing the &quot;top&quot; strand full length oligonucleotide, and &quot;filling-in&quot; with Klenow fragment and deoxynucleotide triphosphates. After phosphorylation and second strand synthesis, oligonucleotides are separated from buffer and unincorporated triphosphates using &quot;G-25 SEPHADEX&quot; preformed spin columns (IBI, New Haven, Conn. or Biorad, Richmond Calif.). This process is outlined in FIG. 4. The reaction conditions for all of the above Klenow reactions were as follows: 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 10 mM MgCl.sub.2, 50 mM NaCl, 1 mM dithioerythritol, 0.  33-100 &mgr;M deoxytriphosphates, 2 units Klenow enzyme (Boehringer- Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.). The Klenow reactions were incubated at 25. degree. C. for 15 minutes to 1 hour. The polynucleotide kinase reactions were incubated at 37&deg; C. for 30 minutes to 1 hour.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>制备位点特异性生物素化寡核苷酸的一个实例概述于图4中。 合成与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸的3'序列互补的寡核苷酸引物。 该寡核苷酸在对应于筛选序列的位置9中的C的残基处终止。 引物寡核苷酸与含有筛选序列的寡核苷酸杂交。 将生物素-11-dUTP(Bethesda Research Laboratories(BRL)，Gaithersburg Md.）和Klenow酶加入到该复合物中（图4)，并使用预先制备的“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”将所得的部分双链生物素化复合物与未掺入的核苷酸分离。 旋转柱（Pharmacia,Piscataway N.J.）或“NENSORB” 柱（New England Nuclear）。 使用DNA聚合酶I Klenow片段和dNTPs将剩余的单链区域转化为双链，产生完全双链寡核苷酸。 第二代G-25葡聚糖凝胶 使用柱纯化双链寡核苷酸。 将寡核苷酸稀释或重悬于10mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA中，并储存在-20℃； C.为了放射性标记复合物， 32P-α-dCTP(New England Nuclear,Wilmington,Del.）替代dCTP用于双链完成步骤。 或者，顶链、引物或完全双链寡核苷酸已经用32P-ATP和多核苷酸激酶(NEB，Beverly，Mass.)放射性标记。 我们的大多数初步研究采用放射性标记的双链寡核苷酸。 通过用T4多核苷酸激酶放射性标记引物来制备寡核苷酸。 γ-32P-ATP，退火“top” 链全长寡核苷酸，和“填充” 用Klenow片段和脱氧核苷酸三磷酸。 磷酸化和第二链合成后，用G-25葡聚糖凝胶从缓冲液和未掺入的三磷酸中分离寡核苷酸。 预成型旋转柱（IBI,New Haven,Conn.或Biorad,Richmond Calif.）。 该过程在图4中概述。 所有上述Klenow反应的反应条件如下：10 mM Tris-HCl，pH 7.5，10 mM MgCl2，50 mM NaCl，1 mM二硫赤藓糖醇，0 mM NaCl。 33-100μg/ml脱氧三磷酸，2单位Klenow酶（Boehringer-Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）。 将Klenow反应在25℃温育。 学位 C.持续15分钟至1小时。 将多核苷酸激酶反应物在37℃； C.持续30分钟至1小时。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Radioactive-labeling of the primer with .sup.32 P is accomplished by the enzymatic transfer of a radioactive phosphate from &ggr;-.sup. 32 P- ATP to the 5' end of the primer oligonucleotide using T4 polynucleotide kinase (Ausubel, et al.). For labeling 256 oligonucleotides, approximately 60 &mgr;g HSV primer was labeled as follows. The oligonucleotide was incubated for 1 hour at 37&deg; C. with 125 &mgr;l . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP (20 mCi total, 7000 Ci/mmol) and 600 units of T4 polynucleotide kinase in a 3 ml reaction volume containing 50 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 10 MM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM spermidine, and 1.5 mM dithiothreitol (freshly prepared). To stop the reaction, EDTA was added to a final concentration of 20 mM. Unincorporated nucleotides were removed using &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; chromatography in 10 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA (TE+50).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用32P对引物进行放射性标记是通过酶促转移放射性磷酸酯从99gR-完成的。 使用T4多核苷酸激酶（Ausubel等人）将32P-ATP连接到引物寡核苷酸的5'末端。 为了标记256个寡核苷酸，如下标记约60μg HSV引物。 将寡核苷酸在37℃下孵育1小时； C.与125名经理； γ-32P-ATP(20mCi，7000Ci/mmol)和600单位T4多核苷酸激酶在含有50mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5、10mM MgCl2、10mM亚精胺和1.5mM二硫苏糖醇（新鲜制备的）的3ml反应体积中。 为了终止反应，加入EDTA至终浓度为20mM。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”去除未掺入的核苷酸。 在10mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA(TE+50)中进行色谱。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Assay mixtures are prepared as described in Example 10, using a high- ranking test oligonucleotide, e.g., TTCC (ranking=#1), as the radiolabelled oligonucleotide in the experiment. The test oligonucleotide TTCC is labelled to high specific activity with &ggr;-. sup.32 P-ATP as described in Example 8: in this example, the labeled TTCC oligonucleotide will be referred to as the &quot;high specific activity test oligonucleotide&quot;.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如实施例10中所述制备测定混合物，在实验中使用高级测试寡核苷酸，例如TTCC（等级=#1)作为放射性标记的寡核苷酸。 测试寡核苷酸TTCC用&GGR-标记至高比活性。 在本实施例中，标记的TTCC寡核苷酸被称为“高特异性活性测试寡核苷酸”。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The % reduction in DNA:protein complex as a result of the presence of actinomycin D is called &quot;r %&quot;; the lower the r % score, the more effective the test molecule in blocking the DNA:protein interaction.  For each screen, the test oligonucleotides have been ranked from 1 to 256, based on the r % score; the rank of 1 denotes the lowest r % score (the test oligonucleotide most effected by the test molecule), the rank of 256 denotes the highest r % score (the test oligonucleotide least effected by the test molecule). The table also shows the average r % score and average rank of each test oligonucleotide; the averages are calculated from the sum of the individual scores and ranks divided by the number of screens, respectively. The test oligonucleotides are then ranked from 1 to 256 based on the average rank in all screens. The final ranking is shown in the two external columns on the table. Test oligonucleotides ranking less than 50 in any individual screen are shown in highlighted boxes.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>放线菌素D的存在导致DNA：蛋白质复合物减少的百分比称为“r%”。 r%得分越低，测试分子在阻断DNA：蛋白质相互作用方面越有效。 对于每次筛选，测试寡核苷酸已经基于r%分数从1到256排序； 等级1表示最低r%得分（受测试分子影响最大的测试寡核苷酸），等级256表示最高r%得分（受测试分子影响最小的测试寡核苷酸）。 该表还显示了每个测试寡核苷酸的平均r%得分和平均等级； 平均值分别由各个分数和等级的总和除以筛选数来计算。 然后基于所有筛选中的平均等级将测试寡核苷酸从1至256分级。 最终排序显示在表上的两个外部列中。 在任何单独筛选中排序小于50的测试寡核苷酸以突出显示的框显示。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: HTML字符实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The program first examines the files for all header lines containing the word &quot;complete&quot; but not &quot;mRNA&quot; or &quot;pseudogene&quot;; the output is printed. Complete genes sometimes contain the promoter sequences but complete mRNA genes do not contain the promoters. mRNA genes are not of interest for the purpose of detecting promoter elements. Next, the AWK system looks for the word &quot;exon 1&quot; and if it finds it prints the header and &quot;DE&quot; line. Then it looks for &quot;5&quot; and prints the header line if it does not contain the word &quot;mRNA&quot;. Next it looks for the word &quot;transcription&quot; and if it finds it prints the preceding and following line along with description line.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>程序首先检查文件中包含单词“完成”的所有标题行。 而不是“mRNA” 或“假基因” 打印输出。 完整基因有时含有启动子序列，但完整mRNA基因不含有启动子。 为了检测启动子元件的目的，mRNA基因不是感兴趣的。 接下来，AWK系统寻找单词“外显子1”。 并且如果它发现它打印标题和“解密” 线。 然后它寻找“5” 并且如果标题行不包含单词“mRNA”，则打印标题行。 接下来它寻找单词“transcription” 并且如果它找到，则它打印前一行和后一行以及描述行。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The prediction of a steady, incompressible fluid flow over a large- scale flow field is an invaluable design tool. A well-known method of achieving such prediction is the solving of the Navier Stokes equations, shown below: ##EQU1## where V=V(u,v,w) is the vector velocity field containing the x, y, and z component of velocity, P is the fluid pressure, &ngr; is the kinematic fluid viscosity, and p is the constant fluid density. &nabla; indicates the divergence or gradient of a vector of scaler field respectively, and &nabla;.sup.2 indicates the vector Laplacian. The D/Dt expression is the symbol for the substantial derivative and the symbol &quot;t&quot; represents time.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>预测定常不可压缩流体在大尺寸流场上的流动是一种宝贵的设计工具。 实现这种预测的一种众所周知的方法是求解纳维尔-斯托克斯方程，如下所示：其中，v=v（u，v，w）是包含速度的x、y和z分量的矢量速度场，P是流体压力，kNgr； 是运动流体粘度，并且ρ是恒定流体密度。 &nabla； 表示定标器场的向量的散度或梯度，并且表示向量拉普拉斯算子。 D/Dt表达式是实质导数的符号和符号“t”。 代表时间。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>It is noted that the resistance values and temperature coefficient of resistance components R1 and R2 in level shifter circuit 50 are not limited to the above-described example. If the resistance values and temperature coefficient of resistance components R1 and R2 in level shifter circuit 50 are set so as to satisfy the following equation, the internal voltage VintP becomes constant both when operating at a room temperature and at a high temperature.  ##EQU1## where R.sub.1 represents the resistance value of the resistance component R1 at a reference temperature, and R.sub.2 represents the resistance value of resistance component R2 at the reference temperature. &agr;.sub.1 represents the temperature coefficient of resistance component R1, .  alpha..sub.2 the temperature coefficient of resistance component R2, and &agr;.sub.3 the temperature coefficient of the reference voltage. Vi represents the internal voltage at the reference temperature, while Vr the reference voltage at the reference temperature. &Dgr;T represents the difference between the operation temperature and the reference temperature. The temperature coefficient &agr;.sub.3 of the reference voltage is given by the following equation:</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>There are two major components in the assay, the test oligonucleotide (i.e., the test sequence) and the DNA-binding domain of UL9, which is described below.  A number of theoretical considerations have been employed in establishing the assay system. In one embodiment of the invention, the assay is used as a mass-screening assay: in this embodiment the smallest volumes and concentrations possible were desirable. Each assay typically uses about 0.1-0.5 ng DNA in a 15-20 &mgr; l reaction volume (approximately 0.3-1.5 nM). The protein concentration is in excess and can be varied to increase or decrease the sensitivity of the assay. In the simplest scenario (stearic hindrance), where the small molecule is acting as a competitive inhibitor and the ratio of DNA:protein and DNA-binding test molecule:DNA is 1:1, the system kinetics can be described by the following equations: ##EQU1##</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在测定中存在两个主要组分，测试寡核苷酸（即，测试序列）和UL9的DNA结合结构域，其在下文中描述。 在建立测定系统中已经采用了许多理论考虑。 在本发明的一个实施方案中，该测定法用作质量筛选测定法：在该实施方案中，可能的最小体积和浓度是期望的。 每个测定通常在15-20μgR中使用约0.1-0.5ng DNA； 反应体积（约0.3-1.5nm)。 蛋白质浓度是过量的，并且可以改变以增加或降低测定的灵敏度。 在最简单的情况下（硬脂酸位阻），其中小分子充当竞争性抑制剂并且DNA：蛋白质和DNA结合测试分子：DNA的比率为1:1，系统动力学可以通过以下等式描述：</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 命名实体
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In order to overcome this problem, a method called pseudocompressibility was introduced by A. J. Chorin in &quot;A Numerical Method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems&quot;, J. Comp. Physics, Vol. 2, pp. 12-16, 1967, to alter the incompressible equations shown above to the form shown in equations (3) and (4) below: ##EQU2## The difference between equations (1) and (2) and (3) and (4) can be seen as the addition of the &part;&rgr;/&part;t term in the conservation of fluid mass equation. This term is used to change the mathematical representation of the fluid equations, such that they can be solved easier and more directly. However, by adding the pressure time derivative term, the fluid behavior that these equations describe has been changed. In equations (1) and (2) the &quot;t&quot; symbol represents true physical time. In equation (3) and (4) &quot;t&quot; no longer represents time; it is only a mathematical iteration parameter used to allow the more straight forward solution method. A solution to equations (3) and (4) will provide only steady incompressible flow fields. If the original equations (1) and (2) were solved, unsteady flow fields could also be predicted. Therefore in the following technique described, the resulting flow fields predicted by the method discussed will be solutions for steady incompressible flow fields only.  The equations (1) and (2) are known as the incompressible Navier Stokes equations.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了克服这个问题，A.J.Chorin在“A Numerical method for Solving Incompressible Viscous Flow Problems”，J.Comp.Chem.Soc.1990，28，289中引入了一种称为拟压缩性的方法。 等式（1）和（2）以及（3）和（4）之间的差异可以看作是在流体质量守恒等式中增加了项。 该术语用于改变流体方程的数学表示，使得它们可以更容易且更直接地求解。 然而，通过添加压力时间微分项，这些方程描述的流体行为已经改变。 在等式（1）和（2）中 符号代表真实的物理时间。 在等式（3）和（4）中，“t” 不再代表时间； 它只是用于允许更直接的解方法的数学迭代参数。 方程（3）和（4）的解将仅提供稳定的不可压缩流场。 如果求解原始方程（1）和(2)，也可以预测非定常流场。 因此，在所描述的以下技术中，由所讨论的方法预测的所得流场将仅是稳定的不可压缩流场的解。 方程（1）和（2）被称为不可压缩纳维尔-斯托克斯方程。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 等式校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>where &agr;.sub.1 represents the temperature coefficient of resistance component R1, &agr;.sub.2 the temperature coefficient of the resistance component R2, and &Dgr;T the temperature difference between an operation temperature and a reference temperature (room temperature). In this example, since R.sub.1 =13 [K&OHgr;], R.sub.2 =27 (K&OHgr;], . alpha.  .sub.1 =4&times;10.sup.-3 [/&deg; C.], &agr;.sub. 2 =-5&times; 10.sup.-4 [/&deg; C.], and &Dgr;T=80-25=55 [&deg; C. ], R.sub.1 '=15.9 [K&OHgr;] and R.sub.2 '=26.3 [K&OHgr;] are given.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>其中，ΔGR1表示电阻元件R1的温度系数，ΔGR2表示电阻元件R2的温度系数，ΔGR2表示工作温度和基准温度（室温）之间的温度差。 在该示例中，由于R1=13[K欧姆]，R2=27[K欧姆]，α1=4倍10-3[K欧姆]，α2=-5倍10-4[K欧姆]和α=80-25=55[K欧姆]，所以给出R1’=15.9[K欧姆]和R2’=26.3[K欧姆]。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 等式校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A burn-in test about a semiconductor integrated circuit device including the internal down converter as illustrated in FIG. 18 will be conducted as follows.  An external power supply voltage Vext giving the same ratio as that of an external power supply voltage Vext and an internal voltage Vint in normal operation at an ambient temperature of 25.  degree. C. (T=To=25&deg; C.) is selected as a burn-in point. Of course, the external voltage Vint is selected in the range not exceeding the breakdown voltage of the semiconductor elements in the circuit. More specifically, assuming that the semiconductor integrated circuit device is operated at the external power supply voltage Vext of 5 V and the internal voltage Vint of 3.3 in normal operation and the breakdown voltage is a little more than 7 V, Vext=7 V and Vint=4.6 V are selected for the burn-in point.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将如下进行关于包括如图18所示的内部降压变换器的半导体集成电路器件的老化测试。 外部电源电压Vext给出与在环境温度为25的正常操作中的外部电源电压Vext和内部电压Vint的比率相同的比率。 学位 T=T0=25℃)作为老化点。 当然，在不超过电路中半导体元件的击穿电压的范围内选择外部电压Vint。 更具体地，假设半导体集成电路器件在正常操作中在5V的外部电源电压Vext和3.3的内部电压Vint下操作，并且击穿电压稍大于7V，则选择Vext=7V和Vint=4.6V作为老化点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 等式校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA were incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay was begun by adding water (control samples) or distamycin (5-15 AM, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12-channel micropipettor.  After incubation with drug for 5-120 minutes, samples were taken and applied to nitrocellulose on a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell). The samples were held at 4&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或偏端霉素(5-15AM，测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育5-120分钟后，取样并施加到96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）上的硝酸纤维素上。 将样品保持在4℃； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 等式校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA were incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay was begun by adding water (control samples) or actinomycin D (25 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12-channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 30 minutes, samples were taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C. FIG. 18 shows the results of 8 screens of actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或放线菌素D(25μg/ml，测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育30分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.图18显示放线菌素D的8次筛选的结果。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 等式校对
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay mixtures containing both UL9 and DNA are incubated at room temperature for at least 10 minutes to allow the DNA:protein complexes to form and for the system to come to equilibrium. At time=0, the assay is begun by adding water (control samples) or test molecule (typically at 1- 5 &mgr;M, test samples) to the assay mixtures using a 12- channel micropipettor. After incubation with drug for 5-120 minutes, samples are taken and applied to nitrocellulose filters using a 96-well dot blot apparatus (Schleicher and Schuell) held at 4&deg; C.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将含有UL9和DNA的测定混合物在室温下孵育至少10分钟，以使DNA：蛋白质复合物形成并使系统达到平衡。 在时间=0时，通过使用12通道微量移液器向测定混合物中加入水（对照样品）或测试分子（通常为1-5μg/ml测试样品）来开始测定。 与药物温育5-120分钟后，取出样品并使用保持在4℃的96孔斑点印迹装置（Schleicher和Schuell）施加到硝酸纤维素滤膜上； C.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A partial solution to these problems is set forth in U.S. Pat.  No. 5, 233,547 of M. A. Kapp, et al. This patent discloses an electronic checkbook which uses a digitizer to collect information concerning the date, the payee of the check, and the amount of the check as the check is being written. The patent also discloses the fact that reconciliation between the balance shown in the electronic checkbook and that shown on a check statement can be reconciled by using an automatic teller machine (ATM) or by connecting into the computer of a bank via a personal computer. The problem with the disclosed system is that it does not categorize the expenses for which the checks are written nor does it address the problem of the use of credit cards and cash.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在M.A.Kapp等人的美国专利No.5,233,547中提出了对这些问题的部分解决方案。该专利公开了一种电子支票本，该电子支票本使用数字转换器来收集关于日期、支票的收款人以及在书写支票时的支票金额的信息。 该专利还公开了这样的事实，即电子支票本中所示的余额与支票报表中所示的余额之间的对账可以通过使用自动柜员机（ATM）或通过个人计算机连接到银行的计算机来对账。 所公开的系统的问题在于，它不对书写支票的费用进行分类，也不解决使用信用卡和现金的问题。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The sequence binding preferences of most known DNA binding molecules have not, to date, been identified. However, several small DNA- binding molecules have been shown to preferentially recognize specific nucleotide sequences, for example: echinomycin has been shown to preferentially bind the sequence [(A/T)CGT]/[ACG(A/T)] (Gilbert et al.); cisplatin has been shown to covalently cross-link a platinum molecule between the N7 atoms of two adjacent deoxyguanosines (Sherman et al.); and calicheamicin has been shown to preferentially bind and cleave the sequence TCCT/AGGA (Zein et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>迄今为止，大多数已知的DNA结合分子的序列结合偏好尚未被鉴定。 然而，已经显示几种小的DNA结合分子优先识别特定的核苷酸序列，例如：已经显示棘霉素优先结合序列[(A/T)CGT]/[ACG(A/T)](Gilbert等人）； 顺铂已显示在两个相邻脱氧鸟苷的N7原子之间共价交联铂分子（Sherman等人）； 加利车霉素已显示优先结合并切割序列TCCT/AGGA（Zein等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Many therapeutic DNA-binding molecules (such as distamycin) that were initially identified based on their therapeutic activity in a biological screen have been later determined to bind DNA. There are several examples in the literature referring to synthetic or naturally- occurring polymers of DNA-binding drugs. Netropsin, for example, is a naturally-occurring oligopeptide that binds to the minor groove of double- stranded DNA. Netropsin contains two 4-amino-1-methylpyrrole-2- carboxylate residues and belongs to a family of similar biological metabolites from Streptomyces spp. This family includes distamycin, anthelvencin (both of which contain three N-methylpyrrole residues), noformycin, amidomycin (both of which contain one N-methylpyrrole residue) and kikumycin (which contains two N-methylpyrrole residues, like netropsin) (Debart, et al.). Synthetic molecules of this family have also been described, including the above-mentioned molecules (Lown, et al.  1985) well as dimeric derivatives (Griffin et al., Gurskii, et al. ) and certain analogues (Bialer, et al. 1980, Bialer, et al. 1981, Krowicki, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>最初基于其在生物筛选中的治疗活性鉴定的许多治疗性DNA结合分子（例如偏端霉素）后来被确定为结合DNA。 文献中有几个实例涉及DNA结合药物的合成或天然存在的聚合物。 例如，Netropsin是与双链DNA的小沟结合的天然存在的寡肽。 Netropsin含有两个4-氨基-1-甲基吡咯-2-羧酸酯残基，并且属于来自链霉菌属的类似生物代谢物家族。 该家族包括偏端霉素、anthelvencin（两者均含有三个N-甲基吡咯残基）、诺福霉素、amidomycin（两者均含有一个N-甲基吡咯残基）和kikumycin（其含有两个N-甲基吡咯残基，如netropsin）（Debart等人）。 还描述了该家族的合成分子，包括上述分子（Lown等人，1985)以及二聚体衍生物（Griffin等人，Gurskii等人）和某些类似物（Bialer等人，1980，Bialer等人，1981，Krowicki等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Molecules in this family, particularly netropsin and distamycin, have been of interest because of their biological activity as antibacterial (Thrum et al., Schuhmann, et al.), antiparasitic (Nakamura et al.), and antiviral drugs (Becker, et al., Lown, et al. 1986, Werner, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>该家族中的分子，特别是奈托霉素和偏端霉素，由于它们作为抗菌药物（Thrum等人，Schuhmann等人）、抗寄生虫药物（Nakamura等人）和抗病毒药物（Becker等人，Lown等人，1986，Werner等人）的生物活性而受到关注。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>该家族中的分子，特别是奈托霉素和偏端霉素，由于它们作为抗菌药物（Thrum等人，Schuhmann等人）、抗寄生虫药物（Nakamura等人）和抗病毒药物（Becker等人，Lown等人，1986，Werner等人）的生物活性而受到关注。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Molecules in this family, particularly netropsin and distamycin, have been of interest because of their biological activity as antibacterial (Thrum et al., Schuhmann, et al.), antiparasitic (Nakamura et al.), and antiviral drugs (Becker, et al., Lown, et al. 1986, Werner, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>该家族中的分子，特别是奈托霉素和偏端霉素，由于它们作为抗菌药物（Thrum等人，Schuhmann等人）、抗寄生虫药物（Nakamura等人）和抗病毒药物（Becker等人，Lown等人，1986，Werner等人）的生物活性而受到关注。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Among the synthetic analogs of netropsin and distamycin are oligopeptides that have been designed to have sequence preferences different from their parent molecules. Such oligopeptides include the &quot;lexitropsin&quot; series of analogues. The N-methlypyrrole groups of the netropsin series were systematically replaced with N-methylimidazole residues, resulting in lexitropsins with increased and altered sequence specificities from the parent compounds (Kissinger, et al.). Further, a number of poly(N-methylpyrrolyl)-netropsin analogues have been designed and synthesized which extend the number of residues in the oligopeptides to increase the size of the binding site (Dervan, 1986).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在netropsin和偏端霉素的合成类似物中有寡肽，其被设计为具有与其母体分子不同的序列偏好。 这类寡肽包括来曲肽 一系列类似物。 netropsin系列的N-甲基吡咯基团被N-甲基咪唑残基系统地取代，导致来自母体化合物的序列特异性增加和改变的lexitropsins（Kissinger等人）。 此外，已经设计和合成了许多聚（N-甲基吡咯基）-netropsin类似物，其扩展了寡肽中的残基数以增加结合位点的大小(Dervan，1986)。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Another example of a system designed to detect sequence- specific DNA- binding drugs would be the use of DNA footprinting procedures as described in the literature. These methods include DNase I or other nuclease footprinting (Chaires, et al.), hydroxy radical footprinting (Portugal, et al.), methidiumpropyl EDTA(iron) complex footprinting (Schultz, et al.), photofootprinting (Jeppesen, et al.), and bidirectional transcription footprinting (White, et al.). These procedures are likely to be accurate within the limits of their sequence testing capability but are seriously limited by (i) the number of different DNA sequences that can be used in one experiment (typically one test sequence that represents the binding site of the DNA-binding protein under study), and (ii) the difficulty of developing high throughput screening systems.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>设计用于检测序列特异性DNA结合药物的系统的另一个实例是使用如文献中所述的DNA足迹法。 这些方法包括DNA酶I或其他核酸酶足迹法（Chaires等人）、羟基自由基足迹法（Portugal等人）、甲基丙基EDTA（铁）复合物足迹法（Schultz等人）、光足迹法（Jeppesen等人）和双向转录足迹法（White等人）。 这些程序在其序列测试能力的限度内可能是准确的，但受到以下严重限制：(i)可用于一个实验的不同DNA序列的数量（通常一个测试序列代表所研究的DNA结合蛋白的结合位点），和(ii)开发高通量筛选系统的难度。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>While DNA-binding recognition sites are usually quite small (4- 17 bp), the sequence that is protected by the binding protein is larger (usually 5 bp or more on either side of the recognition sequence--as detected by DNAase I protection (Galas, et al.)  or methylation interference (Siebenlist, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>虽然DNA结合识别位点通常相当小（4-17 bp），但受结合蛋白保护的序列较大（通常在识别序列的任一侧为5bp或更多），如通过DNA酶I保护（Galas等人）或甲基化干扰（Siebenlist等人）所检测。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Experiments performed in support of the present invention have identified a DNA:protein interaction that is particularly useful for the above described assay: the Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV) UL9 protein that binds the HSV origin of replication (oriS). The UL9 protein has fairly stringent sequence specificity.  There appear to be three binding sites for UL9 in oriS, SEQ ID NO:601, SEQ ID NO:602 and SEQ ID NO:615 (Elias, et al.; Stow, et al.). One sequence (SEQ ID NO:601) binds with at least 10-fold higher affinity than the second sequence (SEQ ID NO:602): the embodiments described below use the higher affinity binding site (SEQ ID NO:601). Another useful UL9-binding site, alibi a lower affinity binding site, SEQ ID NO:641, has also been identified.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为支持本发明而进行的实验已经鉴定了对于上述测定特别有用的DNA：蛋白质相互作用：结合HSV复制起点（oriS）的单纯疱疹病毒(HSV)UL9蛋白。 UL9蛋白具有相当严格的序列特异性。 oriS中UL9似乎有三个结合位点，SEQ ID NO:601、SEQ ID NO:602和SEQ ID NO:615(Elias等人；Stow等人）。 一个序列（SEQ ID NO:601)以比第二序列（SEQ ID NO:602)高至少10倍的亲和力结合：下述实施方案使用更高亲和力的结合位点（SEQ ID NO:601)。 还鉴定了另一个有用的UL9结合位点，即较低亲和力结合位点SEQ ID NO:641。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Experiments performed in support of the present invention have identified a DNA:protein interaction that is particularly useful for the above described assay: the Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV) UL9 protein that binds the HSV origin of replication (oriS). The UL9 protein has fairly stringent sequence specificity.  There appear to be three binding sites for UL9 in oriS, SEQ ID NO:601, SEQ ID NO:602 and SEQ ID NO:615 (Elias, et al.; Stow, et al.). One sequence (SEQ ID NO:601) binds with at least 10-fold higher affinity than the second sequence (SEQ ID NO:602): the embodiments described below use the higher affinity binding site (SEQ ID NO:601). Another useful UL9-binding site, alibi a lower affinity binding site, SEQ ID NO:641, has also been identified.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为支持本发明而进行的实验已经鉴定了对于上述测定特别有用的DNA：蛋白质相互作用：结合HSV复制起点（oriS）的单纯疱疹病毒(HSV)UL9蛋白。 UL9蛋白具有相当严格的序列特异性。 oriS中UL9似乎有三个结合位点，SEQ ID NO:601、SEQ ID NO:602和SEQ ID NO:615(Elias等人；Stow等人）。 一个序列（SEQ ID NO:601)以比第二序列（SEQ ID NO:602)高至少10倍的亲和力结合：下述实施方案使用更高亲和力的结合位点（SEQ ID NO:601)。 还鉴定了另一个有用的UL9结合位点，即较低亲和力结合位点SEQ ID NO:641。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>UL9 protein has been prepared by a number of recombinant techniques (Example 2). The full length UL9 protein has been prepared from baculovirus infected insect cultures (Example 3A, B, and C). Further, a portion of the UL9 protein that contains the DNA-binding domain (UL9- COOH) has been cloned into a bacterial expression vector and produced by bacterial cells (Example 3D and E).  The DNA-binding domain of UL9 is contained within the C-terminal 317 amino acids of the protein (Weir, et al.). The UL9-COOH polypeptide was inserted into the expression vector in- frame with the glutathione-S-transferase (gst) protein. The gst/UL9 fusion protein was purified using affinity chromatography (Example 3E).  The vector also contained a thrombin cleavage site at the junction of the two polypeptides. Therefore, once the fusion protein was isolated (FIG. 8, lane 2) it was treated with thrombin, cleaving the UL9-COOH/ gst fusion protein from the gst polypeptide (FIG. 8, lane 3). The UL9-COOH-gst fusion polypeptide was obtained at a protein purity of greater than 95% as determined using Coomassie staining.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>UL9蛋白已经通过许多重组技术制备（实施例2）。 已经从杆状病毒感染的昆虫培养物制备全长UL9蛋白（实施例3A、B和C）。 此外，将含有DNA结合结构域(UL9-COOH)的UL9蛋白的一部分克隆到细菌表达载体中并由细菌细胞产生（实施例3D和E）。 UL9的DNA结合结构域包含在蛋白质的C末端317个氨基酸内（Weir等人）。 将UL9-COOH多肽与谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶(gst)蛋白同框插入表达载体中。 使用亲和色谱纯化gst/UL9融合蛋白（实施例3E)。 载体还在两个多肽的连接处含有凝血酶切割位点。 因此，一旦分离融合蛋白（图8，泳道2），用凝血酶处理，从gst多肽上切割UL9-COOH/gst融合蛋白（图8，泳道3）。 如使用考马斯染色所确定的，以大于95%的蛋白质纯度获得UL9-COOH-gst融合多肽。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Other hybrid proteins can be utilized to prepare DNA-binding proteins of interest. For example, fusing a DNA-binding protein coding sequence in- frame with a sequence encoding the thrombin site and also in- frame with the &bgr;-galactoside coding sequence. Such hybrid proteins can be isolated by affinity or immunoaffinity columns (Maniatis, et al.; Pierce, Rockford Ill.).  Further, DNA-binding proteins can be isolated by affinity chromatography based on their ability to interact with their cognate DNA binding site. For example, the UL9 DNA-binding site (SEQ ID NO:601) can be covalently linked to a solid support (e.g., CnBr- activated Sepharose 4B beads, Pharmacia, Piscataway N.J.), extracts passed over the support, the support washed, and the DNA-binding then isolated from the support with a salt gradient (Kadonaga). Alternatively, other expression systems in bacteria, yeast, insect cells or mammalian cells can be used to express adequate levels of a DNA-binding protein for use in this assay.  </base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>其他杂合蛋白可用于制备感兴趣的DNA结合蛋白。 例如，将DNA结合蛋白编码序列与编码凝血酶位点的序列框内融合，并且还与β-半乳糖苷编码序列框内融合。 这种杂合蛋白可以通过亲和或免疫亲和柱分离（Maniatis等；Pierce,Rockford III.）。 此外，DNA结合蛋白可以基于其与其同源DNA结合位点相互作用的能力通过亲和色谱分离。 例如，UL9 DNA结合位点（SEQ ID NO:601)可以与固体支持物（例如，CNBr活化的琼脂糖4B珠，Pharmacia，Piscataway N.J.）共价连接，提取物通过支持物，洗涤支持物，然后用盐梯度（Kadonaga）从支持物中分离DNA结合。 或者，细菌、酵母、昆虫细胞或哺乳动物细胞中的其他表达系统可用于表达足够水平的DNA结合蛋白以用于该测定。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To test the effect of flanking sequence variation on UL9 binding to the oriS SEQ ID NO:601 sequences oligonucleotides were constructed with 20-30 different sequences (i.e., the test sequences) flanking the 5' and 3' sides of the UL9 binding site. Further, oligonucleotides were constructed with point mutations at several positions within the UL9 binding site. Most point mutations within the binding site destroyed recognition. Several changes did not destroy recognition and these include variations at sites that differ between the UL9 binding sites (SEQ ID NO:601, SEQ ID NO:602, SEQ ID NO:615 and SEQ ID NO:641): the second UL9 binding site (SEQ ID NO:602) shows a ten-fold decrease in UL9:DNA binding affinity (Elias, et al.)  relative to the first (SEQ ID NO:601). On the other hand, sequence variation at the test site (also called the test sequence), adjacent to the screening site (FIG.  5, Example 5), had virtually no effect on binding or the rate of dissociation.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了测试侧翼序列变异对UL9与oriS SEQ ID NO:601序列结合的影响，构建了具有在UL9结合位点的5'和3'侧侧翼的20-30个不同序列（即测试序列）的寡核苷酸。 此外，在UL9结合位点内的几个位置处构建具有点突变的寡核苷酸。 结合位点内的大多数点突变破坏识别。 若干变化不破坏识别，并且这些变化包括在UL9结合位点（SEQ ID NO:601、SEQ ID NO:602、SEQ ID NO:615和SEQ ID NO:641)之间不同的位点处的变异：第二UL9结合位点（SEQ ID NO:602)相对于第一（SEQ ID NO:601)显示UL9:DNA结合亲和力降低十倍（Elias等人）。 另一方面，与筛选位点相邻的测试位点（也称为测试序列）处的序列变异（图5，实施例5）实际上对结合或解离速率没有影响。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Distamycin A binds relatively weakly to DNA (K.sub.A =2&times; 10. sup. 5 M.sup.-1) with a preference for non-alternating AT-rich sequences (Jain, et al.; Sobell; Sobell, et al.). Actinomycin D binds DNA more strongly (K.sub.A =7.6&times;10.sup.-7 M.sup.-1) than Distamycin A and has been reported to have a relatively strong preference for the dinucleotide sequence dGdC (Luck, et al.; Zimmer; Wartel). Each of these molecules poses a stringent test for the assay. Distamycin A tests the sensitivity of the assay because of its relatively weak binding.  Actinomycin D challenges the ability to utilize flanking sequences since the UL9 recognition sequence contains a dGdC dinucleotide: therefore, it might be anticipated that all of the oligonucleotides, regardless of the test sequence flanking the assay site, might be equally affected by actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>偏端霉素A与DNA的结合相对较弱(KA=2×105M-1)，优选非交替的富含AT的序列（Jain等；Sobell；Sobell等）。 放线菌素D比偏端霉素A更强地结合DNA(KA=7.6×10-7M-1)，并且据报道对二核苷酸序列dGdC具有相对强的偏好性（Luck等人；Zimmer；Wartel）。 这些分子中的每一种都为测定提出了严格的测试。 偏端霉素A由于其相对弱的结合而测试测定的灵敏度。 放线菌素D挑战利用侧翼序列的能力，因为UL9识别序列含有dGdC二核苷酸：因此，可以预期所有寡核苷酸（无论测定位点侧翼的测试序列如何）可能同样受到放线菌素D的影响。</base:Paragraphs>

Each of these molecules poses a stringent test for the assay. Distamycin A tests the sensitivity of the assay because of its relatively weak binding.  Actinomycin D challenges the ability to utilize flanking sequences since the UL9 recognition sequence contains a dGdC dinucleotide: therefore, it might be anticipated that all of the oligonucleotides, regardless of the test sequence flanking the assay site, might be equally affected by actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>偏端霉素A与DNA的结合相对较弱(KA=2×105M-1)，优选非交替的富含AT的序列（Jain等；Sobell；Sobell等）。 放线菌素D比偏端霉素A更强地结合DNA(KA=7.6×10-7M-1)，并且据报道对二核苷酸序列dGdC具有相对强的偏好性（Luck等人；Zimmer；Wartel）。 这些分子中的每一种都为测定提出了严格的测试。 偏端霉素A由于其相对弱的结合而测试测定的灵敏度。 放线菌素D挑战利用侧翼序列的能力，因为UL9识别序列含有dGdC二核苷酸：因此，可以预期所有寡核苷酸（无论测定位点侧翼的测试序列如何）可能同样受到放线菌素D的影响。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Distamycin A binds relatively weakly to DNA (K.sub.A =2&times; 10. sup. 5 M.sup.-1) with a preference for non-alternating AT-rich sequences (Jain, et al.; Sobell; Sobell, et al.). Actinomycin D binds DNA more strongly (K.sub.A =7.6&times;10.sup.-7 M.sup.-1) than Distamycin A and has been reported to have a relatively strong preference for the dinucleotide sequence dGdC (Luck, et al.; Zimmer; Wartel). Each of these molecules poses a stringent test for the assay. Distamycin A tests the sensitivity of the assay because of its relatively weak binding.  Actinomycin D challenges the ability to utilize flanking sequences since the UL9 recognition sequence contains a dGdC dinucleotide: therefore, it might be anticipated that all of the oligonucleotides, regardless of the test sequence flanking the assay site, might be equally affected by actinomycin D.</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In addition, Doxorubicin, a known anti-cancer agent that binds DNA in a sequence-preferential manner (Chen, K-X, et al.), has been tested for preferential DNA sequence binding using the assay of the present invention.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>此外，阿霉素，一种以序列优先方式结合DNA的已知抗癌剂（Chen,K-X等人），已经使用本发明的测定法测试了优先DNA序列结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A second category of DNA-binding molecules includes intercalating DNA- binding molecules. Intercalating agents are an entirely different class of DNA-binding molecules that have been identified as antitunor therapeutics and include molecules such as daunomycin (Chaires, et al.)  and nogalomycin (Fox, et al., 1988) (see Remers, 1984).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>第二类DNA结合分子包括嵌入DNA结合分子。 嵌入剂是完全不同类别的DNA结合分子，其已被鉴定为抗肿瘤治疗剂，并且包括诸如道诺霉素（Chaires等人）和诺加霉素（Fox等人，1988)（参见Remers，1984)的分子。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A second category of DNA-binding molecules includes intercalating DNA- binding molecules. Intercalating agents are an entirely different class of DNA-binding molecules that have been identified as antitunor therapeutics and include molecules such as daunomycin (Chaires, et al.)  and nogalomycin (Fox, et al., 1988) (see Remers, 1984).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>第二类DNA结合分子包括嵌入DNA结合分子。 嵌入剂是完全不同类别的DNA结合分子，其已被鉴定为抗肿瘤治疗剂，并且包括诸如道诺霉素（Chaires等人）和诺加霉素（Fox等人，1988)（参见Remers，1984)的分子。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A third category of DNA-binding molecules includes molecules that have both groove-binding and intercalating properties. DNA-binding molecules that have both intercalating and minor groove binding properties include actinomycin D (Goodisman, et al.), echinomycin (Fox, et al. 1990), triostin A (Wang, et al.), and luzopeptin (Fox, 1988). In general, these molecules have one or two planar polycyclic moieties and one or two cyclic oligopeptides. Luzopeptins, for instance, contain two substituted quinoline chromophores linked by a cyclic decadepsipeptide.  They are closely related to the quinoxaline family, which includes echinomycin and triostin A, although they luzopeptins have ten amino acids in the cyclic peptide, while the quinoxaline family members have eight amino acids.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>第三类DNA结合分子包括具有沟槽结合和嵌入性质的分子。 同时具有嵌入和小沟结合性质的DNA结合分子包括放线菌素D（Goodisman等人）、棘霉素（Fox等人1990)、曲菌素A（Wang等人）和卢佐普汀（Fox,1988）。 通常，这些分子具有一个或两个平面多环部分和一个或两个环状寡肽。 例如，鲁佐肽含有通过环状十缩肽连接的两个取代的喹啉发色团。 它们与喹喔啉家族密切相关，喹喔啉家族包括棘霉素和曲司亭A，尽管它们的luzopeptins在环肽中具有10个氨基酸，而喹喔啉家族成员具有8个氨基酸。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In addition to the major classes of DNA-binding molecules, there are also some small inorganic molecules, such as cobalt hexamine, which is known to induce Z-DNA formation in regions that contain repetitive GC sequences (Gessner, et al.). Another example is cisplatin, cis- diamminedichloroplatinum(II), which is a widely used anticancer therapeutic.  Cisplatin forms a covalent intrastrand crosslink between the N7 atoms of adjacent guanosines (Rice, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>除了主要类别的DNA结合分子之外，还存在一些小的无机分子，例如六胺钴，已知其在含有重复GC序列的区域中诱导Z-DNA形成（Gessner等人）。 另一个实例是顺铂，顺-二氨二氯铂(II)，其是广泛使用的抗癌治疗剂。 顺铂在相邻鸟苷的N7原子之间形成共价链内交联（Rice等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In addition to the major classes of DNA-binding molecules, there are also some small inorganic molecules, such as cobalt hexamine, which is known to induce Z-DNA formation in regions that contain repetitive GC sequences (Gessner, et al.). Another example is cisplatin, cis- diamminedichloroplatinum(II), which is a widely used anticancer therapeutic.  Cisplatin forms a covalent intrastrand crosslink between the N7 atoms of adjacent guanosines (Rice, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>除了主要类别的DNA结合分子之外，还存在一些小的无机分子，例如六胺钴，已知其在含有重复GC序列的区域中诱导Z-DNA形成（Gessner等人）。 另一个实例是顺铂，顺-二氨二氯铂(II)，其是广泛使用的抗癌治疗剂。 顺铂在相邻鸟苷的N7原子之间形成共价链内交联（Rice等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Furthermore, there are a few molecules, such as calichemicin, that have unusual biochemical structures that do not fall in any of the major categories.  Calichemicin is an antitumor antibiotic that cleaves DNA and is thought to recognize DNA sequences through carbohydrate moieties (Hawley, et al.). Several DNA-binding molecules, such as daunomycin, A447C, and cosmomycin B have sugar group, which may play a role in the recognition process.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>此外，有一些分子，例如加利车霉素，具有不属于任何主要类别的不寻常的生物化学结构。 加利半霉素是切割DNA的抗肿瘤抗生素，并且被认为通过碳水化合物部分识别DNA序列（Hawley等人）。 几种DNA结合分子，如道诺霉素、A447C和宇宙霉素B具有糖基，其可能在识别过程中起作用。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Limited sequence preferences for some of the above drugs have been suggested: for example, echinomycin is thought to preferentially bind to the sequence (A/T)CGT (Fox, et al.). However, the absolute sequence preferences of the known DNA-binding drugs have never been demonstrated. Despite the large number of publications in this field, prior to the development of the assay described herein, no methods were available for determining sequence preferences among all possible binding sequences.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经提出了一些上述药物的有限序列偏好：例如，认为棘霉素优先结合序列（A/T）CGT（Fox等人）。 然而，从未证明已知的DNA结合药物的绝对序列偏好。 尽管在该领域中有大量出版物，但在开发本文所述的测定之前，没有方法可用于确定所有可能的结合序列中的序列偏好。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above-described assay can be coupled to amplification methods (in one embodiment, polymerase chain reaction (Mullis, et al.; Mullis; Innis, et al.)) to achieve identification of the sequences to which binding of a test molecule is most preferred.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>上述测定可以与扩增方法（在一个实施方案中，聚合酶链式反应（Mullis等人；Mullis；Innis等人））结合，以实现最优选与测试分子结合的序列的鉴定。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above-described assay can be coupled to amplification methods (in one embodiment, polymerase chain reaction (Mullis, et al.; Mullis; Innis, et al.)) to achieve identification of the sequences to which binding of a test molecule is most preferred.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>上述测定可以与扩增方法（在一个实施方案中，聚合酶链式反应（Mullis等人；Mullis；Innis等人））结合，以实现最优选与测试分子结合的序列的鉴定。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In one embodiment, the DNA present in the filtrate is amplified using the polymerase chain reaction (PCR) technology (Mullis; Mullis, et al.; Perkin Elmer-Cetus). An aliquot of the resulting PCR-amplified material is cycled through the DNA:protein binding assay again (step 2), then PCR- amplified again (step 3). Steps 1-3 are repeated several times using each subsequent filtrate.  After each PCR amplification, part of the PCR- amplified material is retained for sequencing analysis. The result of the repeated cyclings through the assay/amplification process is that the test oligonucleotide sequences that are amplified contain test sequences that are preferred binding sites for the test molecules.  Through subsequent rounds of assay/amplification, these oligonucleotides are amplified to represent a larger and larger percent of the total population of amplified DNA molecules.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在一个实施方案中，使用聚合酶链反应(PCR)技术（Mullis；Mullis等；Perkin Elmer-Cetus）扩增滤液中存在的DNA。 将所得PCR扩增材料的等分试样再次循环通过DNA：蛋白质结合测定（步骤2)，然后再次PCR扩增（步骤3）。 使用每个后续滤液重复步骤1-3若干次。 在每次PCR扩增后，保留PCR扩增的材料的一部分用于测序分析。 通过测定/扩增过程重复循环的结果是扩增的测试寡核苷酸序列含有作为测试分子的优选结合位点的测试序列。 通过后续轮次的测定/扩增，这些寡核苷酸被扩增以代表扩增的DNA分子的总群体的越来越大的百分比。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In addition to PCR, the DNA present in the filtrate can be amplified by other methods as well. For example, the DNA present in the filtrate can be cloned into a selected vector (such as, phage vectors, e. g., lambda-based, or standard cloning vectors, e.g., pBR322- or pUC- based). The cloned sequences are then transformed into an appropriate host organism in which the selected vector can replicate (for example, bacteria or yeast). The transformed host organism is cultured with concurrent amplification of the vectors containing the cloned sequences.  The vectors are then isolated by standard procedures (Maniatis, et al.; Sambrook, et al.; Ausubel, et al.). Typically, the cloned sequences, originally obtained from the DNA filtrate, are obtained from the vector by restriction endonuclease digestion and size-fractionation (for example, electrophoretic separation of the digestion products followed by electroelution of the cloned sequences of interest) (Ausubel, et al.).  These isolated amplified test oligonucleotide sequences can then be recycled through subsequent rounds of assay/amplification as described above.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>除了PCR之外，滤液中存在的DNA也可以通过其他方法扩增。 例如，可以将滤液中存在的DNA克隆到所选载体（例如噬菌体载体，例如基于λ的载体，或标准克隆载体，例如基于pBR322或pUC的载体）中。 然后将克隆的序列转化到合适的宿主生物体（例如，细菌或酵母）中，所选择的载体可以在所述宿主生物体中复制。 培养转化的宿主生物体，同时扩增含有克隆序列的载体。 然后通过标准方法（Maniatis等；Sambrook等；Ausubel等）分离载体。 通常，最初从DNA滤液获得的克隆序列是通过限制性内切酶消化和大小分级（例如，消化产物的电泳分离，然后电洗脱克隆的目的序列）从载体获得的（Ausubel等人）。 这些分离的扩增的测试寡核苷酸序列然后可以通过如上所述的后续轮次的测定/扩增再循环。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>除了PCR之外，滤液中存在的DNA也可以通过其他方法扩增。 例如，可以将滤液中存在的DNA克隆到所选载体（例如噬菌体载体，例如基于λ的载体，或标准克隆载体，例如基于pBR322或pUC的载体）中。 然后将克隆的序列转化到合适的宿主生物体（例如，细菌或酵母）中，所选择的载体可以在所述宿主生物体中复制。 培养转化的宿主生物体，同时扩增含有克隆序列的载体。 然后通过标准方法（Maniatis等；Sambrook等；Ausubel等）分离载体。 通常，最初从DNA滤液获得的克隆序列是通过限制性内切酶消化和大小分级（例如，消化产物的电泳分离，然后电洗脱克隆的目的序列）从载体获得的（Ausubel等人）。 这些分离的扩增的测试寡核苷酸序列然后可以通过如上所述的后续轮次的测定/扩增再循环。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One capture system that has been developed in the course of experiments performed in support of the present invention utilizes a streptavidin/biotin interaction for the rapid capture of unbound DNA from the protein-rich mixture, which includes unbound DNA, DNA:protein complexes, excess protein and the test molecules or test mixtures.  Streptavidin binds with extremely high affinity to biotin (K.sub.d =10.  sup.-5 M) (Chaiet, et al.; Green). Accordingly, two advantages of the streptavidin/biotin system are that binding between the two molecules can be rapid and the interaction is the strongest known non-covalent interaction.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在支持本发明的实验过程中开发的一种捕获系统利用链霉亲和素/生物素相互作用从富含蛋白质的混合物中快速捕获未结合的DNA，所述富含蛋白质的混合物包括未结合的DNA、DNA:蛋白质复合物、过量蛋白质和测试分子或测试混合物。 链霉抗生物素蛋白以极高亲和力结合生物素(KD=10-5M)(Chaiet等人；Green）。 因此，链霉亲和素/生物素系统的两个优点是两个分子之间的结合可以是快速的，并且相互作用是最强的已知非共价相互作用。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The recognition sequence for the binding of the UL9 (Koff, et al. ) protein is underlined in FIG. 4. Oligonucleotides were synthesized that contain the UL9 binding site and site-specifically biotinylated a number of locations throughout the binding sequence (SEQ ID NO:614; Example 1, FIG. 4). These biotinylated ted oligonucleotides were then used in band shift assays to determine the ability of the UL9 protein to bind to the oligonucleotide. These experiments using the biotinylated probe and a non- biotinylated probe as a control demonstrate that the presence of a biotin at the #8-T (biotinylated deoxyuridine) position of the bottom strand meets the requirements listed above: the presence of a biotin moiety at the #8 position of the bottom strand does not markedly affect the specificity of UL9 for the recognition site.  Further, in the presence of bound UL9, streptavidin does not recognize the presence of the biotin moiety in the oligonucleotide. Biotinylation at other A or T positions did not have the two necessary characteristics (i.e., UL9 binding and protection from streptavidin): biotinylation at the adenosine in position #8, of the top strand, prevented the binding of UL9; biotinylation of either adenosines or thymidines (top or bottom strand) at positions #3, #4, #10, or #11 all allowed binding of UL9, but in each case, streptavidin also was able to recognize the presence of the biotin moiety and thereby bind the oligonucleotide in the presence of UL9.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>UL9(Koff等人）蛋白结合的识别序列在图4中加下划线。 合成寡核苷酸，其含有UL9结合位点并且在整个结合序列的许多位置处位点特异性生物素化（SEQ ID NO:614；实施例1，图4）。 然后将这些生物素化的ted寡核苷酸用于条带移位测定中以确定UL9蛋白与寡核苷酸结合的能力。 使用生物素化探针和非生物素化探针作为对照的这些实验证明，在下链的#8-T（生物素化脱氧尿苷）位置处存在生物素满足上文列出的要求：在下链的#8位置处存在生物素部分不会显著影响UL9对识别位点的特异性。 此外，在结合的UL9存在下，链霉亲和素不识别寡核苷酸中生物素部分的存在。 在其他A或T位置的生物素化不具有两个必需的特征（即UL9结合和保护免受链霉亲和素）：在顶部链的位置#8的腺苷处的生物素化阻止UL9的结合； 在#3、#4、#10或#11位腺苷或胸苷（上链或下链）的生物素化均允许UL9结合，但在每种情况下，链霉亲和素也能够识别生物素部分的存在，从而在UL9存在下结合寡核苷酸。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The above result (the ability of UL9 to bind to an oligonucleotide containing a biotin within the recognition sequence and to protect the biotin from streptavidin) was unexpected in that methylation interference data (Koff, et al.)  suggest that methylation of the deoxyguanosine residues at positions #7 and #9 of the recognition sequence (on either side of the biotinylated deoxyuridine) blocks UL9 binding. In these methylation interference experiments, guanosines are methylated by dimethyl sulfate at the N.sup.7 position, which corresponds structurally to the 5-position of the pyrimidine ring at which the deoxyuridine is biotinylated. These moieties all protrude into the major groove of the DNA. The methylation interference data suggest that the #7 and #9 position deoxyguanosines are contact points for UL9, it was therefore unexpected that the presence of a biotin moiety between them would not interfere with binding.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>上述结果(UL9与在识别序列内含有生物素的寡核苷酸结合并保护生物素免受链霉亲和素影响的能力）是出乎意料的，因为甲基化干扰数据（Koff等人）表明识别序列的#7和#9位（生物素化的脱氧尿苷的任一侧）的脱氧鸟苷残基的甲基化阻断UL9结合。 在这些甲基化干扰实验中，鸟苷在N.sup.7位置被硫酸二甲酯甲基化，N.sup.7位置在结构上对应于脱氧尿苷生物素化的嘧啶环的5位。 这些部分都突出到DNA的大沟中。 甲基化干扰数据表明#7和#9位脱氧鸟苷是UL9的接触点，因此出乎意料的是它们之间存在生物素部分不会干扰结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Alternatively, avidin-coated agarose beads can be used.  Biotinylated agarose beads (immobilized D-biotin, Pierce) are bound to avidin. Avidin, like streptavidin, has four binding sites for biotin. One of these binding sites is used to bind the avidin to the biotin that is coupled to the agarose beads via a 16 atom spacer arm: the other biotin binding sites remain available. The beads are mixed with binding mixtures to capture biotinylated DNA (Example 7).  Alternative methods (Harlow, et al.)  to the bead capture methods just described include the following streptavidinated or avidinated supports: low-protein binding filters, or 96-well plates.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>或者，可以使用亲和素包被的琼脂糖珠。 生物素化琼脂糖珠（固定化D-生物素，Pierce)与抗生物素蛋白结合。 抗生物素蛋白与链霉抗生物素蛋白一样，具有四个生物素结合位点。 这些结合位点中的一个用于将抗生物素蛋白与生物素结合，所述生物素通过16个原子的间隔臂与琼脂糖珠偶联：其他生物素结合位点仍然可用。 将珠粒与结合混合物混合以捕获生物素化的DNA（实施例7）。 刚才描述的珠捕获方法的替代方法（Harlow等人）包括以下链霉亲和素化或抗生物素蛋白化支持物：低蛋白结合过滤器或96孔板。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Alkaline phosphatase is coupled to the captured DNA without interfering with the capture system. To do this several methods, derived from commonly used ELISA (Harlow, et al.; Pierce, Rockford Ill.)  techniques, can be employed. For example, an antigenic moiety is incorporated into the DNA at sites that will not interfere with (i) the DNA:protein interaction, (ii) the DNA:drug interaction, or (iii) the capture system. In the UL9 DNA:protein/biotin system the DNA has been end- labelled with digoxigenin-11-dUTP (dig-dUTP) and terminal transferase (Example 1, FIG. 4). After the DNA was captured and removed from the DNA:protein mixture, an anti-digoxigenin-alkaline phosphatase conjugated antibody was then reacted (Boehringer Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.)  with the digoxigenin-containing oligonucleotide. The antigenic digoxigenin moiety was recognized by the antibody-enzyme conjugate. The presence of dig-dUTP altered neither the ability of UL9-COOH protein to bind the oriS (SEQ ID NO:601)-containing DNA nor the ability of streptavidin to bind the incorporated biotin.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>碱性磷酸酶与捕获的DNA偶联而不干扰捕获系统。 为此，可以采用衍生自常用ELISA（Harlow等；Pierce,Rockford III.）技术的几种方法。 例如，将抗原部分在不干扰(i)DNA：蛋白质相互作用、(ii)DNA:药物相互作用或(iii)捕获系统的位点处掺入DNA中。 在UL9 DNA：蛋白质/生物素系统中，DNA已经用洋地黄毒苷-11-dUTP(dig-dUTP）和末端转移酶进行末端标记（实施例1，图4）。 在从DNA：蛋白质混合物中捕获并除去DNA后，然后使抗地高辛-碱性磷酸酶缀合的抗体（Boehringer Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）与含地高辛的寡核苷酸反应。 抗原性地高辛部分被抗体-酶缀合物识别。 dig-dUTP的存在既不改变UL9-COOH蛋白结合含有oriS（SEQ ID NO:601)的DNA的能力，也不改变链霉亲和素结合掺入的生物素的能力。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>An example situation is HNF-1 binding to Hepatitis B virus (HBV) : HNF- 1 binds an HBV enhancer sequence and stimulates transcription of HBV genes (Chang, et al.). In a normal cell HNF-1 is a nuclear protein that appears to be important for the regulation of many genes, particularly liver-specific genes (Courtois, et al.). If molecules were isolated that specifically bound to the DNA-binding domain of HNF-1, all of the genes regulated by HNF-1 would be down-regulated, including both viral and cellular genes. Such a drug could be lethal since many of the genes regulated by HNF-1 may be necessary for liver function. However, the assay of the present invention presents the ability to screen for a molecule that could distinguish the HNF-1 binding region of the Hepatitis B virus DNA from cellular HNF-1 sites by, for example, including divergent flanking sequences when screening for the molecule. Such a molecule would specifically block HBV expression without effecting cellular gene expression.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>示例性情况是HNF-1与乙型肝炎病毒(HBV)结合:HNF-1结合HBV增强子序列并刺激HBV基因的转录（Chang等人）。 在正常细胞中，HNF-1是一种核蛋白，其似乎对于许多基因，特别是肝脏特异性基因的调节是重要的（Courtois等人）。 如果分离出与HNF-1的DNA结合结构域特异性结合的分子，则由HNF-1调节的所有基因将被下调，包括病毒和细胞基因。 这种药物可能是致命的，因为许多受HNF-1调节的基因可能是肝功能所必需的。 然而，本发明的测定提供了筛选这样的分子的能力，所述分子可以通过例如在筛选分子时包括不同的侧翼序列来将乙型肝炎病毒DNA的HNF-1结合区与细胞HNF-1位点区分开。 这样的分子将特异性阻断HBV表达而不影响细胞基因表达。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The assay of the present invention is also useful for screening molecules that are currently described in the literature as DNA-binding molecules but with uncertain DNA-binding sequence specificity (i.e., having either no well-defined preference for binding to specific DNA sequences or having certain higher affinity binding sites but without defining the relative preference for all possible DNA binding sequences).  The assay can be used to determine the specific binding sites for DNA- binding molecules, among all possible choices of sequence that bind with high, low, or moderate affinity to the DNA-binding molecule. Actinomycin D, Distamycin A, and Doxorubicin (Example 6) all provide examples of molecules with these modes of binding. Many anti-cancer drugs, such as Doxorubicin (see Example 6), show binding preference for certain identified DNA sequences, although the absolute highest and lowest specificity sequences have yet to be determined, because, until the invention described herein, methods (Salas and Portugal; Cullinane and Phillips; Phillips; and Phillips, et al.)  for detecting differential affinity DNA-binding sites for any drug were limited. Doxorubicin is one of the most widely used anti-cancer drugs currently available. As shown in Example 6, Doxorubicin is known to bind some sequences preferentially.  Another example of such sequence binding preference is Daunorubicin (Chen, et al.)  which differs slightly in structure from Doxorubicin (Goodman, et al.). Both Daunorubicin and Doxorubicin are members of the anthracycline antibiotic family: antibiotics in this family, and their derivatives, are among the most important newer antitumor agents (Goodman, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的测定法还可用于筛选目前在文献中描述为DNA结合分子但具有不确定的DNA结合序列特异性（即，对结合特定DNA序列没有明确定义的偏好或具有某些更高亲和力的结合位点但没有定义对所有可能的DNA结合序列的相对偏好）的分子。 在以高、低或中等亲和力结合DNA结合分子的序列的所有可能选择中，该测定可用于确定DNA结合分子的特异性结合位点。 放线菌素D、偏端霉素A和多柔比星（实施例6）都提供了具有这些结合模式的分子的实例。 许多抗癌药物如多柔比星（见实施例6）显示出对某些鉴定的DNA序列的结合偏好，尽管绝对最高和最低特异性序列尚未确定，因为在本文描述的本发明之前，用于检测任何药物的差异亲和力DNA结合位点的方法（Salas和Portugal；Cullinane和Phillips；Phillips；和Phillips等）是有限的。 多柔比星是目前可用的最广泛使用的抗癌药物之一。 如实施例6中所示，已知多柔比星优先结合一些序列。 这种序列结合偏好的另一个实例是柔红霉素（Chen等人），其在结构上与多柔比星（Goodman等人）略有不同。 柔红霉素和多柔比星都是蒽环类抗生素家族的成员：该家族中的抗生素及其衍生物是最重要的更新的抗肿瘤剂（Goodman等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

The assay can be used to determine the specific binding sites for DNA- binding molecules, among all possible choices of sequence that bind with high, low, or moderate affinity to the DNA-binding molecule. Actinomycin D, Distamycin A, and Doxorubicin (Example 6) all provide examples of molecules with these modes of binding. Many anti-cancer drugs, such as Doxorubicin (see Example 6), show binding preference for certain identified DNA sequences, although the absolute highest and lowest specificity sequences have yet to be determined, because, until the invention described herein, methods (Salas and Portugal; Cullinane and Phillips; Phillips; and Phillips, et al.)  for detecting differential affinity DNA-binding sites for any drug were limited. Doxorubicin is one of the most widely used anti-cancer drugs currently available. As shown in Example 6, Doxorubicin is known to bind some sequences preferentially.  Another example of such sequence binding preference is Daunorubicin (Chen, et al.)  which differs slightly in structure from Doxorubicin (Goodman, et al.). Both Daunorubicin and Doxorubicin are members of the anthracycline antibiotic family: antibiotics in this family, and their derivatives, are among the most important newer antitumor agents (Goodman, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>本发明的测定法还可用于筛选目前在文献中描述为DNA结合分子但具有不确定的DNA结合序列特异性（即，对结合特定DNA序列没有明确定义的偏好或具有某些更高亲和力的结合位点但没有定义对所有可能的DNA结合序列的相对偏好）的分子。 在以高、低或中等亲和力结合DNA结合分子的序列的所有可能选择中，该测定可用于确定DNA结合分子的特异性结合位点。 放线菌素D、偏端霉素A和多柔比星（实施例6）都提供了具有这些结合模式的分子的实例。 许多抗癌药物如多柔比星（见实施例6）显示出对某些鉴定的DNA序列的结合偏好，尽管绝对最高和最低特异性序列尚未确定，因为在本文描述的本发明之前，用于检测任何药物的差异亲和力DNA结合位点的方法（Salas和Portugal；Cullinane和Phillips；Phillips；和Phillips等）是有限的。 多柔比星是目前可用的最广泛使用的抗癌药物之一。 如实施例6中所示，已知多柔比星优先结合一些序列。 这种序列结合偏好的另一个实例是柔红霉素（Chen等人），其在结构上与多柔比星（Goodman等人）略有不同。 柔红霉素和多柔比星都是蒽环类抗生素家族的成员：该家族中的抗生素及其衍生物是最重要的更新的抗肿瘤剂（Goodman等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>For example, origin of replication binding proteins have short, well- defined binding sites within the viral genome and are therefore excellent target sites for a competitive DNA-binding drug. Examples of such proteins include, Epstein Barr virus nuclear antigen 1 (EBNA-1) (Ambinder, et al.; Reisman, et al.), E2 (which is encoded by the human papilloma virus) (Chin, et al.), UL9 (which is encoded by herpes simplex virus type 1) (McGeoch, et al.), and the homologous protein in varicella zoster virus (VZV) (Stow, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>例如，复制起点结合蛋白在病毒基因组内具有短的、明确定义的结合位点，因此是竞争性DNA结合药物的优异靶位点。 此类蛋白质的实例包括EB病毒核抗原1(EBNA-1)(Ambinder等人；Reisman等人）、E2（其由人乳头瘤病毒编码）（Chin等人）、UL9（其由1型单纯疱疹病毒编码）（McGeoch等人）和水痘带状疱疹病毒(VZV)中的同源蛋白质（Stow等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Examples of non-viral DNA targets for DNA-binding drugs are also shown in Table IV to illustrate the wide range of potential applications for sequence-specific DNA-binding molecules. For example, nuclear factor of activated T cells (NFAT-1) is a regulatory factor that is crucial to the inducible expression of the interleukin 2 gene in response to signals from the antigen receptor, which, in turn, is required for the cascade of molecular events during T cell activation (for review, see Edwards, C. A., and Crabtree, G. R.). The mechanism of action of two immunosuppressants, cyclosporin A and FK506, is thought to be to block the inducible expression of NFAT-1 (Schmidt, et al. and Banerji, et al.). However, the effects of these drugs are not specific to NFAT-1; therefore, a drug targeted specifically to the NFAT-1 binding site in the IL-2 enhancer would be desirable as an improved immunosuppressant.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>DNA结合药物的非病毒DNA靶标的实例也显示在表IV中，以说明序列特异性DNA结合分子的广泛潜在应用。 例如，活化T细胞的核因子(NFAT-1)是一种调节因子，其对于白介素2基因响应于来自抗原受体的信号的诱导型表达至关重要，而来自抗原受体的信号又是T细胞活化期间分子事件级联所需的（综述参见Edwards，C.A.和Crabtree，G.R.)。 两种免疫抑制剂环孢菌素A和FK506的作用机制被认为是阻断NFAT-1的诱导型表达（Schmidt等人和Banerji等人）。 然而，这些药物的作用不是NFAT-1特异性的； 因此，期望特异性靶向IL-2增强子中的NFAT-1结合位点的药物作为改进的免疫抑制剂。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>All three polymerases use a core set of general transcription proteins to bind to this region. A central component of this complex is the protein called TBP or TFIID. The site this protein binds to is known as the TATA-box because the sequence usually contains a sequence motif similar to TATA (e.g., TATAa/tAa/t). Originally it was thought that each of the three polymerases used a separate set of general transcription factors and that Pol II used TFIID exclusively. Recently it has been shown that all three classes of RNA polymerase need TFIID for transcriptional regulation (see Comai, et al.; and Greenblatt)</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>所有三种聚合酶都使用通用转录蛋白的核心组来结合该区域。 该复合物的中心组分是称为TBP或TFIID的蛋白质。 该蛋白质结合的位点被称为TATA盒，因为该序列通常含有类似于TATA的序列基序（例如，TATAa/tAa/t)。 最初认为三种聚合酶中的每一种使用单独的一组通用转录因子，并且Pol II仅使用TFIID。 最近已经表明，所有三类RNA聚合酶都需要TFIID来进行转录调节（参见Comai等人</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>TATA-boxes were first identified by determining the sequence of the DNA located 5' of the RNA start sites of a number of genes.  Examination of these sequences revealed that most genes had a TATA-box motif (consensus sequence) in the range of nucleotides 50 to 15 nucleotides 5' of the RNA start site. In vitro studies, typically DNA protection (footprinting) studies, lead to the conclusion that proteins were binding to these sites. Further in vitro DNA binding experiments demonstrated that some proteins could specifically bind to these sites.  This lead to assays that allowed purification and subsequent sequencing of the binding proteins. This information facilitated the cloning and expression of genes encoding the binding proteins. A large number of transcription factors are now known. The protein designated TFIID has been demonstrated to bind to the TATA-box (Lee, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>首先通过确定位于许多基因的RNA起始位点的5'的DNA序列来鉴定TATA盒。 对这些序列的检查揭示，大多数基因在RNA起始位点5'的核苷酸50至15个核苷酸范围内具有TATA盒基序（共有序列）。 体外研究，通常是DNA保护（足迹法）研究，得出蛋白质与这些位点结合的结论。 进一步的体外DNA结合实验证明，一些蛋白质可以特异性结合这些位点。 这导致允许结合蛋白的纯化和随后测序的测定。 该信息促进了编码结合蛋白的基因的克隆和表达。 现在已知大量转录因子。 已经证明命名为TFIID的蛋白质与TATA盒结合（Lee等人）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Many examples of such general transcription factors have been identified, including, but not limited to, the following: SP1 (Raney, et al., 1992; Kitadai, et al., 1992); NFAT-1 (Shaw, et al., 1988); Ets family of transcription factors, including Elf1 (Thompson, et al., 1992); Fos protein (Neuberg, et al., 1991); NF-kappa (Wirth, et al., 1988; Meijer, et al., 1992); and AP1-like proteins, including the product of the c-jun oncogene (Descheemaeker, et al., 1992; Ryder et al., 1988; Harshman et al., 1988; Angel et al., 1988; Bos et al., 1988; Bohmann et al., 1987).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经鉴定了这些通用转录因子的许多实例，包括但不限于以下：SP1（Raney等，1992；Kitadai等，1992）； NFAT-1（Shaw等，1988）； 转录因子的Ets家族，包括Elf1(Thompson等人，1992)； Fos蛋白（Neuberg等，1991）； NF-kappa（Wirth等，1988；Meijer等，1992）； 和AP1样蛋白，包括c-jun癌基因的产物（Descheemaeker等，1992；Ryder等，1988；Harshman等，1988；Angel等，1988；Bos等，1988；Bohmann等，1987）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Any particular DNA-binding small molecule screened in the assay may only recognize a 2-4 base pair site, and even if the recognition is quite specific, the molecule may be toxic because there are so many target sites in the genome (3&times;10.sup.9 /4.sup.4 4 bp sites, for example). However, if drugs with differential affinity for different sites are identified, the toxicity of DNA-binding drugs may be drastically reduced by creating dimers, trimers, or multimers with these drugs (Example 13). From theoretical considerations of the free energy changes accompanying the binding of drugs to DNA, the intrinsic binding constant of a dimer should be the square of the binding constant of the monomer (Le Pecq, J. B.). Experimental data confirmed this expectation in 1978 with dimer analogs of ethidium bromide (Kuhlmann, et al.).  Dimerization of several intercalating molecules, in fact, yields compounds with DNA affinities raised from 10.sup.5 M.sup.-1 for the corresponding monomer to 10.sup.8 to 10.sup.9 M.sup.-1 for the dimers (Skorobogaty, et al.; Gaugain, et al. (1978a and b); Le Pecq, et al.; Pelaprat, et al.). Trimerization, which theoretically should yield binding affinities that are the cube of the affinity of the homomonomeric subunit or the product of affinities of the heteromonomeric subunits, has yielded compounds with affinities as high as 10.sup.12 M.sup.-1 (Laugaa, et al.). Such affinity is markedly better than the affinities seen for many DNA regulatory proteins.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在测定中筛选的任何特定DNA结合小分子可能仅识别2-4个碱基对位点，并且即使识别是相当特异性的，该分子也可能是有毒的，因为在基因组中存在如此多的靶位点（例如3倍于10.9/4.4个4bp位点）。 然而，如果鉴定出对不同位点具有不同亲和力的药物，则通过用这些药物产生二聚体、三聚体或多聚体，可以显著降低DNA结合药物的毒性（实施例13）。 从伴随药物与DNA结合的自由能变化的理论考虑，二聚体的固有结合常数应该是单体结合常数的平方（Le Pecq,J.B.）。 实验数据在1978年用溴化乙锭的二聚体类似物证实了这种预期（Kuhlmann等人）。 事实上，几种嵌入分子的二聚化产生的化合物的DNA亲和力从相应单体的10.sup.sup.-1提高到二聚体的10.sup.sup.-1～10.sup.-1(Skorobogaty等人；Gaugain等人(1978a和b）；Le Pecq等人；Pelaprat等人）。 理论上应产生同单体亚基的亲和力的立方或异单体亚基的亲和力的乘积的结合亲和力的三聚化已产生亲和力高达10.12M-1的化合物（Laugaa等人）。 这种亲和力明显优于对许多DNA调节蛋白所见的亲和力。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在测定中筛选的任何特定DNA结合小分子可能仅识别2-4个碱基对位点，并且即使识别是相当特异性的，该分子也可能是有毒的，因为在基因组中存在如此多的靶位点（例如3倍于10.9/4.4个4bp位点）。 然而，如果鉴定出对不同位点具有不同亲和力的药物，则通过用这些药物产生二聚体、三聚体或多聚体，可以显著降低DNA结合药物的毒性（实施例13）。 从伴随药物与DNA结合的自由能变化的理论考虑，二聚体的固有结合常数应该是单体结合常数的平方（Le Pecq,J.B.）。 实验数据在1978年用溴化乙锭的二聚体类似物证实了这种预期（Kuhlmann等人）。 事实上，几种嵌入分子的二聚化产生的化合物的DNA亲和力从相应单体的10.sup.sup.-1提高到二聚体的10.sup.sup.-1～10.sup.-1(Skorobogaty等人；Gaugain等人(1978a和b）；Le Pecq等人；Pelaprat等人）。 理论上应产生同单体亚基的亲和力的立方或异单体亚基的亲和力的乘积的结合亲和力的三聚化已产生亲和力高达10.12M-1的化合物（Laugaa等人）。 这种亲和力明显优于对许多DNA调节蛋白所见的亲和力。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Several types of nucleic acid base-containing polymers have been described that will form complexes with nucleic acids (for reviews, see Helene, C. and Toulme, J.-J.). One type of such a polymer forms a triple- stranded complex by the insertion of a third strand into the major groove of the DNA helix. Several types of base-recognition specific interactions of third strand oligonucleotide-type polymers have been observed. One type of specificity is due to Hoogsteen bonding (Hoogsteen).  This specificity arises from recognition between pyrimidine oligonucleotides and double-stranded DNA by pairing thymine and adenine:thymine base pairs and protonated cytosine and guanine:cytosine base pairs (Griffin, et al.). Another type of specific interaction involves the use of purine oligonucleotides for triplex formation. In these triplexes, adenine pairs with adenine:thymine base pairs and guanine with guanine:cytosine (Cooney, et al.; Beal and Dervan) or thymine:adenine base paris (Griffen, L., and Dervan, P. B.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经描述了几种类型的含核酸碱基的聚合物，其将与核酸形成复合物（综述参见Helene,C.和Toulme,J.-J.）。 一种类型的这种聚合物通过将第三链插入DNA螺旋的大沟中而形成三链复合物。 已经观察到第三链寡核苷酸型聚合物的几种类型的碱基识别特异性相互作用。 一种类型的特异性是由于Hoogsteen键合（Hoogsteen）。 这种特异性源于嘧啶寡核苷酸和双链DNA之间通过配对胸腺嘧啶和腺嘌呤：胸腺嘧啶碱基对以及质子化胞嘧啶和鸟嘌呤：胞嘧啶碱基对的识别（Griffin等人）。 另一种类型的特异性相互作用涉及使用嘌呤寡核苷酸形成三链体。 在这些三链体中，腺嘌呤与腺嘌呤：胸腺嘧啶碱基对配对，鸟嘌呤与鸟嘌呤：胞嘧啶配对（Cooney等，Beal和Dervan）或胸腺嘧啶：腺嘌呤碱基配对（Griffen，L.和Dervan，P.B.)。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Other motifs for triplex formation have been described, including the incorporation of nucleic acid analogs (eg, methylphosphonates, phosphorothioates; Miller, et al.), and the invention of backbones other than the phosphoribose backbones normally found in nucleic acids (Pitha, et al.; Summerton, et al.). In several cases, the formation of triplex has been demonstrated to inhibit the binding of a DNA-binding protein (e. g., Young, et al.; Maher, et al.)  or the expression of a cellular protein (Cooney, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>已经描述了用于三链体形成的其他基序，包括掺入核酸类似物（例如，甲基膦酸酯、硫代磷酸酯，Miller等人），以及除了通常在核酸中发现的磷酸核糖主链之外的主链的发明（Pitha等人，Summerton等人）。 在一些情况下，已经证明三链体的形成抑制DNA结合蛋白的结合（例如，Young等；Maher等）或细胞蛋白的表达（Cooney等）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Furthermore, several experiments have been reported in which a small DNA-binding molecule has been covalently attached to polymer capable of forming a triplex structure: (i) an acridine:polypyrimidine molecule has been demonstrated to inhibit SV40 in CV-1 cells (Birg, et al.  ); (ii) cleavage at a single site in a yeast chromosome was achieved with an oligonucleotide:EDTA-Fe molecule (Strobel, et al.; Dervan); and (iii) a photoinducible endonuclease was created by similar strategy by attaching an ellipticine derivative to a homopyrimidine oligonucleotide (Perouault, et al.). Several other small intercalating agents coupled to oligonucleotides have been described (for review, see Montenay- Garestier) .</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>此外，已经报道了几个实验，其中小的DNA结合分子已经共价连接到能够形成三链体结构的聚合物：(i)已经证明吖啶：多聚嘧啶分子抑制CV-1细胞中的SV40(Birg等人）； (ii)用寡核苷酸：EDTA-Fe分子（Strobel等人； 和(iii)通过类似的策略通过将玫瑰树碱衍生物附接至同型嘧啶寡核苷酸来产生光诱导型核酸内切酶（Perouault等人）。 已经描述了与寡核苷酸偶联的几种其它小的嵌入剂（综述参见Montenay-Garestier）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>To express full length UL9 protein a baculovirus expression system has been used. The sequence of the UL9 coding region of Herpes Simplex Virus has been disclosed by McGeoch et al. and is available as an EMBL nucleic acid sequence.  The recombinant baculovirus AcNPV/UL9A, which contained the UL9 protein-coding sequence, was obtained from Mark Challberg (National Institutes of Health, Bethesda Md.). The construction of this vector has been previously described (Olivo, et al. (1988, 1989)).  Briefly, the NarI/EcoRV fragment was derived from pMC160 (Wu, et al.).  Blunt-ends were generated on this fragment by using all four dNTPs and the Klenow fragment of DNA polymerase I (Boehringer Mannheim, Indianapolis Ind.)  to fill in the terminal overhangs. The resulting fragment was blunt-end ligated into the unique BamHI site of the baculoviral vector pAC3T3 (Summers, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了表达全长UL9蛋白，使用杆状病毒表达系统。 McGeoch等人已经公开了单纯疱疹病毒UL9编码区的序列，并且可作为EMBL核酸序列获得。 含有UL9蛋白编码序列的重组杆状病毒AcNPV/UL9A获自Mark Challberg（National Institutes of Health，Bethesda Md.）。 该载体的构建先前已有描述（Olivo等（1988，1989））。 简言之，NarI/EcoRV片段来自pMC 160（Wu等）。 通过使用所有四种dNTPs和DNA聚合酶I（Boehringer Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）的Klenow片段在该片段上产生平末端以补平末端突出端。 将所得片段平端连接到杆状病毒载体pAC3T3（Summers等）的独特BamHI位点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>为了表达全长UL9蛋白，使用杆状病毒表达系统。 McGeoch等人已经公开了单纯疱疹病毒UL9编码区的序列，并且可作为EMBL核酸序列获得。 含有UL9蛋白编码序列的重组杆状病毒AcNPV/UL9A获自Mark Challberg（National Institutes of Health，Bethesda Md.）。 该载体的构建先前已有描述（Olivo等（1988，1989））。 简言之，NarI/EcoRV片段来自pMC 160（Wu等）。 通过使用所有四种dNTPs和DNA聚合酶I（Boehringer Mannheim，Indianapolis Ind.）的Klenow片段在该片段上产生平末端以补平末端突出端。 将所得片段平端连接到杆状病毒载体pAC3T3（Summers等）的独特BamHI位点。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The UL9 protein-coding region was cloned into a second baculovirus vector, pVL1393 (Luckow, et al.). The 3077 bp NarI/EcoRV fragment containing the UL9 gene was excised from vector pEcoD (obtained from Dr. Bing Lan Rong, Eye Research Institute, Boston, Mass.): the plasmid pEcoD contains a 16.2 kb EcoRI fragment derived from HSV-I that bears the UL9 gene (Goldin, et al.).  Blunt-ends were generated on the UL9- containing fragment as described above.  EcoRI linkers (10 mer) were blunt- end ligated (Ausubel, et al.; Sambrook, et al.)  to the blunt-ended NarI/EcoRV fragment.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将UL9蛋白编码区克隆到第二杆状病毒载体pVL1393(Luckow等人）中。 从载体pEcoD（得自Bing Lan Rong博士，Eye Research Institute，Boston，Mass.）切下含有UL9基因的3077 bp NarI/EcoRV片段：质粒pEcoD含有来源于HSV-1的16.2 kb EcoRI片段，其带有UL9基因（Goldin等）。 如上所述在含有UL9的片段上产生平端。 将EcoRI接头（10 mer）平端连接（Ausubel等；Sambrook等）到平端NarI/EcoRV片段上。</base:Paragraphs>
