detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The vector pVL1393 (Luckow, et al.)  was digested with EcoRI and the linearized vector isolated. This vector contains 35 nucleotides of the 5' end of the coding region of the polyhedron gene upstream of the polylinker cloning site. The polyhedron gene ATG has been mutated to ATT to prevent translational initiation in recombinant clones that do not contain a coding sequence with a functional ATG. The EcoRI/UL9 fragment was ligated into the linearized vector, the ligation mixture transformed into E. coli and ampicillin resistant clones selected. Plasmids recovered from the clones were analyzed by restriction digestion and plasmids carrying the insert with the amino terminal UL9 protein-coding sequences oriented to the 5' end of the polyhedron gene were selected. This plasmid was designated pVL1393/UL9 (FIG. 7). pVL1393/UL9 was cotransfected with wild-type baculoviral DNA (AcMNPV; Summers, et al.)  into SF9 (Spodoptera frugiperda) cells (Summers, et al.). Recombinant baculovirus-infected Sf9 cells were identified and clonally purified (Summers, et al.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用EcoRI消化载体pVL 1393（Luckow等），分离线性化的载体。 该载体在多接头克隆位点上游含有多角体基因编码区5’端的35个核苷酸。 多角体基因ATG已经突变为ATT以防止不含具有功能性ATG的编码序列的重组克隆中的翻译起始。 将EcoRI/UL9片段连接到线性化载体中，将连接混合物转化到大肠杆菌中并选择氨苄青霉素抗性克隆。 通过限制性消化分析从克隆中回收的质粒，并选择携带氨基末端UL9蛋白编码序列朝向多角体基因的5'末端的插入片段的质粒。 该质粒命名为pVL1393/UL9（图7）。 将pVL 1393/UL9与野生型杆状病毒DNA（AcMNPV；Summers等）共转染到SF9（草地夜蛾）细胞（Summers等）中。 鉴定并克隆纯化重组杆状病毒感染的Sf9细胞（Summers等）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Clonal isolates of recombinant baculovirus infected Sf9 cells were grown in Grace's medium as described by Summers, et al. The cells were scraped from tissue culture plates and collected by centrifugation (2,000 rpm, for 5 minutes, 4&deg; C.). The cells were then washed once with phosphate buffered saline (PBS) (Maniatis, et al.). Cell pellets were frozen at -70&deg; C. For lysis the cells were resuspended in 1.5 volumes 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 1.7 M NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dithiothreitol (DTT), and 0.5 mM phenyl methyl sulfonyl fluoride (PMSF).  Cell lysates were cleared by ultracentrifugation (Beckman table top ultracentrifuge, TLS 55 rotor, 34 krpm, 1 hr, 4&deg; C.). The supernatant was dialyzed overnight at 4. degree. C. against 2 liters dialysis buffer (20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 10% glycerol, 50 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM EDTA, 1 mM dtt, and 0.1 mM PMSF).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如Summers等所述，将重组杆状病毒感染的Sf9细胞的克隆分离物在Grace培养基中生长。将细胞从组织培养板上刮下并通过离心（2,000rpm，5分钟，4℃)收集。 然后用磷酸盐缓冲盐水(PBS)（Maniatis等人）洗涤细胞一次。 将细胞沉淀在-70℃下冷冻； C.为了裂解，将细胞重悬于1.5倍体积的20 mM HEPES，pH 7.5，10%甘油，1.7M NaCl，0.5 mM EDTA，1 mM二硫苏糖醇（DTT），和0.5 mM苯基甲基磺酰氟（PMSF）中。 通过超速离心（Beckman台式超速离心机，TLS 55转子，34krpm，1小时，4℃)澄清细胞裂解物。 将上清液在4℃透析过夜。 学位 C.针对2升透析缓冲液(20mM HEPES，pH 7.5，10%甘油，50mM NaCl，0.5mM EDTA，1mM dtt和0.1mM PMSF）。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The sequence encoding the C-terminal third of UL9 and the 3' flanking sequences, an approximately 1.2 kb fragment, was subcloned into the bacterial expression vector, pGEX-2T (FIG. 6). The pGEX-2T is a modification of the pGEX-1 vector of Smith, et al. which involved the insertion of a thrombin cleavage sequence in-frame with the glutathione- S-transferase protein (gst).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将编码UL9的C末端三分之一和3'侧翼序列的序列（约1.2 kb片段）亚克隆到细菌表达载体pGEX-2T中（图6）。 pGEX-2T是Smith等人的pGEX-1载体的修饰，其涉及在与谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶蛋白(gst)框内插入凝血酶切割序列。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The fusion protein was purified over a glutathione agarose affinity column as described in detail by Smith, et al. The fusion protein was eluted from the affinity column with reduced glutathione, dialyzed against UL9 dialysis buffer (20 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, 0.  5 mM EDTA, 1 mM DTT, 0.1 mM PMSF) and cleaved with thrombin (2 ng/ug of fusion protein).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>如Smith等详细描述的，在谷胱甘肽琼脂糖亲和柱上纯化融合蛋白。用还原型谷胱甘肽从亲和柱上洗脱融合蛋白，用UL9透析缓冲液（20 mM HEPES pH 7.5，50 mM NaCl，0.5mM EDTA，1 mM DTT，0.1 mM PMSF）透析，并用凝血酶（2ng/ug融合蛋白）切割。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>DNA:protein binding reactions containing both labelled complexes and free DNA were separated electrophoretically on 4-10% polyacrylamide/Tris- Borate-EDTA (TBE) gels (Fried, et al.; Garner, et al.  ). The gels were then fixed, dried, and exposed to X-ray film. The autoradiograms of the gels were examined for band shift patterns.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>DNA：在4-10%聚丙烯酰胺/Tris-硼酸盐-EDTA（TBE）凝胶上电泳分离含有标记复合物和游离DNA的蛋白质结合反应（Fried等；Garner等）。 然后将凝胶固定、干燥并暴露于X射线胶片。 检查凝胶的放射自显影图的条带移位模式。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>A second method used particularly in determining the half-lives for oligonucleotide:protein complexes is filter binding (Woodbury, et al.  ). Nitrocellulose disks (Schleicher and Schuell, BA85 filters) that have been soaked in binding buffer (see below) were placed on a vacuum filter apparatus.  DNA:protein binding reactions (see below; typically 15-30 &mgr; l) are diluted to 0.5 ml with binding buffer (this dilutes the concentration of components without dissociating complexes) and applied to the discs with vacuum applied.  Under low salt conditions the DNA:protein complex sticks to the filter while free DNA passes through.  The discs are placed in scintillation counting fluid (New England Nuclear) , and the cpm determined using a scintillation counter.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>特别用于确定寡核苷酸：蛋白质复合物的半衰期的第二种方法是过滤结合（Woodbury等人）。 将已经浸泡在结合缓冲液（见下文）中的硝酸纤维素盘（Schleicher和Schuell，BA85过滤器）置于真空过滤装置上。 用结合缓冲液将DNA：蛋白质结合反应物（见下文，通常为15-30μg/ml）稀释至0.5ml（这稀释了组分的浓度而没有解离复合物），并在施加真空的情况下施加到盘上。 在低盐条件下，DNA：蛋白质复合物粘附到过滤器上，而游离DNA通过。 将盘置于闪烁计数流体中，并使用闪烁计数器测定cpm。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>In the competition assays, the binding reactions (Example 4A) were assembled with each of the oligonucleotides and placed on ice.  Unlabelled oligonucleo- tide (1 &mgr;g) was added 1, 2, 4, 6, or 21 hours before loading the reaction on an 8% polyacrylamide gel (run in TBE buffer (Maniatis, et al.)) to separate the reaction components. The dissociation rates, under these conditions, for the truncated UL9 (UL9- COOH) and the full length UL9 is approximately 4 hours at 4&deg; C. In addition, random oligonucleotides (a 10,000-fold excess) that did not contain the UL9 binding sequence and sheared herring sperm DNA (a 100, 000-fold excess) were tested: neither of these control DNAs competed for binding with the oligonucleotide containing the UL9 binding site.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>在竞争测定中，用每种寡核苷酸组装结合反应（实施例4A)并置于冰上。 在将反应物上样到8%聚丙烯酰胺凝胶（在TBE缓冲液（Maniatis等人）中运行）之前1、2、4、6或21小时加入未标记的寡核苷酸(1mgr.g)以分离反应组分。 在这些条件下，截短的UL9(UL9-COOH)和全长UL9的解离速率在4℃下为约4小时； C.另外，测试了不含UL9结合序列的随机寡核苷酸（10,000倍过量）和剪切的鲱鱼精子DNA（100,000倍过量）：这些对照DNA都不与含有UL9结合位点的寡核苷酸竞争结合。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Radioactive-labeling of the primer with .sup.32 P is accomplished by the enzymatic transfer of a radioactive phosphate from &ggr;-.sup. 32 P- ATP to the 5' end of the primer oligonucleotide using T4 polynucleotide kinase (Ausubel, et al.). For labeling 256 oligonucleotides, approximately 60 &mgr;g HSV primer was labeled as follows. The oligonucleotide was incubated for 1 hour at 37&deg; C. with 125 &mgr;l . gamma.-.sup.32 P-ATP (20 mCi total, 7000 Ci/mmol) and 600 units of T4 polynucleotide kinase in a 3 ml reaction volume containing 50 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 10 MM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM spermidine, and 1.5 mM dithiothreitol (freshly prepared). To stop the reaction, EDTA was added to a final concentration of 20 mM. Unincorporated nucleotides were removed using &quot;G- 25 SEPHADEX&quot; chromatography in 10 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.5, 50 mM NaCl, and 1 mM EDTA (TE+50).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用32P对引物进行放射性标记是通过酶促转移放射性磷酸酯从99gR-完成的。 使用T4多核苷酸激酶（Ausubel等人）将32P-ATP连接到引物寡核苷酸的5'末端。 为了标记256个寡核苷酸，如下标记约60μg HSV引物。 将寡核苷酸在37℃下孵育1小时； C.与125名经理； γ-32P-ATP(20mCi，7000Ci/mmol)和600单位T4多核苷酸激酶在含有50mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5、10mM MgCl2、10mM亚精胺和1.5mM二硫苏糖醇（新鲜制备的）的3ml反应体积中。 为了终止反应，加入EDTA至终浓度为20mM。 使用“G-25葡聚糖凝胶”去除未掺入的核苷酸。 在10mM Tris-HCL，pH 7.5，50mM NaCl和1mM EDTA(TE+50)中进行色谱。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>The radioactive primer was individually annealed to the top strand of each of the 256 test oligonucleotides. The bottom strand is synthesized using deoxyribonucleotides and Klenow fragment or T4 polymerase (Ausubel, et al.).  The annealing mixture typically contained 200 ng HSV primer mixed with 1 &mgr;g top strand in 20 mM Tris-HCL, pH 7.  5, 1 mM spermidine, and 0.1 mM EDTA (35 &mgr;l reaction volume). The primer was annealed to the top strand by incubating the sample for 2 minutes at 70&deg; C., then placing the sample at room temperature or on ice. To the annealing mixture, 4.5 &mgr;l 10&times; Klenow buffer (10.  times.=200 mM Tris-HCL, 500 mM NaCl, 50 mM MgCl.sub.2, 10 mM dithiothreitol), 5 &mgr;l 0.5 mM each dNTP (dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dTTP), and 1 &mgr;l Klenow fragment were added. This reaction mixture was incubated 30-60 minutes at room temperature (or up to 37&deg; C.).</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>将放射性引物单独退火至256个测试寡核苷酸中的每一个的顶链。 使用脱氧核糖核苷酸和Klenow片段或T4聚合酶合成下链（Ausubel等人）。 退火混合物通常含有200ng HSV引物，其与20mM Tris-HCL，pH 7中的1μg上链混合。 5、1 mM亚精胺和0.1 mM EDTA（35μl反应体积）。 通过将样品在70℃下温育2分钟，将引物退火至上链； 然后将样品置于室温或冰上。 向退火混合物中加入4.5mgr；110次； 加入Klenow缓冲液(10×=200mM Tris-HCL，500mM NaCl，50mM MgCl2，10mM二硫苏糖醇），每种dNTP(dATP，dCTP，dGTP，dTTP)和1mg1Klenow片段。 将该反应混合物在室温（或高达37℃)下温育30-60分钟。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>One method for testing protein or DNA adsorption to plates is to place assay mixtures in the wells of the plates for varying lengths of time. Samples are then removed from the wells and a nitrocellulose dot blot capture system (Ausubel, et al.; Schleicher and Schuell) is used to measure the amount of DNA:protein complex remaining in the mixture over time.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>用于测试蛋白质或DNA对板的吸附的一种方法是将测定混合物置于板的孔中不同的时间长度。 然后从孔中取出样品，并使用硝酸纤维素斑点印迹捕获系统（Ausubel等；Schleicher和Schuell）来测量随时间推移残留在混合物中的DNA：蛋白质复合物的量。</base:Paragraphs>

detail.name: 缩写
detail.c_origin: <base:Paragraphs>Typical treadmills also include surface engaging structure to support the treadmill on a support surface. The surface engaging structure typically includes feet positioned proximate the rear of the treadmill and feet positioned proximate the front of treadmill. The front feet or the rear feet may be operable to vary the inclination of the treadmill with respect to the support surface. For example, U.S. Pat. No.  4,913,396 (Dalebout et al.)  discloses a system for varying or adjusting the incline of a treadmill through the use of a pneumatic cylinder. U.S.  Pat. No. 4, 998,725 (Watterson et al.)  discloses an alternate arrangement for varying the inclination of a treadmill.</base:Paragraphs>
detail.c_trans: <base:Paragraphs>典型的跑步机还包括表面接合结构，以将跑步机支撑在支撑表面上。 表面接合结构通常包括位于跑步机后部附近的支脚和位于跑步机前部附近的支脚。 前支脚或后支脚可操作以改变跑步机相对于支撑表面的倾斜度。 例如，美国专利No.4,913,396(Dalebout等人）公开了一种用于通过使用气压缸来改变或调节跑步机的倾斜度的系统。 美国专利No.4,998,725(Watterson等人）公开了一种用于改变跑步机的倾斜度的替代布置。</base:Paragraphs>
